SELECT DISTINCT ecaa001,ecaa002 FROM ecaa_t
WHERE 1=1 and ecaaent=:ENT and ecaasite=:SITE and ecaastus='Y' ORDER BY ecaa001

SELECT DISTINCT oocq002,oocql004 FROM oocq_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqent=oocqlent and oocq002 = oocql002 and oocq001=oocql001 and oocql003=:LANG
WHERE 1=1 and oocqent=:ENT and oocq001='221' and oocqstus='Y' ORDER BY oocq002

SELECT DISTINCT apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc009,apca057,ooag011,apcc100,fabh004,apcastus,apca053 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc009,apca057,apca038,apca004,apca053, apcc118-apcc119+apcc113 AS fabh004_1, apcc108-apcc109-COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apce109) FROM apce_t WHERE apceent = apccent AND apceld =apccld AND NOT (apce001 = 'aapt430' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM apca_t WHERE apcaent = apceent AND apcadocno = apce003 AND apcald = apceld AND apca001 LIKE '1%')) AND apce003 = apccdocno AND apce004 =apccseq AND apce005 = apcc001 AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM apda_t WHERE apceent = apdaent AND apceld = apdald AND apcedocno = apdadocno AND apdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM apca_t WHERE apceent = apcaent AND apceld = apcald AND apcedocno = apcadocno AND apcastus NOT IN('X','Y')) )),0) -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(xrce109) FROM xrce_t WHERE xrceent = apccent AND xrceld =apccld AND xrce003 = apccdocno AND xrce004 =apccseq AND xrce005 = apcc001 AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM xrda_t WHERE xrceent = xrdaent AND xrceld = xrdald AND xrcedocno = xrdadocno AND xrdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) ) ),0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(COALESCE(apeb108,0)-COALESCE(apeb109,0)) FROM apea_t,apeb_t WHERE apebent = :ENT AND apeaent = apebent AND apeadocno = apebdocno AND apeb003 = apccdocno AND apeb004 = apccseq AND apeb005 = apcc001 AND apeastus <> 'X' ), 0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apba103) FROM apba_t LEFT JOIN apbb_t ON apbaent=apbbent AND apbadocno=apbbdocno WHERE apbbent = :ENT AND apbaent = apccent AND apba005 = apccdocno AND apba006 = apccseq AND apba020 = apcc001 AND (apbbstus NOT IN ('X','Y') OR (apbbstus = 'Y' AND apbbdocno NOT IN (SELECT apca018 FROM apca_t WHERE apcaent= 99 AND apcastus <> 'X')) ) ), 0) AS fabh004, apcc100,apcastus,apcaent,apcacomp,apca005,apcadocdt,apca060, (CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apcaent AND pmaa001 = apca004) = '4' THEN (SELECT ooag011 FROM ooag_t WHERE ooagent = apcaent AND ooag001 = apca057) ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apcaent AND pmaa001 = apca004) = '2' THEN (SELECT pmak003 FROM pmak_t WHERE pmakent = apcaent AND pmak001 = apca057) ELSE '' END END) ooag011 FROM apca_t,apcc_t xx WHERE apcaent = apccent AND apcald = apccld AND apcadocno = apccdocno AND apcaent = :ENT AND NOT(apca001 like '2%' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM apca_t,apcc_t WHERE apcaent = apccent AND apcastus = 'Y' AND apcadocno=apccdocno AND apcaent = apccent AND apcald = apccld AND apcc108-apcc109 >0 AND apca019 = xx.apccdocno AND apcald =xx.apccld AND apcaent =xx.apccent) ) )
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND (fabh004_1 > 0 or fabh004>0 ) AND apcastus = 'Y' AND apcacomp ='arg1' AND apcadocdt <= 'arg3' ORDER BY apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001

SELECT DISTINCT bmaa001,imaal003,imaal004,bmaa002,bmaaua001,imaa009,rtaxl003,imaa010,oocql004 FROM bmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON bmaa001 = imaal001 AND bmaaent = imaalent AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON bmaa001 = imaa001 AND bmaaent = imaaent LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON imaa009 = rtaxl001 AND imaaent = rtaxlent AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON imaa010 = oocql002 AND imaaent = oocqlent AND oocql001 = '210' AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE bmaaent = :ENT AND bmaasite = :SITEAND bmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY bmaa001

SELECT DISTINCT bmaa001,bmaa002,bmaaua001 FROM bmaa_t
WHERE bmaaent=:ENT AND bmaasite = :SITE AND bmaastus='Y' AND bmaa001='arg1' ORDER BY bmaa001,bmaa002

SELECT DISTINCT ecaauc004,ecaauc005,ecaauc007,ecaauc008,ecaauc001,ecaauc002,ecaauc006,ecaa002,ecaauc012 FROM ecaauc_t,ecaa_t
WHERE 1=1 and ecaaucent=:ENT and ecaaucsite=:SITE and ecaauc001='arg1' and ecaaent=:ENT and ecaasite=:SITE and ecaastus='Y' and ecaa001=ecaauc006 ORDER BY ecaauc001,ecaauc004

SELECT DISTINCT glac002,glacl004 FROM glac_t LEFT OUTER JOIN glacl_t ON glacent = glaclent AND glac001 = glacl001 AND glac002 = glacl002 AND glacl003 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND glacent = :ENT AND (glac007 = '6' OR glac007 = '5') AND glacstus = 'Y' ORDER BY glac002

SELECT DISTINCT glaf002,glafl004 FROM glaf_t LEFT OUTER JOIN glafl_t ON glafent = glaflent AND glaf001 = glafl001 AND glaf002 = glafl002 AND glafl003 = :DLANG
WHERE glafent = :ENT AND glaf001='arg1' AND glafstus ='Y' ORDER BY glaf001

SELECT DISTINCT imaa001,imaal003,imaal004 FROM imaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaa001 = imaal001 AND imaaent = imaalent AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE imaaent = :ENT AND imaa004 NOT IN('T','X') and imaa009='arg1' AND imaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY imaa001

SELECT DISTINCT imao002,oocal003 FROM imao_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocal_t ON oocal001 = imao002 AND oocalent = imaoent AND oocal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 and imaoent = :ENT AND imao001 = 'arg1' ORDER BY imao001

SELECT DISTINCT inag001,imaal003,imaal004 FROM inag_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = inag001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG AND imaalent = :ENT
WHERE inagent = :ENT AND inag008 > 0 ORDER BY inag001

SELECT DISTINCT inag004,inayl003,inag005,inab003,inag006,inag003,inag007,inag008,inag022 FROM inag_t LEFT OUTER JOIN inayl_t ON inagent = inaylent AND inayl002 = :DLANG AND inag004 = inayl001 LEFT OUTER JOIN inaa_t ON inaaent = inagent AND inaasite = inagsite AND inaa001 = inag004 LEFT OUTER JOIN inab_t ON inagent = inabent AND inagsite = inabsite AND inag004 = inab001 AND inag005 = inab002
WHERE inagent = :ENT AND inagsite = :SITE AND inag001 = 'arg1' AND inag002 =COALESCE('arg2',' ') AND inag008 > 0 ORDER BY inag004

SELECT DISTINCT gzcb002,gzcbl004 FROM gzcb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcb001 = gzcbl001 AND gzcb002 = gzcbl002 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE gzcb001 = '24' ORDER BY gzcb002

SELECT DISTINCT gzzj001,gzzol003,gzzol004 FROM gzzj_t LEFT OUTER JOIN gzzol_t ON gzzj001 = gzzol001 AND gzzol002 = :DLANG
WHERE gzzjstus='Y' ORDER BY gzzj001

SELECT DISTINCT nmckdocno,nmckdocdt,nmck011,nmck026,nmck025,nmck103,nmck113 FROM nmck_t
WHERE nmckent=:ENT and nmckstus='Y' ORDER BY nmckdocno

SELECT DISTINCT ooca001,oocal003 FROM ooca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocal_t ON ooca001 = oocal001 and oocaent=oocalent and oocal002=:LANG
WHERE 1=1 and oocaent=:ENT and oocastus='Y' ORDER BY ooca001

SELECT DISTINCT ooef001,ooefl003 FROM ooef_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooef001 = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND ooefent = ooeflent
WHERE ooefent = :ENT and ooef201='Y' AND ooefstus = 'Y' ORDER BY ooef001

SELECT DISTINCT ooeg001,ooefl003 FROM ooeg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = ooeg001 AND ooeflent = ooegent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE ooegent = :ENT AND ooeg002 = :SITE AND ooegstus = 'Y' AND ooeg006 <= 'arg1' AND (ooeg007 IS NULL OR ooeg007 > 'arg1') ORDER BY ooeg001

SELECT DISTINCT ooeg001,ooefl003 FROM (SELECT ooeg001,ooefl003 FROM ooeg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = ooegent AND ooefl001 = ooeg001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG WHERE ooegent = :ENT AND ooegstus='Y' UNION SELECT pmaa001 ooeg001,pmaal004 ooefl003 FROM pmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmaaent AND pmaal001 = pmaa001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG WHERE pmaaent = :ENT AND (pmaa002 = '1' OR pmaa002 ='3'))
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ooeg001,ooefl003

SELECT DISTINCT ooeg001,ooefl003 FROM ooeg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = ooeg001 AND ooeflent = ooegent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE ooegent = :ENT AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ooef_t WHERE ooefent = :ENT AND (ooef001 = :SITE OR ooef001 = 'ALL') AND ooef017 = ooeg009 ) AND ooegstus = 'Y' ORDER BY ooeg001

SELECT DISTINCT ooeg001,ooefl003 FROM ooeg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = ooeg001 AND ooeflent = ooegent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE ooegent = :ENT AND ooeg003 ='3'AND ooegstus = 'Y' AND ooeg006 <= 'arg1' AND (ooeg007 IS NULL OR ooeg007 > 'arg1') ORDER BY ooeg001

SELECT DISTINCT oofb008,oofb019,oofb011,oofb017 FROM oofb_t
WHERE oofbent = :ENT AND oofbstus = 'Y' AND oofb002 = 'arg1' ORDER BY oofb019

SELECT DISTINCT pjba001,pjbal003 FROM pjba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pjbal_t ON pjba001 = pjbal001 AND pjbaent = pjbalent AND pjbal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pjbaent = :ENT AND pjbastus= 'Y' AND (pjba011 <> 'Y' ) ORDER BY pjba001

SELECT DISTINCT pjba001,pjabl003,pjba009,pjba002 FROM pjba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pjabl_t ON pjbaent = pjablent AND pjba001 = pjabl001 AND pjabl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pjaa_t ON pjbaent = pjaaent AND pjba000 = pjaa001
WHERE pjbaent = :ENT AND pjbastus = 'Y' AND pjaa006 IN ('1','2') AND pjaa008 = '1' AND pjba011 = 'N' ORDER BY pjba001

SELECT DISTINCT pjba001,pjabl003 FROM pjba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pjabl_t ON pjba001 = pjabl001 AND pjbaent = pjablent AND pjabl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pjbaent = :ENT AND pjbastus= 'Y' AND (pjba011 <> 'Y' OR pjba011 is null ) ORDER BY pjba001

SELECT DISTINCT pjba001,pjabl003 FROM pjba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pjabl_t ON pjba001 = pjabl001 AND pjbaent = pjablent AND pjabl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pjbaent = :ENT AND pjbastus= 'Y' ORDER BY pjba001

SELECT DISTINCT pjbb001,pjabl003,pjbb002,pjbbl004 FROM pjbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pjabl_t ON pjbb001 = pjabl001 AND pjbbent = pjablent AND pjabl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pjbbl_t ON pjbb001 = pjbbl001 AND pjbbent = pjbblent AND pjbb002 = pjbbl002 AND pjbbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE pjbbent = :ENT ORDER BY pjbb001,pjbb002

SELECT DISTINCT pjbb001,pjabl003,pjbb002,pjbb004,oocql004 FROM pjbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pjabl_t ON pjbb001 = pjabl001 AND pjbbent = pjablent AND pjabl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocql001 = '8001' AND pjbbent = oocqlent AND oocql002 = pjbb004 AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE pjbbent = :ENT AND pjbb001 = 'arg1' ORDER BY pjbb001,pjbb002

SELECT DISTINCT pjbc001,pjbc002,oocql004,pjbc003,ooag011,pjbc004,pjbc005,pjbc006 FROM pjbc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = pjbcent and oocql002=pjbc002 and oocql001='8002' and oocql003=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent=pjbcent and ooag001=pjbc003 and ooagstus='Y'
WHERE 1=1 and pjbcent=:ENT and pjbc001='arg1' ORDER BY pjbc002,pjbc003

SELECT DISTINCT pjbd001,pjbd002,pjbd003,pjbd004,pjbd005,pjbd006,pjbd007,pjbd008,pjbd021,pjbdua001 FROM pjbd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pjba_t ON pjbd001 = pjba001 and pjbdent=pjbaent
WHERE 1=1 and pjbdent=:ENT and pjbastus='Y' ORDER BY pjbd001,pjbd002,pjbd003

SELECT DISTINCT sfaa011 FROM sfaa_t
WHERE sfaaent = :ENT AND sfaasite = :SITE ORDER BY sfaa011

SELECT DISTINCT sfaadocno,sfaadocdt,sfaa003,sfaa006,sfaa007,sfaa010,imaal003,imaal004,sfaa012,sfaa049,sfaa050,sfaa056,sfaa002,ooag011 FROM sfaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON sfaa010 = imaal001 AND sfaaent = imaalent AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON sfaa002 = ooag001 AND sfaaent = ooagent LEFT JOIN sfcb_t ON sfcbent=sfaaent and sfcbsite=sfaasite and sfcbdocno=sfaadocno
WHERE sfaaent = :ENT AND sfaasite = :SITE AND (sfcb050<>0 AND sfcb050 is not null) AND sfaastus = 'arg1' ORDER BY sfaadocno

SELECT DISTINCT sfaadocno,sfaa010,imaal003,imaal004,sfbaseq,sfbaseq1,sfba003,sfba004 FROM sfaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON sfaaent=imaalent AND sfaa010=imaal001 AND imaal002=:DLANG,sfba_t
WHERE sfaaent=sfbaent AND sfaadocno=sfbadocno AND sfaasite=:SITE and sfaaent=:ENT ORDER BY sfaadocno,sfbaseq,sfbaseq1

SELECT DISTINCT sfaadocno,sfaa010,imaal003,imaal004,sfbaseq,sfbaseq1,sfba003,sfba004 FROM sfaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON sfaaent=imaalent AND sfaa010=imaal001 AND imaal002=:DLANG,sfba_t
WHERE sfaaent=sfbaent AND sfaadocno=sfbadocno AND sfaasite=:SITE and sfaaent=:ENT ORDER BY sfaadocno,sfbaseq,sfbaseq1

SELECT DISTINCT sfaadocno,sfaa010,imaal003,imaal004,sfaa012,sfcb003,oocql004,sfcb004,sfcbua004,sfcbua005,sfcb011,ecaa002,sfaa068,ooefl003,sfcbua002,sfcbua003 FROM sfaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent=sfaaent and imaal001=sfaa010 and imaal002=:DLANG left join sfcb_t on sfcbent = sfaaent and sfcbdocno = sfaadocno left join ecaa_t on ecaaent = :ENT and ecaasite = :SITE and ecaa001 =sfcb011 left join ooefl_t on ooeflent = :ENT and ooefl001 = sfaa068 and ooefl002 = :DLANG left join oocql_t on oocqlent=sfaaent and oocql001='221' and oocql002=sfcb003 and oocql003=:DLANG
WHERE 1=1 and sfaaent=:ENT and sfaasite=:SITE and sfaastus='arg1' and sfcb003='arg2' and (sfcbua002 > sfcbua010 or sfcbua010 is null) ORDER BY sfaadocno

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xmahucdocno,xmahuc013,xmahucstus FROM xmahuc_t
WHERE xmahucent = :ENT AND xmahucsite = :SITE ORDER BY xmahucdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmda021,b.pmaal004,xmda022,c.pmaal004,xmda020,oocql004 FROM xmdd_t,xmdc_t,xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdaent AND b.pmaal001 = xmda021 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdaent AND c.pmaal001 = xmda022 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdaent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmda020 AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmddent = xmdcent AND xmdcent = xmdaent AND xmdaent = :ENT AND xmddsite=xmdcsite AND xmdcsite=xmdasite AND xmdasite=:SITE AND xmdddocno = xmdcdocno AND xmdcdocno = xmdadocno AND xmddseq = xmdcseq AND xmda005 <> '5' AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdcunit = :SITE AND xmda045 = 'N' AND NOT(xmda006 = '2' AND xmda050 IS NULL) ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmdastus,gzcbl004,xmda002,oofa011,xmda003,ooefl003 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmda002 AND oofaent = :ENT LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = xmda003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '13' AND gzcbl002 = xmdastus AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN xmdc_t ON xmdcent = xmdaent AND xmdcsite = xmdasite and xmdcdocno = xmdadocno LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON imaaent = :ENT AND imaa001 = xmdc001
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdlseq,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooeal003,xmdk007,a.pmaal004,xmdk006 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooealent = xmdkent AND ooeal001 = xmdk004 AND ooeal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG ,xmdl_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrca001,xrcald,xrcadocno,xrccseq,xrcc001,xrcc009,xrcc100,fabh004,xrcastus,xrca053 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT xrca001,xrcald,xrcadocno,xrccseq,xrcc001,xrcc009,xrca038,xrca053, xrcc108-xrcc109-COALESCE((SELECT SUM(xrce109) FROM xrce_t WHERE xrceent = xrccent AND xrceld =xrccld AND xrce003 = xrccdocno AND xrce004 =xrccseq AND xrce005 = xrcc001 and (exists (select 1 from xrda_t where xrceent = xrdaent and xrceld = xrdald and xrcedocno = xrdadocno and xrdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) OR exists (select 1 from xrca_t where xrceent = xrcaent and xrceld = xrcald and xrcedocno = xrcadocno and xrcastus NOT IN('X','Y'))) ),0) -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apce109) FROM apce_t WHERE apceent = xrccent AND apceld =xrccld AND apce003 = xrccdocno AND apce004 =xrccseq AND apce005 = xrcc001 and (exists (select 1 from apda_t where apceent = apdaent and apceld = apdald and apcedocno = apdadocno and apdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) ) ),0) AS fabh004, xrcc100,xrcastus,xrcaent,xrcacomp,xrca005,xrcadocdt,xrca004,xrca060 FROM xrca_t,xrcc_t xx WHERE xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcald = xrccld AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno AND xrcaent = :ENT AND NOT(xrca001 like '2%' AND EXISTS ( select 1 from xrca_t,xrcc_t where xrcaent = xrccent and xrcastus = 'Y' AND xrcadocno=xrccdocno AND xrcaent = xrccent and xrcald = xrccld and xrcc108-xrcc109 >0 and xrca019 = xx.xrccdocno and xrcald =xx.xrccld and xrcaent =xx.xrccent) ) )
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcastus = 'Y' AND fabh004 > 0 AND xrcacomp ='arg1' AND xrcadocdt <= 'arg3' ORDER BY xrca001,xrcald,xrcadocno,xrccseq,xrcc001

WHERE

WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY 1

where exists ( select prog from (select gzza001 prog from gzza_t union select gzdf002 prog from gzdf_t union select gzde001 prog from gzde_t union select gzja001 prog from gzja_t union select dzca001 prog from dzca_t) where prog=dzaf001 ) and not exists ( select dzyf001 from dzyf_t where dzyf001 = dzaf001 ) order by dzaf001

zoom.desc: 设计数据导出入程序编号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT gzza001,gzzal003,dzaf005 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT dzaf001 as gzza001 , progname as gzzal003 ,dzaf005 FROM dzaf_t LEFT JOIN (SELECT progid, progname FROM (SELECT gzza001 progid, gzzal003 progname FROM gzza_t LEFT JOIN gzzal_t ON gzzal001 = gzza001 AND gzzal002 = :LANG UNION SELECT gzde001 progid, gzdel003 progname FROM gzde_t LEFT JOIN gzdel_t ON gzdel001 = gzde001 AND gzdel002 = :LANG UNION SELECT gzdf002 progid, gzdfl003 progname FROM gzdf_t LEFT JOIN gzdfl_t ON gzdfl001 = gzdf002 AND gzdfl002 = :LANG UNION SELECT gzja001 progid, gzjal003 progname FROM gzja_t LEFT JOIN gzjal_t ON gzjal001 = gzja001 AND gzjal002 = :LANG UNION SELECT DISTINCT dzca001 progid, dzcal003 progname FROM dzca_t LEFT JOIN dzcal_t ON dzcal001 = dzca001 AND dzcal002 = :LANG)) data ON dzaf001 = data.progid ORDER BY 1 )
WHERE dzaf005 NOT IN ('T','MT','MG','MV')

select distinct dzaf001,gzzal003 from dzaf_t a left join gzzal_t b on a.dzaf001 = b.gzzal001 and gzzal002=:DLANG
where 1=1 order by dzaf001

zoom.desc: 融资账务作业单据号码

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT fmctdocno,fmctdocdt,fmctld,glap008 FROM ( SELECT fmctdocno,fmctdocdt,fmctld, CASE WHEN fmct001 = '01' THEN 'M14' WHEN fmct001 = '02' THEN 'M17' WHEN fmct001 = '03' THEN 'M18' END glap008 FROM fmct_t WHERE fmctent = :ENT AND fmctld = 'arg1' AND fmct003 IS NULL AND fmctstus = 'Y' UNION SELECT fmdfdocno,fmdfdocdt,fmdfld, 'M19' glap008 FROM fmdf_t WHERE fmdfent = :ENT AND fmdfld = 'arg1' AND fmdf003 IS NULL AND fmdfstus = 'Y' )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY fmctdocno

SELECT ooai001,ooail003,ooail004 FROM ooai_t,ooail_t
WHERE ooaient = ooailent and ooai001 = ooail001 and ooaient=:ENT and ooail002=:DLANG ORDER BY ooai001,ooail003,ooail004

SELECT DISTINCT ooai001,ooail003,ooail004 FROM ooai_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooail_t ON ooai001 = ooail001 AND ooaient = ooailent AND ooail002 = :DLANG
WHERE ooaient = :ENT AND ooaistus = 'Y' ORDER BY ooai001

SELECT DISTINCT apac001,apacl003,apac003,oofa011,apac004,ooefl003,apac005,ooeal003 FROM apac_t LEFT OUTER JOIN apacl_t ON apaclent = apacent AND apacl001 = apac001 AND apacl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = apacent AND oofa002 ='2' AND oofa003 = apac003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = apacent AND ooefl001 = apac004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooealent = apacent AND ooeal001 = apac005 AND ooeal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apacent = :ENTAND apacstus = 'Y'ORDER BY apac001

SELECT DISTINCT apac001,apacl_t.apacl003 FROM apac_t LEFT OUTER JOIN apacl_t ON apacent = apaclent AND apac001 = apacl001 AND apacl002 = :DLANG
WHERE apacent = :ENT AND apacstus = 'Y' ORDER BY apac001

SELECT DISTINCT apad002,nmaal003,nmas003,oofa011,apacsite,ooefl003 FROM apac_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON apacent = ooeflent AND apacsite = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG, apad_t, nmas_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmasent = nmaalent AND nmas001 = nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG, ooag_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON ooagent = oofaent AND oofa001 = ooag002
WHERE apacent = apadent AND apac001 = apad001 AND apacent = nmasent AND apad002 = nmas002 AND apacent = ooagent AND apac003 = ooag001 AND apacent=:ENT AND apacstus ='Y' AND apad005 = 'Y' ORDER BY apad002

SELECT DISTINCT apagdocno,apag001,apahseq,apah001,apag003 FROM apag_t LEFT OUTER JOIN apah_t ON apagent = apahent AND apagcomp = apahcomp AND apagdocno = apahdocno
WHERE apagent = :ENTand apagstus='Y' ORDER BY apagdocno

SELECT DISTINCT gzcb002,gzcbl004 FROM gzca_t,gzcb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcb001 = gzcbl001 AND gzcb002=gzcbl002 AND gzcbl003=:DLANG
WHERE gzca001=gzcb001 AND (gzca001='8541' OR gzca001='9743') AND gzca004='5' ORDER BY gzcb002

SELECT DISTINCT apbadocno,apba004,apba005,apba006,apba103,apba104,apba105 FROM apbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN apba_t ON apbbdocno = apbadocno
WHERE apbbent = :ENT ORDER BY apbadocno

SELECT DISTINCT imaa001,imaal003 FROM imaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaaent = imaalent AND imaa001=imaal001 AND imaal002=:DLANG
WHERE ORDER BY imaa001

zoom.desc: 进货发票收票单号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT apbb002,pmaal004,apbb050,apbbdocdt,apbbdocno,apbb014,apbb025,apbb059,pmak003 FROM ( SELECT apbb_t.* , (CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apbbent AND pmaa001 = apbb002) = '4' THEN (SELECT ooag011 FROM ooag_t WHERE ooagent = apbbent AND ooag001 = apbb059) ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apbbent AND pmaa001 = apbb059) = '2' THEN (SELECT pmak003 FROM pmak_t WHERE pmakent = apbbent AND pmak001 = apbb059) ELSE '' END END) pmak003 FROM apbb_t WHERE apbbent = :ENT ) LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apbbent = pmaalent AND apbb002 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apbbent=:ENT ORDER BY apbbdocdt desc,apbbdocno

zoom.desc: 来源进项发票单号查询 给应付模块使用查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT apbbdocno,apbb002,pmaal004,apbbdocdt,isam009,isam014,isam023,isam024,isam025 FROM apbb_t LEFT JOIN isam_t ON apbbdocno = isamdocno AND apbbent = isament LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaal001 = apbb002 AND pmaalent = apbbent AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apbbent = :ENT AND apbbstus = 'Y' AND apbbdocdt <= 'arg3' AND apbb002 ='arg4' AND apbbdocno NOT IN (SELECT UNIQUE apcb049 FROM apcb_t,apca_t WHERE apcbent=apcaent AND apcbent = :ENT AND apcbld = apcald AND apcbld ='arg2' AND apcbdocno =apcadocno and apcastus <>'N' ) AND apbb004 IN arg1 ORDER BY apbbdocno

zoom.desc: 选取开票单号(考虑可立账数等控卡) 应付系统使用

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT apbbdocno,apbb002,pmaal004,apbbdocdt,isam009,isam014,isam023,isam024,isam025 FROM ( SELECT apbbent,apbbdocno,SUM(PMDT) AS PMDTSUM,apbb002,apbbdocdt,apbb050,apbb014,apbb012,apbbcomp FROM( SELECT apbbent,apbbdocno,apbaseq,apba004,apba010,COALESCE((pmdt024 - pmdt056),0),apba005,apbbcomp, apbb002,apbbdocdt,apbb050,apbb014,apbb012, CASE WHEN (arg1=1 AND (apba010 > COALESCE((pmdt024 - pmdt056),0))AND apba004 IN ('11','20','21')) THEN COALESCE((pmdt024 - pmdt056),0) WHEN (arg1=1 AND (apba010 <= COALESCE((pmdt024 - pmdt056),0))AND apba004 IN ('11','20','21')) THEN apba010 WHEN (arg1=2 AND (apba010 > COALESCE((pmdt024 - pmdt057),0))AND apba004 IN ('11','20','21')) THEN COALESCE((pmdt024 - pmdt057),0) WHEN (arg1=2 AND (apba010 <= COALESCE((pmdt024 - pmdt057),0))AND apba004 IN ('11','20','21')) THEN apba010 WHEN (arg1=3 AND (apba010 > COALESCE((pmdt024 - pmdt058),0))AND apba004 IN ('11','20','21')) THEN COALESCE((pmdt024 - pmdt058),0) WHEN (arg1=3 AND (apba010 <= COALESCE((pmdt024 - pmdt058),0))AND apba004 IN ('11','20','21')) THEN apba010 ELSE apba010 END as PMDT FROM apbb_t,apba_t LEFT JOIN(SELECT pmdtent,pmdtdocno,pmdtseq, pmdt024, pmdt056, pmdt057,pmdt058 FROM pmdt_t WHERE ((arg1=1 AND (pmdt024 - pmdt056) > 0) OR(arg1=2 AND (pmdt024 - pmdt057) > 0) OR(arg1=3 AND (pmdt024 - pmdt058) > 0)) )ON pmdtent = apbaent AND pmdtdocno = apba005 AND pmdtseq = apba006 WHERE apbaent = apbbent AND apbadocno = apbbdocno ) GROUP BY apbbent,apbbdocno,apbb002,apbbdocdt,apbb050,apbb014,apbb012,apbbcomp ) LEFT JOIN isam_t ON isamdocno = apbbdocno AND isament = apbbent LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaal001 = apbb002 AND pmaalent = apbbent AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1= 1 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM apcb_t WHERE apcbent = apbbent AND apcb001 = 'arg2' AND apcb049 = apbbdocno) AND PMDTSUM > 0 ORDER BY apbbdocno,apbb002,apbbdocdt

zoom.desc: 进项发票来源单号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT apbbdocno,apbb001,apbb001,apbb004,apbb002,apbb050,apbb011 FROM apbb_t
WHERE apbbent = :ENT AND apbbstus = 'Y' ORDER BY apbbdocno

zoom.desc: 进项发票来源单号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT apbbcomp,ooefl003,apbb002,pmaal004,apbbdocno,apbbdocdt,apbb010,apbb050,gzcbl004 FROM apbb_t
LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = apbbent AND ooefl001 = apbbcomp AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = apbbent AND pmaal001 = apbb002 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '9741' AND gzcbl002 = apbb050 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG WHERE apbbent = :ENT ORDER BY apbbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT apca004,pmaal004 FROM apca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apcaent = pmaalent AND apca004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apcaent = :ENT ORDER BY apca004

SELECT DISTINCT apca005,pmaal004,pmaa002,gzcbl004 FROM pmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001=2014 AND gzcbl002 = pmaa002 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG ,apca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apcaent = pmaalent AND ( apca005 = pmaal001) AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apcaent =:ENT AND apcaent = pmaaent AND apca005=pmaa001AND pmaastus ='Y' ORDER BY apca005

SELECT DISTINCT apcald,apca001,apca004,pmaal004,apca018 FROM apca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON apcaent = a.pmaalent AND apca004 = a.pmaal001 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apca018 IS NOT NULL AND 1=1 AND apcastus = 'Y' ORDER BY apca018

SELECT DISTINCT apca019,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apca004,pmaal004,apca018 FROM apca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apcaent = pmaalent AND pmaal001 = apca004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apca001 = '21' ORDER BY apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apca019,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apca004,pmaal004,apca018 FROM apca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apcaent = pmaalent AND pmaal001 = apca004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apca001 = '22' ORDER BY apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apca004,pmaal004,apca038 FROM apca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON apcaent = a.pmaalent AND apca004 = a.pmaal001 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apca038 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY apca038

SELECT DISTINCT apca047,apcadocno FROM apca_t
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apca047 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY apca047

SELECT DISTINCT apca063 FROM apca_t
WHERE 1=1 AND apcaent = :ENT ORDER BY apca063

SELECT DISTINCT apca066 FROM apca_t
WHERE apcaent = :ENT ORDER BY apca066

SELECT DISTINCT apcald,glaal002,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apca004,a.pmaal004,apca005,b.pmaal004,apca057,pmak003 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT apca_t.*, (CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apcaent AND pmaa001 = apca004) = '4' THEN (SELECT ooag011 FROM ooag_t WHERE ooagent = apcaent AND ooag001 = apca057) ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apcaent AND pmaa001 = apca004) = '2' THEN (SELECT pmak003 FROM pmak_t WHERE pmakent = apcaent AND pmak001 = apca057) ELSE '' END END) pmak003 FROM apca_t WHERE apcaent = :ENT) LEFT OUTER JOIN glaal_t ON apcaent = glaalent AND apcald = glaalld AND glaal001 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON apcaent = a.pmaalent AND apca004 = a.pmaal001 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON apcaent = b.pmaalent AND apca005 = b.pmaal001 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apcaent = :ENT ORDER BY apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apcastus,apcc108,apcc118,apcc109,apcc119 FROM ( SELECT apcaent,apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apcastus,apca005,SUM(COALESCE(apcc108,0)) apcc108,SUM(COALESCE(apcc118,0)) apcc118, SUM(COALESCE(apcc109,0)) apcc109,SUM(COALESCE(apcc119,0)) apcc119 FROM apca_t,apcb_t,apcc_t WHERE apccent = apcbent AND apccld = apcbld AND apccdocno = apcbdocno AND apccseq = apcbseq AND apcbent = apcaent AND apcbld = apcald AND apcbdocno = apcadocno GROUP BY apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apcastus,apcaent,apca005 )
WHERE apcaent = :ENT ORDER BY apcald,apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apcbseq,apcc001,apcb008,apcc009,apcc100,fabh004,apcastus,apca057,pmak003 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT apcasite,apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apcbseq,apcc001,apcb008,apcc009, apcc108-COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apce109) FROM apce_t WHERE apceent = apccent AND apceld =apccld AND apce003 = apccdocno AND apce004 =apccseq AND apce005 = apcc001 and (exists (select 1 from apda_t where apceent = apdaent and apceld = apdald and apcedocno = apdadocno and apdastus IN('N','Y')) OR exists (select 1 from apca_t where apceent = apcaent and apceld = apcald and apcedocno = apcadocno and apcastus IN('N','Y'))) ),0) AS fabh004, apcc100,apcastus,apcaent,apcacomp,apca005,apcadocdt, apca057, (CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apcaent AND pmaa001 = apca004) = '4' THEN (SELECT ooag011 FROM ooag_t WHERE ooagent = apcaent AND ooag001 = apca057) ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apcaent AND pmaa001 = apca004) = '2' THEN (SELECT pmak003 FROM pmak_t WHERE pmakent = apcaent AND pmak001 = apca057) ELSE '' END END) pmak003 FROM apca_t,apcb_t,apcc_t WHERE apcaent = apcbent AND apcald = apcbld AND apcadocno = apcbdocno AND apcbent = apccent AND apcbld = apccld AND apcbdocno = apccdocno AND apcbseq = apccseq AND apcaent = :ENT )
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND fabh004 > 0 AND apcastus = 'Y' AND apcacomp ='arg1' AND apca005 ='arg2' AND apcadocdt <= 'arg3' ORDER BY apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apcbseq,apcc001

zoom.desc: 账款单批次审核的账款单号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT apca004,pmaal004,apca001,gzcbl004,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apca100,apca108,apca118,apcasite,ooefl003,apca003,a.ooag011,apcacrtid,b.ooag011,apcacrtdt FROM apca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apcaent = pmaalent AND (apca004 = pmaal001 OR apca005 = pmaal001) AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8502' AND gzcbl002 = apca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON apcasite = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND apcaent = ooeflent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t a ON a.ooagent = apcaent AND a.ooag001 = apca003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t b ON b.ooagent = apcaent AND b.ooag001 = apcacrtid
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY apca004,apca001,apcadocno

zoom.desc: 账款单批次取消审核的账款单号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT apca004,pmaal004,apca001,gzcbl004,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apca100,apca108,apca118,apcasite,ooefl003,apca003,a.ooag011,apcacrtid,b.ooag011,apcacrtdt,apcacnfid,c.ooag011,apcacnfdt FROM apca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apcaent = pmaalent AND (apca004 = pmaal001 OR apca005 = pmaal001) AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8502' AND gzcbl002 = apca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON apcasite = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND apcaent = ooeflent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t a ON a.ooagent = apcaent AND a.ooag001 = apca003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t b ON b.ooagent = apcaent AND b.ooag001 = apcacrtid LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t c ON c.ooagent = apcaent AND c.ooag001 = apcacnfid
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY apca004,apca001,apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apcadocno,apca004,pmaal004,apca001,gzcbl004,apca100,apcc108,apcc109,fabh004 FROM ( SELECT apcaent,apcasite,apcald,apcastus,apcadocno,apca004,apca001,apca100,SUM(apcc108) apcc108,SUM(apcc109) apcc109,SUM(apcc108-apcc109) fabh004 FROM apcc_t,apca_t WHERE apccent = apcaent AND apccld = apcald AND apccdocno = apcadocno GROUP BY apcadocno,apca004,apca001,apca100,apcasite,apcald,apcastus,apcaent ) LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apcaent = pmaalent AND apca004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8502' AND gzcbl002 = apca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND apcaent=:ENT ORDER BY apcadocno,apca004,apca001,apca100

SELECT DISTINCT apcadocno,apca001,apcasite,apca003,apca004,apcald,apcadocdt,apcc108,apcc109 FROM apca_t,apcc_t
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apcaent = apccent AND apcald = apccld AND apcadocno = apccdocno AND apcastus = 'Y' AND apcc108-apcc109>0 ORDER BY apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc009,apcadocdt,apca005,pmaal003,apcc100,fabh004,apcastus,apca057,pmak003 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc009,apca057,apca038,apca004, apcc108-apcc109-COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apce109) FROM apce_t WHERE apceent = apccent AND apceld =apccld AND NOT (apce001 = 'aapt430' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM apca_t WHERE apcaent = apceent AND apcadocno = apce003 AND apcald = apceld AND apca001 LIKE '1%')) AND apce003 = apccdocno AND apce004 =apccseq AND apce005 = apcc001 and (exists (select 1 from apda_t where apceent = apdaent and apceld = apdald and apcedocno = apdadocno and apdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) OR exists (select 1 from apca_t where apceent = apcaent and apceld = apcald and apcedocno = apcadocno and apcastus NOT IN('X','Y'))) ),0) -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(xrce109) FROM xrce_t WHERE xrceent = apccent AND xrceld =apccld AND xrce003 = apccdocno AND xrce004 =apccseq AND xrce005 = apcc001 and (exists (select 1 from xrda_t where xrceent = xrdaent and xrceld = xrdald and xrcedocno = xrdadocno and xrdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) ) ),0) AS fabh004, apcc100,apcastus,apcaent,apcacomp,apca005,apcadocdt ,apca009, (CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apcaent AND pmaa001 = apca004) = '4' THEN (SELECT ooag011 FROM ooag_t WHERE ooagent = apcaent AND ooag001 = apca057) ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apcaent AND pmaa001 = apca004) = '2' THEN (SELECT pmak003 FROM pmak_t WHERE pmakent = apcaent AND pmak001 = apca057) ELSE '' END END) pmak003 FROM apca_t,apcc_t xx WHERE apcaent = apccent AND apcald = apccld AND apcadocno = apccdocno AND apcaent = :ENT AND NOT(apca001 like '2%' AND EXISTS( select 1 from apca_t,apcc_t where apcaent = apccent and apcastus = 'Y' AND apcadocno=apccdocno AND apcaent = apccent and apcald = apccld and apcc108-apcc109 >0 and apca019 = xx.apccdocno and apcald =xx.apccld and apcaent =xx.apccent) ) ) LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = apcaent AND pmaal001 = apca005 and pmaal002=:DLANG
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND fabh004 > 0 AND apcastus = 'Y' AND apcacomp ='arg1' AND apca005 LIKE 'arg2' AND apcadocdt <= 'arg3' ORDER BY apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001

zoom.desc: 员工预支待抵单查询 有金额控卡

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT b.apcadocno,b.apcbdocno,b.apccseq,b.apcc001,b.apcc100,b.apcadocdt,b.xrea103 FROM apca_t a, ( SELECT apca001,apca019 AS apcadocno,apcaent,apcald,apcadocno AS apcbdocno,apca019,apcadocdt,apca057,apccseq,apcc001,apcc100, apcc108-apcc109-COALESCE(( SELECT SUM(apce109) FROM apce_t WHERE apceent = apccent AND apceld =apccld AND apce003 = apccdocno AND apce004 =apccseq AND apce005 = apcc001 and (exists (select 1 from apda_t where apceent = apdaent and apceld = apdald and apcedocno = apdadocno and apdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) OR exists (select 1 from apca_t where apceent = apcaent and apceld = apcald and apcedocno = apcadocno and apcastus NOT IN('X','Y'))) ),0) -COALESCE(( SELECT SUM(xrce109) FROM xrce_t WHERE xrceent = apccent AND xrceld =apccld AND xrce003 = apccdocno AND xrce004 =apccseq AND xrce005 = apcc001 and (exists (select 1 from xrda_t where xrceent = xrdaent and xrceld = xrdald and xrcedocno = xrdadocno and xrdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) ) ),0) AS xrea103, (apcc118-apcc119+apcc113) apcc119, apca004,apca014 FROM apca_t,apcc_t WHERE apcald = apccld AND apcaent = apccent AND apcadocno = apccdocno ) b
WHERE 1=1 AND b.xrea103 > 0 AND a.apcaent = :ENT AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM apca_t WHERE apcaent = b.apcaent AND apcald = b.apcald AND apcadocno = b.apca019) ORDER BY b.apcadocno,b.apcbdocno,b.apccseq,b.apcc001

SELECT DISTINCT apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcald,apcadocdt,apcc108,apcc109 FROM apca_t,apcc_t
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apcaent = apccent AND apcald = apccld AND apcadocno = apccdocno AND apcastus = 'Y' AND apcc108-apcc109>0 ORDER BY apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apca001,gzcbl004,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apcastus,apca004,pmaal003,apcc100,apcc105 FROM (SELECT apca001,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apcastus,apca004,apcc100,sum(apcc105) apcc105,sum(apcc109) apcc109,apcald FROM apca_t,apcb_t,apcc_t WHERE apcaent =apcbent and apcbent =apccent AND apcald = apcbld and apcbld = apccld AND apcadocno = apcbdocno and apcbdocno = apccdocno AND apcaent = :ENT GROUP BY apca001,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apcastus,apca004,apcc100,apcald) LEFT JOIN pmaal_t on pmaal001 = apca004 and pmaal002 = :DLANG and pmaalent = :ENT LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t on gzcbl001 = 8502 and gzcbl002 = apca001 and gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE apcastus<>'X' and apcc109 = 0 ORDER BY apcadocdt DESC ,apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc009,apca057,ooag011,apcc100,fabh004,apcastus,apca053 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc009,apca057,apca038,apca004,apca053, apcc108-apcc109-COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apce109) FROM apce_t WHERE apceent = apccent AND apceld =apccld AND NOT (apce001 = 'aapt430' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM apca_t WHERE apcaent = apceent AND apcadocno = apce003 AND apcald = apceld AND apca001 LIKE '1%')) AND apce003 = apccdocno AND apce004 =apccseq AND apce005 = apcc001 AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM apda_t WHERE apceent = apdaent AND apceld = apdald AND apcedocno = apdadocno AND apdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM apca_t WHERE apceent = apcaent AND apceld = apcald AND apcedocno = apcadocno AND apcastus NOT IN('X','Y')) )),0) -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(xrce109) FROM xrce_t WHERE xrceent = apccent AND xrceld =apccld AND xrce003 = apccdocno AND xrce004 =apccseq AND xrce005 = apcc001 AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM xrda_t WHERE xrceent = xrdaent AND xrceld = xrdald AND xrcedocno = xrdadocno AND xrdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) ) ),0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(COALESCE(apeb108,0)-COALESCE(apeb109,0)) FROM apea_t,apeb_t WHERE apebent = :ENT AND apeaent = apebent AND apeadocno = apebdocno AND apeb003 = apccdocno AND apeb004 = apccseq AND apeb005 = apcc001 AND apeastus <> 'X' ), 0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apba103) FROM apba_t LEFT JOIN apbb_t ON apbaent=apbbent AND apbadocno=apbbdocno WHERE apbbent = :ENT AND apbaent = apccent AND apba005 = apccdocno AND apba006 = apccseq AND apba020 = apcc001 AND (apbbstus NOT IN ('X','Y') OR (apbbstus = 'Y' AND apbbdocno NOT IN (SELECT apca018 FROM apca_t WHERE apcaent= 99 AND apcastus <> 'X')) ) ), 0) AS fabh004, apcc100,apcastus,apcaent,apcacomp,apca005,apcadocdt,apca060, (CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apcaent AND pmaa001 = apca004) = '4' THEN (SELECT ooag011 FROM ooag_t WHERE ooagent = apcaent AND ooag001 = apca057) ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apcaent AND pmaa001 = apca004) = '2' THEN (SELECT pmak003 FROM pmak_t WHERE pmakent = apcaent AND pmak001 = apca057) ELSE (SELECT pmaal003 FROM pmaal_t WHERE pmaalent = apcaent AND pmaal001 = apca057 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG) END END) ooag011 FROM apca_t,apcc_t xx WHERE apcaent = apccent AND apcald = apccld AND apcadocno = apccdocno AND apcaent = :ENT AND NOT(apca001 like '2%' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM apca_t,apcc_t WHERE apcaent = apccent AND apcastus = 'Y' AND apcadocno=apccdocno AND apcaent = apccent AND apcald = apccld AND apcc108-apcc109 >0 AND apca019 = xx.apccdocno AND apcald =xx.apccld AND apcaent =xx.apccent) ) )
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND fabh004 > 0 AND apcastus = 'Y' AND apcacomp ='arg1' AND apca005 ='arg2' AND apcadocdt <= 'arg3' ORDER BY apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001

SELECT DISTINCT apca001,gzcbl004,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc108,apcc109 FROM ( SELECT apcaent,apca001,apcald,apcadocno,apcastus,apcc108 ,apcc109 ,apccseq,apcc001 FROM apca_t,apcb_t b1,apcc_t,apcb_t b2 WHERE apcaent = b1.apcbent AND apcaent = apccent AND apcald = b1.apcbld AND apcald = apccld AND apcadocno=b1.apcbdocno AND apcadocno = apccdocno AND apcc108 - apcc109 <> 0 AND b1.apcb002 IS NOT NULL AND b1.apcb003 IS NOT NULL AND b1.apcb002 = b2.apcb002 AND b1.apcb003 = b2.apcb003 AND apcaent = :ENT AND apcald = 'arg1' AND b2.apcbdocno = 'arg2' ) LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8502' AND gzcbl002 = apca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apcastus = 'Y' ORDER BY apcald,apcadocno

zoom.desc: 员工预支待抵单查询 有金额控卡

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT a.apcadocno,b.apcbdocno,b.apccseq,b.apcc001,b.apcc100,b.apcadocdt,b.xrea103 FROM apca_t a, ( SELECT apcaent,apcald,apcadocno apcbdocno,apca019,apcadocdt,apca057,apccseq,apcc001,apcc100, apcc108-apcc109-COALESCE(( SELECT SUM(apce109) FROM apce_t WHERE apceent = apccent AND apceld =apccld AND apce003 = apccdocno AND apce004 =apccseq AND apce005 = apcc001 and (exists (select 1 from apda_t where apceent = apdaent and apceld = apdald and apcedocno = apdadocno and apdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) OR exists (select 1 from apca_t where apceent = apcaent and apceld = apcald and apcedocno = apcadocno and apcastus NOT IN('X','Y'))) ),0) -COALESCE(( SELECT SUM(xrce109) FROM xrce_t WHERE xrceent = apccent AND xrceld =apccld AND xrce003 = apccdocno AND xrce004 =apccseq AND xrce005 = apcc001 and (exists (select 1 from xrda_t where xrceent = xrdaent and xrceld = xrdald and xrcedocno = xrdadocno and xrdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) ) ),0) AS xrea103, (apcc118-apcc119+apcc113) apcc119, apca004,apca014 FROM apca_t,apcc_t WHERE apcald = apccld AND apcaent = apccent AND apcadocno = apccdocno ) b
WHERE 1=1 AND b.apcaent = a.apcaent AND b.apcald = a.apcald AND b.apca019 = a.apcadocno AND b.xrea103 > 0 AND a.apcaent = :ENT ORDER BY a.apcadocno,b.apcbdocno,b.apccseq,b.apcc001

SELECT DISTINCT apca001,gzcbl004,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apcastus,apca004,pmaal003,apcc100,apcc108 FROM (SELECT apca001,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apcastus,apca004,apcc100,sum(apcc105) apcc105,sum(apcc108) apcc108,apcald FROM apca_t,apcb_t,apcc_t WHERE apcaent =apcbent and apcbent =apccent AND apcald = apcbld and apcbld = apccld AND apcadocno = apcbdocno and apcbdocno = apccdocno AND apcaent = :ENT and apca017 != 1 AND apcc109 = 0 GROUP BY apca001,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apcastus,apca004,apcc100,apcald) LEFT JOIN pmaal_t on pmaal001 = apca004 and pmaal002 = :DLANG and pmaalent = :ENT LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t on gzcbl001 = 8502 and gzcbl002 = apca001 and gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE apcastus ='N' ORDER BY apcadocdt DESC ,apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apca001,gzcbl004,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc108,apcc118 FROM ( SELECT apcaent,apca001,apcald,apcadocno,b1.apcbseq,apcastus,apca005,b1.apcb002,b1.apcb003,apcc001,apccseq,(apcc108-apcc109) as apcc108,(apcc118-apcc119) as apcc118 FROM apca_t,apcb_t b1,apcc_t WHERE apcaent = b1.apcbent AND apcaent = apccent AND apcald = b1.apcbld AND apcald = apccld AND apcadocno=b1.apcbdocno AND apcadocno = apccdocno AND apcc108 - apcc109 <> 0 AND apcaent = :ENT AND apcald = 'arg1' AND apca004 = 'arg2' ) LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8502' AND gzcbl002 = apca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apcastus = 'Y' ORDER BY apcald,apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apcald,glaal002,apcadocno,apcadocdt,apca057,ooag011 FROM apca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN glaal_t ON apcaent = glaalent AND apcald = glaalld AND glaal001 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON apcaent = ooagent AND apca057 = ooag001
WHERE apcaent = :ENT ORDER BY apcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apcb001,apcb002,apcb008,apcbseq FROM apcb_t LEFT JOIN apcc_t ON apcbseq = apccseq AND apcbdocno = apccdocno AND apccld = apcbld AND apccent = apcbent
WHERE apcbent = :ENT AND apcc108 - apcc109 > 0 GROUP BY apcb001,apcb002,apcb008,apcbseq ORDER BY apcb002

SELECT DISTINCT apcb001,gzcbl004,apcb002,apcb008,apca004,pmaal004,apcb010,ooefl003 FROM (SELECT apcb001,apcb002,apcb008,apca004,apcb010,(SELECT gzcb005 FROM gzcb_t WHERE gzcb001='8302' AND apcb001 = gzcb002 ) AS gzcb005, sum(apcc109) apcc109,apcastus,apcb023,apcbld FROM apca_t,apcb_t,apcc_t WHERE apcaent =apcbent and apcbent =apccent AND apcald = apcbld and apcbld = apccld AND apcadocno = apcbdocno and apcbdocno = apccdocno AND apcaent = :ENT GROUP BY apcb001,apcb002,apcb008,apca004,apcb010,apcastus,apcb023,apcbld) LEFT JOIN gzzal_t ON gzzal001 = gzcb005 AND gzzal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 ='8302' AND gzcbl002=apcb001 AND gzcbl003 =:DLANG LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = apca004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = apcb010 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY apcb002,apcb008

SELECT DISTINCT apcb008 FROM apcb_t
WHERE apcbent = :ENT ORDER BY apcb008

SELECT DISTINCT apcb025,glapdocdt,glap002,glap004,glapstus FROM apcb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN glap_t ON apcbent = glapent AND apcbld = glapld AND glapdocno = apcbdocno
WHERE apcb025 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY apcb025

SELECT DISTINCT apcb029,glacl004,glac004,glac008,glac020,glac027,glac017,glac018,glac021,glac022,glac023,glac024,glac025 FROM apcb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN glacl_t ON apcbent = glaclent AND glacl001 = 'arg1' AND apcb029 = glacl002 AND glacl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN glac_t ON apcbent = glacent AND glac001 = 'arg1' AND apcb029 = glac002
WHERE apcb029 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY apcb029

SELECT DISTINCT apcbdocno,apcbseq,apcadocdt,apcb004,apcb005,apcb002,apcb020,apca100,apcb006,apcb101,apcb007,apcb103,apcb105,apcb104 FROM apca_t LEFT JOIN apcb_t ON apcaent = apcbent AND apcald = apcbld AND apcadocno = apcbdocno
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apcborga = 'arg1' AND apcb049 IS NULL ORDER BY apcbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT apccdocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc100,apca004,apcc108,apcc118 FROM ( SELECT apccdocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc100,apca004, apcc108 - apcc109 - CASE WHEN nmed012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmed012 END apcc108, apcc118 - apcc119 + apcc113 - CASE WHEN nmed013 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmed013 END apcc118 FROM apca_t,gzcb_t,ooef_t,apcc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT nmedent,nmed003,nmed004,nmed005,nmed012,nmed013 FROM nmed_t, nmck_t WHERE nmedent = nmckent AND nmeddocno = nmckdocno AND nmedcomp = nmckcomp AND nmckstus = 'N' AND nmedent = :ENT) ON apccdocno = nmed003 AND apccseq = nmed004 AND nmedent = apccent AND apcc001 = nmed005 WHERE apcaent = apccent AND apccdocno = apcadocno AND apcald = apccld AND ooefent = apccent AND ooef017 = apcccomp AND gzcb001 = '8502' AND gzcb002 = apca001 AND apcastus = 'Y' AND gzcb005 = 'arg1' AND apccent = :ENT AND apcc108 > 0 AND apccld = 'arg2' AND ooef001 = 'arg3' AND apcc100 = 'arg4' AND apcc108 - apcc109 - CASE WHEN nmed012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmed012 END > 0 )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY apccdocno

SELECT DISTINCT apccdocno,apccseq,apcc015,apcc003,apcc004,apcc001 FROM apcc_t,apca_t
WHERE 1=1 AND apccent = :ENT AND apcaent = apccent AND apcadocno = apccdocno AND apcald = apccld ORDER BY apccdocno

SELECT apca004,pmaal003,apca001,gzcbl004,apcadocdt,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc009,apca036,apca015,apcc118,apcc119,apce119 FROM ( SELECT apca004,pmaal003,apca001,gzcbl004,apcadocdt,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc009,apca036,apca015,apcc118,apcc119,CASE WHEN apce119 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE apce119 END AS apce119 FROM apca_t LEFT JOIN apcc_t ON apcaent=apccent AND apcald=apccld AND apcadocno=apccdocno LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON apcaent=pmaalent AND apca004=pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8502' AND gzcbl002 = apca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN (SELECT apceent,apceld,apce003,apce004,apce005,SUM(apce119) AS apce119 FROM apda_t,apce_t WHERE apdaent = apceent AND apdald = apceld AND apdadocno = apcedocno AND apdastus <> 'X' GROUP BY apceent,apceld,apce003,apce004,apce005) ON apceent = apcaent AND apceld = apcald AND apce003 = apcadocno AND apce004 = apccseq AND apce005 = apcc001 WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apcastus = 'Y' )
WHERE apcald = 'arg1' AND apcadocdt <= 'arg2' AND apcc118>apce119 AND (apcc118 - apcc119 - apce119) >0 ORDER BY apca004,apca001,apcadocdt,apcald,apcadocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc009

SELECT apce003,apce004,apce005,apcedocno,apceseq,apceld,apca001,gzcbl004 FROM apce_t LEFT JOIN apca_t ON apceent = apcaent AND apceld = apcald AND apce003 = apcadocno LEFT JOIN apda_t ON apceent = apdaent AND apceld = apdald AND apcedocno = apdadocno LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8502' AND gzcbl002 = apca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE apdaent = :ENT AND apdastus <> 'X' ORDER BY apce003,apce004,apce005,apcedocno,apceseq,apceld,apca001

SELECT apca004,pmaal003,apca001,gzcbl004,apcadocdt,apcald,apcadocno,apcbseq,apca036,apca015,apcb113,apce119 FROM ( SELECT apca004,pmaal003,apca001,gzcbl004,apcadocdt,apcald,apcadocno,apcbseq,apca036,apca015,apcb113,CASE WHEN apce119 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE apce119 END AS apce119 FROM apca_t LEFT JOIN apcb_t ON apcaent=apcbent AND apcald=apcbld AND apcadocno=apcbdocno LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON apcaent=pmaalent AND apca004=pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8502' AND gzcbl002 = apca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN (SELECT apceent,apceld,apce003,apce004,apce005,SUM(apce119) AS apce119 FROM apda_t,apce_t WHERE apdaent = apceent AND apdald = apceld AND apdadocno = apcedocno AND apdastus <> 'X' AND apce001 ='aapt430' GROUP BY apceent,apceld,apce003,apce004,apce005) ON apceent = apcbent AND apceld = apcbld AND apce003 = apcbdocno AND apce004 = apcbseq WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apcastus = 'Y' )
WHERE apcald = 'arg1' AND apcadocdt <= 'arg2' AND apcb113>apce119 ORDER BY apca004,apca001,apcadocdt,apcald,apcadocno,apcbseq

SELECT DISTINCT apcedocno,apceseq FROM apda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN apce_t ON apdaent = apceent AND apdald = apceld AND apdadocno = apcedocno
WHERE apceent = :ENT ORDER BY apcedocno

SELECT DISTINCT apcfdocno,apcadocdt,apcfseq,apcf113,apcf008 FROM apca_t,apcf_t
WHERE apcaent = :ENT AND apcaent = apcfent AND apcald = apcfld AND apcadocno = apcfdocno AND apcald = 'arg1' AND apcadocdt <= 'arg2' ORDER BY apcadocdt

SELECT DISTINCT apcgdocno,apcgld,apcgsite,apcgcomp,apcg001,apcg010 FROM apcg_t
WHERE 1=1 AND apcgent = :ENT ORDER BY apcgdocno

SELECT DISTINCT apdadocno,apdadocdt,apdastus FROM apda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN apce_t ON apdaent = apceent AND apdald = apceld AND apdadocno = apcedocno
WHERE 1 = 1AND apdaent = :ENT AND apdastus IN('Y','N') ORDER BY apdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apda009 FROM apda_t
WHERE apdaent = :ENT ORDER BY apda009

SELECT DISTINCT apda014 FROM apda_t
WHERE apdaent = :ENT AND apda014 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY apda014

SELECT DISTINCT apda014,glapdocdt,glapstus FROM apda_t LEFT JOIN glap_t ON apdaent = glapent AND apdald = glapld AND apda014 = glapdocno
WHERE apdaent = :ENT AND apda014 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY apda014

SELECT DISTINCT apdadocno,apda005,pmaal004,apda006,pmak003 FROM ( SELECT apda_t.* , (CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apdaent AND pmaa001 = apda005) = '4' THEN (SELECT ooag011 FROM ooag_t WHERE ooagent = apdaent AND ooag001 = apda006) ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apdaent AND pmaa001 = apda004) = '2' THEN (SELECT pmak003 FROM pmak_t WHERE pmakent = apdaent AND pmak001 = apda006) ELSE '' END END) pmak003 FROM apda_t WHERE apdaent = :ENT ) LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apdaent = pmaalent AND ( apda005 = pmaal001) AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apdaent = :ENT AND apdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY apdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT apdald,apdadocno,apdadocdt,apda001,apda004,a.pmaal003,apda005,b.pmaal003,apdastus FROM apda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = apdaent AND a.pmaal001 = apda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = apdaent AND b.pmaal001 = apda005 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND apdaent = :ENT ORDER BY apdald,apdadocno

zoom.desc: 核销单批次审核单号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT apda005,pmaal004,apda001,gzcbl004,apdadocdt,apdadocno,apda010,apdasite,ooefl003,apda003,a.ooag011,apdacrtid,b.ooag011,apdacrtdt FROM apda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apdaent = pmaalent AND apda005 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8507' AND gzcbl002 = apda001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON apdasite = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND apdaent = ooeflent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t a ON a.ooagent = apdaent AND a.ooag001 = apda003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t b ON b.ooagent = apdaent AND b.ooag001 = apdacrtid
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY apda005,pmaal004,apda001,apdadocno

zoom.desc: 核销单批次取消审核单号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT apda005,pmaal004,apda001,gzcbl004,apdadocdt,apdadocno,apdasite,ooefl003,apda003,a.ooag011,apdacrtid,b.ooag011,apdacrtdt,apdacnfid,c.ooag011,apdacnfdt FROM apda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON apdaent = pmaalent AND apda005 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8507' AND gzcbl002 = apda001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON apdasite = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND apdaent = ooeflent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t a ON a.ooagent = apdaent AND a.ooag001 = apda003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t b ON b.ooagent = apdaent AND b.ooag001 = apdacrtid LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t c ON c.ooagent = apdaent AND c.ooag001 = apdacnfid
WHERE 1=1 AND apdadocno NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT apdadocno FROM apda_t, apde_t WHERE apdaent = apdeent AND apdald = apdeld AND apdadocno = apdedocno AND 1 = 1 AND 1 = 1 AND apdastus <> 'X' AND EXISTS ( (SELECT apce003 FROM apce_t WHERE apceent = apdaent AND apceld = apdald AND apce003 = apde014 AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM apda_t WHERE apceent = apdaent AND apceld = apdald AND apcedocno = apdadocno AND apdastus NOT IN ('X'))OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM apca_t WHERE apceent = apcaent AND apceld = apcald AND apcedocno = apcadocno AND apcastus NOT IN ('X')))) UNION (SELECT xrce003 FROM xrce_t WHERE xrceent = apdaent AND xrceld = apdald AND xrce003 = apde014 AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM xrda_t WHERE xrceent = xrdaent AND xrceld = xrdald AND xrcedocno = xrdadocno AND xrdastus NOT IN ('X')) )))) ORDER BY apda005,apda001,apdadocdt,apdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT gzza001,gzzal003,apccdocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc100,apca004,apcc108,apcc118 FROM ( SELECT 'aapt420' gzza001,gzzal003,apdedocno apccdocno,apdeseq apccseq,0 apcc001,apde100 apcc100,apda005 apca004, apde109 - CASE WHEN nmed012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmed012 END apcc108, apde119 - CASE WHEN nmed013 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmed013 END apcc118,apdesite apdesite,apdeorga apdeorga FROM apda_t,gzzal_t,apde_t LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT nmedent,nmed003,nmed004,nmed012,nmed013 FROM nmed_t, nmck_t WHERE nmedent = nmckent AND nmeddocno = nmckdocno AND nmedcomp = nmckcomp AND nmckstus <> 'X' AND nmedent = :ENT) ON apdedocno = nmed003 AND apdeseq = nmed004 AND nmedent = apdeent WHERE apdeent = apdaent AND apdedocno = apdadocno AND apdeld = apdald AND gzzal001 = 'aapt420' AND apde002 = '10' AND apda001 = '45' AND apde003 IS NULL AND gzzal002 = :LANG AND apdastus = 'Y' AND apde109 - CASE WHEN nmed012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmed012 END > 0 AND apdeent = :ENT UNION SELECT gzcb005 gzza001,gzzal003,apccdocno,apccseq,apcc001,apcc100,apca004, apcc108 - apcc109 - CASE WHEN nmed012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmed012 END apcc108, apcc118 - apcc119 + apcc113 - CASE WHEN nmed013 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmed013 END apcc118,apccsite apdesite,ooef001 apdeorga FROM apca_t,gzzal_t,gzcb_t,ooef_t,apcc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT nmedent,nmed003,nmed004,nmed005,nmed012,nmed013 FROM nmed_t, nmck_t WHERE nmedent = nmckent AND nmeddocno = nmckdocno AND nmedcomp = nmckcomp AND nmckstus = 'N' AND nmedent = :ENT) ON apccdocno = nmed003 AND apccseq = nmed004 AND nmedent = apccent AND apcc001 = nmed005 WHERE apcaent = apccent AND apccdocno = apcadocno AND apcald = apccld AND ooefent = apccent AND ooef017 = apcccomp AND gzcb001 = '8502' AND gzcb002 = apca001 AND gzzal001 = gzcb005 AND gzzal002 = :LANG AND apcastus = 'Y' AND gzcb005 IN ('aapt310','aapt331','aapt330') AND apccent = :ENT AND apcc108 > 0 AND apccld = 'arg4' AND apcc108 - apcc109 - CASE WHEN nmed012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmed012 END > 0; )
WHERE 1=1 AND (gzza001 = 'arg1' OR '1' = 'arg1') AND apcc100 = 'arg2' AND apdesite = 'arg5' ORDER BY apccdocno

SELECT pmds011,pmds007,pmaal004,pmdsdocno,pmdtseq,pmds001,pmdt006,imaal003,pmdt001,pmds048,pmdtsite,ooefl003,apcbdocno,apcbseq FROM pmds_t LEFT JOIN pmdt_t ON pmdsent = pmdtent AND pmdsdocno = pmdtdocno LEFT JOIN apcb_t ON pmdsent = apcbent AND pmdsdocno = apcb002 AND pmdtseq = apcb003 LEFT JOIN apca_t ON apcbent = apcaent AND apcbld = apcald AND apcbdocno = apcadocno LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON apcaent=pmaalent AND apca004=pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON pmdsent = ooeflent AND pmdtsite = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND apcb023 <> 'Y' AND pmds000 NOT IN ('1','2','5','7','8','9','10','11','14','15') AND pmdsstus='S' AND apca001 IN ('01','03','13','17') ORDER BY pmds011,pmds007,pmdsdocno,pmdtseq

SELECT apdc002,apdc003,apdcdocno,apdcseq,apdcld,apdc004,imaal003 FROM apdc_t LEFT JOIN apda_t ON apdcent = apdaent AND apdcld = apdald AND apdcdocno = apdadocno LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = apdcent AND imaal001 = apdc004 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE apdaent = :ENT AND apdastus <> 'X' ORDER BY apdc002,apdc003,apdcdocno,apdcseq,apdcld,apdc004

SELECT apdc005,apdc006,apdcdocno,apdcseq,apdcld FROM apdc_t LEFT JOIN apda_t ON apdcent = apdaent AND apdcld = apdald AND apdcdocno = apdadocno
WHERE apdaent = :ENT AND apdastus <> 'X' ORDER BY apdc005,apdc006,apdcdocno,apdcseq,apdcld

WHERE apcaent=apddent AND apcald=apddld AND apcadocno=apdddocno ORDER BY apdddocno

WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY apdedocno

SELECT DISTINCT apeadocno,apea006,pmak003 FROM ( SELECT apea_t.* , (CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apeaent AND pmaa001 = apea005) = '4' THEN (SELECT ooag011 FROM ooag_t WHERE ooagent = apeaent AND ooag001 = apea006) ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = apeaent AND pmaa001 = apea005) = '2' THEN (SELECT pmak003 FROM pmak_t WHERE pmakent = apeaent AND pmak001 = apea006) ELSE '' END END) pmak003 FROM apea_t WHERE apeaent = :ENT ) LEFT OUTER JOIN apeb_t ON apeaent = apebent AND apeald = apebld AND apeadocno = apebdocno
WHERE apeaent = :ENT AND apeastus = 'Y' ORDER BY apeadocno

WHERE apeaent = :ENT AND apeastus = 'Y' ORDER BY apeadocno

WHERE apbbent = :ENT AND apbbent = apbaent AND apbbdocno = apbadocno AND apbbent = isament AND apbbdocno = isamdocno AND isam010 IS NOT NULL AND apba005 IS NOT NULL AND apba006 IS NOT NULL AND apbbstus = 'Y' AND apba005||apba006 = apcb002||apcb003 AND apcaent = apcbent AND apcald = apcbld AND apcadocno = apcbdocno AND apcbent = apccent AND apcbld = apccld AND apcbdocno = apccdocno ORDER BY isamseq

SELECT DISTINCT apbb002,pmaal003,apbbcomp,ooefl003,apbbdocno,apbbdocdt,apbb055,apbb050,gzcbl004,apbb010,apbb009,apbb014,apbb025 FROM ( SELECT apbbstus,apbb002 ,pmaal003 ,apbb050 ,gzcbl004 ,apbbcomp ,ooefl003 ,apbbdocdt ,apbb055,apbbdocno ,apbb014 , CASE WHEN isam025 IS NULL THEN apbb025 ELSE isam025 END apbb025 ,isam010 apbb010,apbb009 FROM apbb_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaal001 = apbb002 AND pmaalent = apbbent AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '9741' AND gzcbl002 = apbb050 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = apbbcomp AND ooeflent = apbbent AND ooefl002 =:DLANG LEFT JOIN isam_t ON isamdocno = apbbdocno AND apbbent = isament WHERE apbbstus = 'Y' AND apbbent = :ENT AND apbb025 >(SELECT COALESCE (sum(apeb109),0) FROM apea_t,apeb_t WHERE apeb003 = apbbdocno AND apeadocno=apebdocno) )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY apbbdocno DESC

SELECT glaald,glaal002,glaacomp,ooefl003,glaa004,glaa008,glaa014,glaastus FROM ( ( SELECT glaald,glaal002,glaacomp,ooefl003,glaa004,glaa008,glaa014,glaastus,glaa023,glaa121 FROM glaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = glaaent AND ooefl001 = glaacomp AND ooefl002 =:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN glaal_t ON glaaent = glaalent AND glaalld = glaald AND glaal001 = :DLANG WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM glba_t WHERE glbaent = glaaent AND glbald = glaald ) AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM glbb_t WHERE glbbent = glaaent AND glbbld = glaald ) AND glaaent=:ENT ) UNION ( SELECT glaald,glaal002,glaacomp,ooefl003,glaa004,glaa008,glaa014,glaastus,glaa023,glaa121 FROM glaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = glaaent AND ooefl001 = glaacomp AND ooefl002 =:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN glaal_t ON glaaent = glaalent AND glaalld = glaald AND glaal001 = :DLANG, glba_t WHERE glbaent = glaaent AND glbald = glaald AND glba001 = 'arg1' AND glaaent=:ENT ) UNION ( SELECT glaald,glaal002,glaacomp,ooefl003,glaa004,glaa008,glaa014,glaastus,glaa023,glaa121 FROM glaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = glaaent AND ooefl001 = glaacomp AND ooefl002 =:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN glaal_t ON glaaent = glaalent AND glaalld = glaald AND glaal001 = :DLANG, glbb_t WHERE glbbent = glaaent AND glbbld = glaald AND glbb001 = 'arg2' AND glaaent=:ENT ) )
WHERE 1=1 AND glaastus ='Y' ORDER BY glaald,glaacomp

SELECT xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004 FROM ( SELECT xmdksite,xmdkdocdt,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,xmdk206 FROM xmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON xmdlent = imaalent AND xmdl008 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG, xmdk_t WHERE xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdkstus IN ('Y','S') AND 'arg1' = '1' UNION SELECT indc005 xmdksite,indcdocdt xmdkdocdt,indddocno xmdldocno,inddseq xmdlseq,indd002 xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,dbac002 xmdk206 FROM indd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON inddent = imaalent AND indd002 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG, indc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ooefent,ooef001,oofb002,oofb019,t1.dbac002 FROM oofb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT dbadent, dbad001, dbac002 FROM dbad_t, dbac_t WHERE dbadent = dbacent AND dbad002 = dbac001) t1 ON oofbent = t1.dbadent AND oofb022 = t1.dbad001, ooef_t WHERE oofbent = ooefent AND oofb002 = ooef012 AND oofb008 = '3' AND oofbstus = 'Y') t2 ON indcent = t2.ooefent AND indc006 = t2.ooef001 WHERE inddent = indcent AND indddocno = indcdocno AND indcent = :ENT AND indcstus = 'N' AND 'arg1' = '2')
WHERE 1=1 AND xmdksite = 'arg2' AND xmdk206 = 'arg3' AND xmdkdocdt = 'arg4' ORDER BY xmdldocno,xmdlseq

zoom.desc: 配送排车来源单据查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,xmdl018 FROM (SELECT xmdldocno,xmdksite,xmdlseq,xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,dbef007,COALESCE(xmdl018,0) - COALESCE(dbef007,0) xmdl018 FROM( SELECT xmdkent,xmdksite,xmdkdocdt,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,xmdk206,xmdl018 FROM xmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON xmdlent = imaalent AND xmdl008 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG, xmdk_t WHERE xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdkstus IN ('Y','S') AND 'arg1' = '1' AND xmdk002 IN('1','2','3') UNION SELECT indcent xmdkent,indc005 xmdksite,indcdocdt xmdkdocdt,indddocno xmdldocno,inddseq xmdlseq,indd002 xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,dbac002 xmdk206,indd021 xmdl018 FROM indd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON inddent = imaalent AND indd002 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG, indc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ooefent,ooef001,oofb002,oofb019,t1.dbac002 FROM oofb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT dbadent, dbad001, dbac002 FROM dbad_t, dbac_t WHERE dbadent = dbacent AND dbad002 = dbac001) t1 ON oofbent = t1.dbadent AND oofb022 = t1.dbad001, ooef_t WHERE oofbent = ooefent AND oofb002 = ooef012 AND oofb008 = '3' AND oofbstus = 'Y') t2 ON indcent = t2.ooefent AND indc006 = t2.ooef001 WHERE inddent = indcent AND indddocno = indcdocno AND indcent = :ENT AND indcstus = 'N' AND 'arg1' = '2') A LEFT JOIN (SELECT dbeeent,dbef001,dbef002,SUM(COALESCE(dbef007,0))dbef007 FROM dbee_t,dbef_t WHERE dbeeent=dbefent AND dbeedocno=dbefdocno AND dbeestus<>'X' GROUP BY dbeeent,dbef001,dbef002) B ON A.xmdkent=B.dbeeent AND A.xmdldocno=B.dbef001 AND A.xmdlseq=B.dbef002
WHERE 1=1 AND COALESCE(xmdl018,0)-COALESCE(dbef007,0) > 0 ORDER BY xmdldocno,xmdlseq)

SELECT DISTINCT dzcl001,dzcl002,gzzal003,dzcl003,gzdel003,dzcl004,dzclcrtid FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT dzcl001,dzcl002,a.gzzal003 AS gzzal003 ,dzcl003,b.gzzal003 AS gzdel003,dzcl004,dzclcrtid FROM dzcl_t LEFT JOIN gzzal_t a ON a.gzzal001=dzcl002 AND a.gzzal002=:LANG LEFT JOIN gzzal_t b ON b.gzzal001=dzcl003 AND b.gzzal002=:LANG INNER JOIN gzza_t ON gzza001 = dzcl002 OR gzza001 = dzcl003 UNION SELECT DISTINCT dzcl001,dzcl002 ,a.gzdel003 AS gzzal003 ,dzcl003 ,b.gzdel003 AS gzdel003,dzcl004,dzclcrtid FROM dzcl_t LEFT JOIN gzdel_t a ON a.gzdel001=dzcl002 AND a.gzdel002 = :LANG LEFT JOIN gzdel_t b ON b.gzdel001=dzcl003 AND b.gzdel002 = :LANG INNER JOIN gzde_t ON gzde001 = dzcl002 OR gzde001 = dzcl003 UNION SELECT DISTINCT dzcl001,dzcl002 ,a.gzdfl003 AS gzzal003 ,dzcl003 ,b.gzdfl003 AS gzdel003,dzcl004,dzclcrtid FROM dzcl_t LEFT JOIN gzdfl_t a ON a.gzdfl001=dzcl002 AND a.gzdfl002 = :LANG LEFT JOIN gzdfl_t b ON b.gzdfl001=dzcl003 AND b.gzdfl002 = :LANG INNER JOIN gzdf_t ON gzdf002 = dzcl002 OR gzdf002 = dzcl003)
WHERE dzclcrtid =:USER ORDER BY dzcl001,dzcl002

WHERE ORDER BY dzcl001,dzcl002

SELECT DISTINCT imaf001,imaal003,imaal004,xcax002,xcaul003 FROM imaf_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = imaf001 AND imaalent = imafent AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN xcax_t ON xcax001 = imaf001 AND xcaxent = imafent AND xcaxsite = 'arg1' LEFT OUTER JOIN xcaul_t ON xcaul001 = xcax002 AND xcaulent = xcaxent AND xcaul002 = :DLANG , imaa_t
WHERE imaa001 = imaf001 AND imaaent = imafent AND imafent = :ENT AND imaa004 = 'M' AND imafsite = 'ALL' AND imaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY imaf001

WHERE imanent = :ENT AND imansite = :SITE ORDER BY iman001

WHERE imavent = :ENT AND imavsite = :SITE ORDER BY imavdocno

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004,imay004,imay005 FROM imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imay001 = imaal001 AND imayent=:ENT AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON imaaent = imayent AND imaa001 = imay001
WHERE imayent = :ENT AND imay006='Y' AND imaystus = 'Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY imay001

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004,imay004,imay005 FROM imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imay001 = imaal001 AND imayent=:ENT AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON imaa001=imay001
WHERE 1=1 AND imay006='Y' AND imaystus = 'Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rtdx_t WHERE rtdxent = imayent AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' AND rtdx001 = imay001 AND rtdx002 = imay003 AND rtdxstus = 'Y') ORDER BY imay001

SELECT DISTINCT imay003 FROM imay_t
WHERE imayent = :ENT AND imaystus = 'Y' AND imay001 = 'arg1' ORDER BY imay003

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004,imay004 FROM imaa_t,imaf_t,imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imay001 = imaal001 AND imayent=imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG
WHERE imaaent = imayent AND imay001 = imaa001 AND imayent = imafent AND imafsite = 'arg1' AND imaf001 = imay001 AND imayent = :ENT AND imaystus = 'Y' AND imaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY imay001,imay003

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004,imay004,oocal003 FROM imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imayent = imaalent AND imay001 = imaal001 AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON imaaent = imayent AND imaa001=imay001 LEFT OUTER JOIN oocal_t ON imayent = oocalent AND imay004=oocal001 AND oocal002=:DLANG
WHERE imayent = :ENT AND imaystus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY imay001

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004 FROM imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imayent = imaalent AND imay001 = imaal001 AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON imaaent = imayent AND imaa001=imay001
WHERE imayent = :ENT AND imaystus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY imay001

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004 FROM imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = imayent AND imaal001 = imay001 AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON imaaent = imaaent AND imaa001=imay001
WHERE imayent=:ENT AND imay006='Y' AND imaystus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY imay001

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004,imay004 FROM imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imay001 = imaal001 AND imayent=imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG
WHERE imayent = :ENT AND imay006='Y' AND imaystus = ' Y' ORDER BY imay001,imay003

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004 FROM imay_t INNER JOIN rtdx_t ON imay001 = rtdx001 INNER JOIN imaa_t ON imay001 = imaa001 AND imaastus = 'Y' INNER JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = imay001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG INNER JOIN imaf_t ON imafent = rtdxent AND imafsite = rtdxsite AND imaf001 = rtdx001
WHERE 1=1 AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' AND (imaf153 IS NULL OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM stan_t,star_t,stas_t WHERE stan001 = star004 AND star001 = stas001 AND starsite = stassite AND starsite = rtdxsite AND stas003 = imay001 AND star003 = imaf153 AND starstus = 'Y' AND 'arg2' between stan017 AND stan018 AND imaf153 IS NOT NULL )) ORDER BY imay003,imay001

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004,imay004 FROM imaa_t,imaf_t,imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imay001 = imaal001 AND imayent=imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG
WHERE imaaent = imayent AND imay001 = imaa001 AND imayent = imafent AND imafsite = 'ALL' AND imaf001 = imay001 AND imayent = :ENT AND imaystus = 'Y' AND imaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY imay001,imay003

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004 FROM imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imay001 = imaal001 AND imayent=:ENT AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON imaa001=imay001
WHERE 1=1 AND imay006='Y' AND imaystus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY imay001

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004 FROM imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imay001 = imaal001 AND imayent=:ENT AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON imaa001=imay001 ,rtdx_t
WHERE 1=1 AND rtdx001 = imay001 AND imaystus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' ORDER BY imay001

SELECT DISTINCT imay003,imay001,imaal003,imaal004,imay004 FROM imay_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imay001 = imaal001 AND imayent=imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG
WHERE imayent = :ENT AND imaystus = ' Y' ORDER BY imay001,imay003

SELECT DISTINCT imay004,imay005 FROM imay_t
WHERE 1=1 AND imayent = :ENT AND imaystus='Y' ORDER BY imay004

SELECT DISTINCT imea001,a.oocql004,imeb004,b.oocql004,imec003,imecl005 FROM imea_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t a ON oocqlent = imeaent AND oocql001 = '211' AND oocql002 = imea001 AND oocql003 = :DLANG, imeb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t b ON oocqlent = imebent AND oocql001 = '273' AND oocql002 = imeb004 AND oocql003 = :DLANG, imec_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imecl_t ON imeclent = imecent AND imecl001 = imec001 AND imecl002 = imec002 AND imecl003 = imec003 AND imecl004 = :DLANG ,imas_t
WHERE imeaent = imebent AND imea001 = imeb001 AND imebent = imecent AND imeb001 = imec001 AND imeb002 = imec002 AND imas002 = imeb004 AND imas003 = imec003 AND imas001 = 'arg3' AND imeaent = :ENT AND imea001 = 'arg1' AND imeb004 = 'arg2' ORDER BY imea001

WHERE 1=1 AND 1=1 ORDER BY inaa001

SELECT DISTINCT inag004,inayl003,inag005,inab003,inag006,inag003,inag009 FROM (SELECT inagent,inagsite,inag001,inag002,inag004,inayl003,inag005,inab003,inag006,inag003,inag009,inaa010,inaa106,inaa140 FROM inag_t LEFT JOIN inaa_t on inaaent = inagent and inaasite = inagsite and inag004 = inaa001 LEFT JOIN inayl_t ON inaylent = inagent AND inayl001 = inag004 AND inayl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN inab_t ON inabent = inagent AND inabsite = inagsite AND inab001 = inag004 AND inab002 = inag005 WHERE inag001 = COALESCE('arg2', inag001) AND inag002 = COALESCE('arg3', inag002) UNION ALL SELECT inaaent inagent, inaasite inagsite,' ' inag001,' ' inag002, inaa001 inag004,inayl003,inab002 inag005,inab003 ,' ' inag006,' ' inag003,0 inag009,inaa010,inaa106,inaa140 FROM inaa_t LEFT JOIN inab_t ON inabent = inaaent AND inabsite = inaasite AND inab001 = inaa001 LEFT JOIN inayl_t ON inaylent = inaaent AND inayl001 = inaa001 AND inayl002 = :DLANG WHERE inaastus = 'Y' AND inabstus = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM inag_t WHERE inagent = inaaent AND inagsite = inagsite AND inag001 = 'arg2' AND inag002 = ' ' AND inag003 = ' ' AND inag004 = inaa001 AND inag005 = inab002 AND inag006 = ' '))

SELECT DISTINCT inag004,inayl003,inag005,inab003,inag006,inag003,inag009 FROM (SELECT inagent,inagsite,inag001,inag002,inag004,inayl003,inag005,inab003,inag006,inag003,inag009 FROM inag_t LEFT JOIN inayl_t ON inaylent = inagent AND inayl001 = inag004 AND inayl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN inab_t ON inabent = inagent AND inabsite = inagsite AND inab001 = inag004 AND inab002 = inag005 UNION ALL SELECT inaaent inagent, inaasite inagsite,'' inag001,'' inag002, inaa001 inag004,inayl003,inab002 inag005,inab003 ,'' inag006,'' inag003,0 inag009 FROM inaa_t LEFT JOIN inab_t ON inabent = inaaent AND inabsite = inaasite AND inab001 = inaa001 LEFT JOIN inayl_t ON inaylent = inaaent AND inayl001 = inaa001 AND inayl002 = :DLANG WHERE inaa014 = 'Y' AND inaastus = 'Y' AND inabstus = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM inag_t WHERE inagent = inaaent AND inagsite = inaasite AND inag004 = inaa001)),inaa_t

WHERE 1=1 AND inbaent = :ENT AND inba001 = '1' AND inbasite = :SITE ORDER BY inbadocno

WHERE 1=1 AND inbaent = :ENT AND inba001 = '2' AND inbasite = :SITE ORDER BY inbadocno

SELECT DISTINCT inbadocno,inbadocdt,inba003,oofa011,inba004,ooefl003 FROM inba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = inbaent AND oofa002='2' AND oofa003 = inba003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = inbaent AND ooefl001 = inba004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND inbastus = 'S' AND inbasite = 'arg1' AND inba001 = 'arg2' ORDER BY inbadocno

zoom.desc: 库存异动与报废单查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT inbidocno,inbidocdt,inbistus,inbi001,oofa011,inbi002,ooefl003 FROM ((SELECT DISTINCT inbidocno,inbidocdt,inbistus,inbi001,oofa011,inbi002,ooefl003 FROM inbi_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = inbient AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = inbi001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = inbient AND ooefl001 = inbi002 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG WHERE inbient = :ENT AND inbisite = :SITE AND inbi000 IN ('arg1','arg2')) UNION (SELECT DISTINCT inbadocno,inbadocdt,inbastus,inba003,oofa011,inba004,ooefl003 FROM inba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = inbaent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = inba003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = inbaent AND ooefl001 = inba004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG WHERE inbaent = :ENT AND inbasite = :SITE AND inba001 IN ('arg3','arg4')))
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY inbidocno
