WHERE inbaent = :ENT AND inbasite = :SITE AND inbaent = inbbent AND inbadocno = inbbdocno AND inba001 = 'arg1' AND inbb018 = 'Y' AND inbastus = 'Y' ORDER BY inbbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT inbddocno,inbddocdt,inbd001,oofa011,inbd002,ooefl003 FROM inbd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON inbd001 = oofa003 AND oofa002 = '2' AND inbdent = oofaent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON inbd002 = ooefl001 AND inbdent = ooeflent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE inbdent=:ENT AND inbdsite=:SITE AND 1=1 ORDER BY inbddocno

SELECT DISTINCT inbddocno,inbddocdt,inbd001,oofa011,inbdsite,ooefl003 FROM inbd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON inbd001 = oofa003 AND oofa002 = '2' AND inbdent = oofaent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON inbdsite = ooefl001 AND inbdent = ooeflent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE inbdent=:ENT AND 1=1 ORDER BY inbddocno

SELECT DISTINCT inbddocno,inbddocdt,inbd001,oofa011,inbd002,ooefl003 FROM inbd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON inbd001 = oofa003 AND oofa002 = '2' AND inbdent = oofaent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON inbd002 = ooefl001 AND inbdent = ooeflent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE inbdent=:ENT AND inbdsite= 'arg1' AND inbdstus = 'Y' AND inbd003 = '2' AND 1=1 ORDER BY inbddocno

SELECT DISTINCT inbadocno,inbadocdt,inbastus,inba003,inba004 FROM inba_t
WHERE 1=1 AND inbaent = :ENT ORDER BY inbadocno

SELECT DISTINCT inbg001,inbg011 FROM inbg_t
WHERE inbgent = :ENT AND inbgsite = :SITE ORDER BY inbg011

SELECT DISTINCT inbidocno,inbidocdt,inbistus,inbi001,oofa011,inbi002,ooefl003 FROM inbi_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = inbient AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = inbi001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = inbient AND ooefl001 = inbi002 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE inbient = :ENT AND inbisite = :SITE ORDER BY inbidocno

SELECT DISTINCT inbidocno,inbidocdt,inbistus,inbi001,oofa011,inbi002,ooefl003 FROM inbi_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = inbient AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = inbi001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = inbient AND ooefl001 = inbi002 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE inbient = :ENT AND inbisite = :SITE AND inbi000 = '1' AND inbistus = 'S' ORDER BY inbidocno

SELECT DISTINCT inbidocno,inbidocdt,inbistus,inbi001,oofa011,inbi002,ooefl003 FROM inbi_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = inbient AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = inbi001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = inbient AND ooefl001 = inbi002 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE inbient = :ENT AND inbisite = :SITE AND inbi000 = '2' AND inbistus = 'S' ORDER BY inbidocno

SELECT DISTINCT inbjdocno,inbjseq,inbidocdt,inbistus,inbi001,ooag011,inbi002,ooefl003 FROM inbj_t,inbi_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = inbient AND ooag001 = inbi001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = inbient AND ooefl001 = inbi002 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE inbient = :ENT AND inbisite = :SITE AND inbi000 = 'arg1' AND inbient = inbjent AND inbidocno = inbjdocno AND inbistus = 'O' ORDER BY inbjdocno

zoom.desc: 库存异动单据编号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT inbkdocno,inbkocdt,inbkstus,inbk001,ooag011,inbk002,ooefl004 FROM inbk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooag001 = inbk001 AND ooagent = inbkent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = inbk002 AND ooeflent = inbkent AND ooefl002 = :LANG
WHERE 1=1 AND inbkent = :ENT AND inbksite = :SITE AND 1=1 ORDER BY inbkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT t1.inbmsite,t1.inbmdocno,t1.inbmdocdt,t1.inbmstus,t1.inbm008,t1.inbm001,t1.ooefl003 FROM (SELECT inbment,inbmsite,inbmdocno,inbmdocdt,inbmstus,inbm008,inbm001,CASE WHEN inbm008 = '1' THEN (SELECT ooefl003 FROM ooefl_t WHERE ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = inbm001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG) WHEN inbm008 = '2' THEN (SELECT pmaal004 FROM pmaal_t WHERE pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = inbm001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG) WHEN inbm008 = '3' THEN (SELECT pmaal004 FROM pmaal_t WHERE pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = inbm001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG) END ooefl003 FROM inbm_t ) t1
WHERE t1.inbment=:ENT AND t1.inbm008 IS NOT NULL AND t1.inbm001 IS NOT NULL AND t1.inbmstus <>'X' ORDER BY t1.inbm008,t1.inbmsite,t1.inbmdocno,t1.inbmdocdt,t1.inbmstus,t1.inbm001

SELECT DISTINCT t1.inbm001,t1.ooefl003 FROM (SELECT inbment,inbmsite,inbmdocno,inbmdocdt,inbmstus,inbm008,inbm001,CASE WHEN inbm008 = '1' THEN (SELECT ooefl003 FROM ooefl_t WHERE ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = inbm001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG) WHEN inbm008 = '2' THEN (SELECT pmaal004 FROM pmaal_t WHERE pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = inbm001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG) WHEN inbm008 = '3' THEN (SELECT pmaal004 FROM pmaal_t WHERE pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = inbm001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG) END ooefl003 FROM inbm_t ) t1
WHERE t1.inbment=:ENT AND t1.inbm008 IS NOT NULL AND t1.inbm001 IS NOT NULL AND t1.inbmstus <>'X' ORDER BY t1.inbm001

SELECT DISTINCT inbmdocno,inbmdocdt,inbm004,inbm005,inbm006 FROM inbm_t
WHERE inbment=:ENT ORDER BY inbmdocno,inbmdocdt,inbm004,inbm005,inbm006

SELECT DISTINCT inbmsite,inbmdocno,inbmdocdt,inbm007,inbm005,inbm006 FROM inbm_t
WHERE inbment=:ENT ORDER BY inbmsite,inbmdocno,inbmdocdt

SELECT DISTINCT inbmdocno,inbmdocdt,inbmsite,t1.ooefl003,inbmunit,t2.ooefl003 FROM inbm_t LEFT JOIN ooefl_t t1 ON t1.ooeflent = inbment AND t1.ooefl001 = inbmsite AND t1.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooefl_t t2 ON t2.ooeflent = inbment AND t2.ooefl001 = inbmunit AND t2.ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE inbment = :ENT ORDER BY inbmsite,inbmdocdt,inbmdocno

SELECT DISTINCT t1.inbmdocno,t1.inbmdocdt,t1.inbmsite,t2.ooefl003,t1.inbm001,t3.ooefl003,t1.inbm007,t1.inbmunit,t4.ooefl003 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT inbmdocno,inbm001, CASE WHEN inbm008 = '1' THEN (SELECT ooefl003 FROM ooefl_t WHERE ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = inbm001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG) WHEN inbm008 = '2' THEN (SELECT pmaal004 FROM pmaal_t WHERE pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = inbm001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG) WHEN inbm008 = '3' THEN (SELECT pmaal004 FROM pmaal_t WHERE pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = inbm001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG) END ooefl003 FROM inbm_t ) t3, inbm_t t1 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t t2 ON t2.ooeflent = t1.inbment AND t2.ooefl001 = t1.inbmsite AND t2.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooefl_t t4 ON t4.ooeflent = t1.inbment AND t4.ooefl001 = t1.inbmunit AND t4.ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE inbment = :ENT AND t1.inbmdocno = t3.inbmdocno AND t1.inbm001 = t3.inbm001 ORDER BY inbmsite,inbmdocdt,t1.inbmdocno

SELECT DISTINCT inbndocno,inbn001,inbn002 FROM inbn_t
WHERE inbnent = :ENT ORDER BY inbn001,inbn002

SELECT DISTINCT inbo007,inaml004,inbo006,imaal003,imaal004 FROM inbo_t LEFT JOIN inaml_t ON inamlent = inboent AND inaml001 = inbo006 AND inaml002 = inbo007 AND inaml003 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = inboent AND imaal001 = inbo006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE inboent = :ENT ORDER BY inbo007,inbo006

SELECT DISTINCT inbp005,imaal003,imaal004,inbp006,inaml004 FROM inbp_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = inbpent AND imaal001 = inbp005 AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT JOIN inaml_t ON inamlent = inbpent AND inaml001 = inbp005 AND inaml002 =inbp006 AND inaml003=:DLANG
WHERE inbpent=:ENT AND COALESCE(inbp006,' ') != ' ' ORDER BY inbp005,imaal003,imaal004,inbp006,inaml004

SELECT DISTINCT dzebl003,inba013,pmaal004 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT dzebl003 FROM dzebl_t WHERE dzebl000 = 'pmaa_t' AND dzebl001 = 'pmaa001' AND dzebl002=:DLANG) dzebl003, pmaaent ent,pmaa001 inba013 ,pmaal004,'1' inba013_type FROM pmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaaent = pmaalent AND pmaa001 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG WHERE (pmaa002 = '1' OR pmaa002 = '3') UNION SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT dzebl003 FROM dzebl_t WHERE dzebl000 = 'mhae_t' AND dzebl001 = 'mhae001' AND dzebl002=:DLANG) dzebl003, mhaeent ent,mhae001 inba013,mhael023 pmaal004,'2' inba013_type FROM mhae_t LEFT OUTER JOIN mhael_t ON mhaeent = mhaelent AND mhae001 = mhael001 AND mhael022 = :DLANG UNION SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT dzebl003 FROM dzebl_t WHERE dzebl000 = 'ooeg_t' AND dzebl001 = 'ooeg001' AND dzebl002=:DLANG) dzebl003, ooegent ent,ooeg001 inba013,ooefl003 pmaal004,'3' inba013_type FROM ooeg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = ooegent AND ooefl001 = ooeg001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG )
WHERE ent = :ENT AND inba013_type = COALESCE('arg1',inba013_type) ORDER BY dzebl003,inba013

SELECT DISTINCT inda107,inda108 FROM inda_t
WHERE indaent = :ENT ORDER BY inda107

SELECT DISTINCT inda108,inda107 FROM inda_t
WHERE indaent = :ENT ORDER BY inda108,inda107

SELECT DISTINCT indadocno,indadocdt,indastus,inda001 FROM inda_t
WHERE 1=1 AND indaent = :ENT ORDER BY indadocno

SELECT DISTINCT indadocno,indadocdt,indastus,inda001,ooag011,inda101,ooefl003 FROM inda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON inda001 = ooag001 AND indaent = ooagent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = inda101 AND ooeflent = indaent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE indaent = :ENT ORDER BY indadocno

SELECT DISTINCT indadocno FROM inda_t
WHERE indaent = :ENT AND indastus = 'Y' ORDER BY indadocno

SELECT DISTINCT indadocno,indadocdt,inda001,ooag011,inda004,ooefl004 FROM inda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent =indaent AND ooag001 = inda001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = indaent AND ooefl001 = inda004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE indaent = :ENT AND inda003 = :SITE AND inda109 = '1' AND indastus = 'Y' ORDER BY indadocno

SELECT DISTINCT indadocno FROM inda_t
WHERE indaent = :ENT AND inda003 = :SITE AND inda109 = '2' AND indastus = 'Y' ORDER BY indadocno

SELECT DISTINCT indc001,indcdocno FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND 1=1 ORDER BY indc001

SELECT DISTINCT indc001,indcdocno FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite = :SITE AND indc000 = '2' ORDER BY indc001

SELECT DISTINCT indc001,indcdocno FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite = :SITE AND indc000 = '3' ORDER BY indc001

SELECT DISTINCT indc003,indc004,indc005,indc006 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indc003 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY indc003

SELECT DISTINCT indc003 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite = :SITE AND indc000 = '1' AND indcstus = 'O' ORDER BY indc003

SELECT DISTINCT indc003 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indc000 = '2' AND indcsite = :SITE AND indcstus = 'O' ORDER BY indc003

SELECT DISTINCT indc003 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indc000 = '3' AND indcsite = :SITE AND indcstus = 'O' ORDER BY indc003

SELECT indc026,indc025 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent=:ENT AND indcsite=:SITE ORDER BY indc026,indc025

SELECT DISTINCT indc105 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite =:SITE AND indc000 = '1' ORDER BY indc105

SELECT DISTINCT indc105 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite =:SITE AND indc000 = '2' ORDER BY indc105

SELECT DISTINCT indc105 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite =:SITE AND indc000 = '3' ORDER BY indc105

SELECT DISTINCT indc107,indc108 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indc000 = '1' ORDER BY indc107

SELECT DISTINCT indc107,indc108 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indc000 = '2' AND indcsite = :SITE ORDER BY indc107

SELECT DISTINCT indc107 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indc000 = '3' AND indcsite = :SITE ORDER BY indc107

SELECT DISTINCT indc108,indc107 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indc000 = '1' AND indcsite = :SITE ORDER BY indc108,indc107

SELECT DISTINCT indc108,indc107 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indc000 = '2' AND indcsite = :SITE ORDER BY indc108,indc107

SELECT DISTINCT indc108 FROM indc_t
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indc000 = '3' AND indcsite = :SITE ORDER BY indc108

SELECT DISTINCT indc199 FROM indc_t
WHERE 1=1 AND indcent=:ENT AND indcstus not in ('X','N') AND indc000 <> '3' ORDER BY indc199

SELECT DISTINCT indcdocno,indcdocdt,indcstus,indc004,indc005,indc006 FROM indc_t
WHERE 1=1 AND indcent = :ENT ORDER BY indcdocno

SELECT DISTINCT indcdocno,indcdocdt,indc004,oofa011,indc005,a.ooefl003,indc006,b.ooefl003 FROM indc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON indcent=oofaent AND oofa003 = indc004 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t a ON indcent = a.ooeflent AND indc005=a.ooefl001 AND a.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t b ON indcent = b.ooeflent AND indc005=b.ooefl001 AND b.ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcstus='O' ORDER BY indcdocno

SELECT DISTINCT indcdocno,indc001,indcdocdt,indcstus,indc004,oofa011,indc006,ooefl003 FROM indc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent=indcent AND oofa003 = indc004 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent=indcent AND ooefl001 = indc006 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite = :SITE ORDER BY indcdocno

SELECT DISTINCT indcdocno,indc001,indcdocdt,indcstus,gzcbl004,indc004,ooag011,indc005,a.ooefl003,indc006,b.ooefl003 FROM indc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent=indcent AND ooag001 = indc004 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t a ON indcent = a.ooeflent AND indc005=a.ooefl001 AND a.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t b ON indcent = b.ooeflent AND indc006=b.ooefl001 AND b.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '13' AND gzcbl002 = indcstus AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indc000 = '2' AND indcsite = :SITE ORDER BY indcdocno

SELECT DISTINCT indcdocno,indcdocdt,indcstus,indc004,oofa011,indc006,ooefl003 FROM indc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = indcent AND oofa003 = indc004 AND oofa002 = '2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = indcent AND ooefl001 = indc006 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN indd_t ON inddent = indcent AND indddocno = indcdocno AND inddsite = indcsite
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite = :SITE AND indc000 = '2' AND indcstus = 'S' AND indd110 <> 0 AND indd110 <> indd112 ORDER BY indcdocno

SELECT DISTINCT indcdocno,indc001,indcdocdt,indcstus,indc004,oofa011,indc005,ooefl003 FROM indc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON indcent=oofaent AND oofa003 = indc004 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent=indcent AND ooefl001 = indc005 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite = :SITE AND indc000 = '3' ORDER BY indcdocno

SELECT DISTINCT indcdocno,indcdocdt,indc004,oofa011,indc005,a.ooefl003,indc006,b.ooefl003 FROM indc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON indcent=oofaent AND oofa003 = indc004 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t a ON indcent = a.ooeflent AND indc005=a.ooefl001 AND a.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t b ON indcent = b.ooeflent AND indc006=b.ooefl001 AND b.ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcstus IN arg1 ORDER BY indcdocno

SELECT DISTINCT indcdocno,indcdocdt,indc199,indc000,indc002,indc005,t1.ooefl003,indc006, t2.ooefl003 FROM indc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t t1 ON indcent = t1.ooeflent AND indc005 = t1.ooefl001 AND t1.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t t2 ON indcent = t2.ooeflent AND indc006 = t2.ooefl001 AND t2.ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite = indc006 AND indcsite = :SITE AND (indc000 = '1' OR indc000 = '3') AND indc199 = 'arg1' AND (indcstus = 'C' OR indcstus = 'P') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM indc_t t3 WHERE indcent = t3.indcent AND indcdocno = t3.indc003 AND indc199 = '3' AND indcstus != 'X' AND indcstus != 'C') ORDER BY indcdocno

SELECT DISTINCT indcdocno,indcdocdt,indcstus FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT indcdocno,indcdocdt,indcstus FROM indc_t WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcstus <> 'X' UNION SELECT inbadocno,inbadocdt,inbastus FROM inba_t WHERE inbaent = :ENT AND inbastus <>' X' UNION SELECT inbidocno,inbidocdt,inbistus FROM inbi_t WHERE inbient = :ENT AND inbistus <> 'X' )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY indcdocno

SELECT DISTINCT indd004 FROM indd_t,indc_t
WHERE inddent = indcent AND indddocno = indcdocno AND inddent = :ENT AND inddsite = :SITE AND indc000 = '3' ORDER BY indd004

SELECT DISTINCT indd023 FROM indd_t
WHERE 1=1 AND inddent = :ENT ORDER BY indd023

SELECT DISTINCT indd033 FROM indd_t
WHERE 1=1 AND inddent = :ENT ORDER BY indd033

SELECT DISTINCT indd102 FROM indd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN indc_t ON inddent = indcent AND indddocno = indcdocno
WHERE inddent = :ENT AND inddsite = :SITE AND indc000 = '3' ORDER BY indd102

SELECT DISTINCT indddocno,inddseq,indd003,indd002,imaal003,imaal004 FROM indd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON inddent=imaalent AND indd002 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE inddent = :ENT AND indddocno = 'arg1' ORDER BY indddocno,inddseq

SELECT DISTINCT indddocno,inddseq,indcdocdt,indcstus,indc004,ooag011,indc006,ooefl003 FROM indd_t,indc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = indcent AND ooag001 = indc004 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = indcent AND ooefl001 = indc006 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE indcent = :ENT AND indcsite = :SITE AND indc000 IN arg1 AND indc102 IN arg2 AND inddent = indcent AND indddocno = indcdocno AND indcstus IN ('O','P') ORDER BY indddocno

SELECT DISTINCT inde001,inde002,inde003,inde004 FROM inde_t
WHERE indeent = :ENT ORDER BY inde001

SELECT DISTINCT indedocno,indedocdt,inde002,ooag011,inde003,inde004 FROM inde_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON indeent = ooagent AND ooag001 = inde002
WHERE indeent = :ENT ORDER BY indedocno

SELECT DISTINCT indedocno,inde001,indedocdt,inde002,oofa011,inde101,ooefl003,inde004,ooefl003 FROM inde_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON indeent = oofaent AND oofa003 = inde002 AND oofa002 = '2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = indeent AND (ooefl001 =inde101 OR ooefl001 = inde004) AND ooefl002 = :DLANG

WHERE a.ooefent = :ENT AND ooag001 = 'arg1' ORDER BY ooef001

SELECT DISTINCTisafdocno,isat003,isat004,isat007,isaf100,isat105,isbc003from (SELECT ISAFSTUS,ISAF055, ISAFCOMP,ISAFENT,isafdocno, isat003,isat004,isat007,isaf100,case when isat004 is null then isaf105 else isat105 end isat105,case when isat004 is null then isbc0031 else isbc0032 end as isbc003 FROM (SELECT isafent,isafcomp,isafdocno,isatent,isatcomp,isaf055,isafstus,isat003,isat004,isat007,isaf100, case isaf056 when 1 then abs(isaf105) else -1 * abs(isaf105) end isaf105, case isaf056 when 1 then abs(isat105) else -1 * abs(isat105) end isat105, case isaf056 when 1 then(abs(isat105) -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(abs(isbc103)) FROM isbc_t WHERE isbcent = isatent AND isbccomp =isatcomp AND (isbc001 = isat003) AND isbc002 =isat004 and isbc004 =isafdocno and exists (select 1 from isba_t where isbcent = isbaent and isbccomp = isbacomp and isbcdocno = isbadocno and isbastus IN('N','Y'))),0)) else -1 * (abs(isat105) -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(abs(isbc103)) FROM isbc_t WHERE isbcent = isatent AND isbccomp =isatcomp AND (isbc001 = isat003) AND isbc002 =isat004 and isbc004 =isafdocno and exists (select 1 from isba_t where isbcent = isbaent and isbccomp = isbacomp and isbcdocno = isbadocno and isbastus IN('N','Y'))),0)) end isbc0032, case isaf056 when 1 then(abs(isaf105) -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(abs(isbc103)) FROM isbc_t WHERE isbcent = isatent AND isbccomp =isatcomp AND (isbc001 = isat003) AND isbc002 =isat004 and isbc004 =isafdocno and exists (select 1 from isba_t where isbcent = isbaent and isbccomp = isbacomp and isbcdocno = isbadocno and isbastus IN('N','Y'))),0)) else -1 * (abs(isaf105) -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(abs(isbc103)) FROM isbc_t WHERE isbcent = isatent AND isbccomp =isatcomp AND (isbc001 = isat003) AND isbc002 =isat004 and isbc004 =isafdocno and exists (select 1 from isba_t where isbcent = isbaent and isbccomp = isbacomp and isbcdocno = isbadocno and isbastus IN('N','Y'))),0)) end isbc0031 FROM isaf_t left outer join isat_t on isafent = isatent AND isafcomp = isatcomp AND isafdocno = isatdocno where (substr(isat014,1,2) IN('11','21') or isat004 is null)) )

WHERE 1=1 AND mrdcstus = 'Y' ORDER BY mrdc006

WHERE mrdcent = :ENT AND mrdcstus = 'Y' ORDER BY mrdcdocno

WHERE mrdcent = :ENT AND mrdcsite = :SITEAND mrba104 > 0 AND mrdcstus = 'Y' AND mrdd002 > COALESCE((SELECT SUM(COALESCE(mrdg004,0)) FROM mrdg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN mrdf_t ON mrdgent = mrdfent AND mrdgdocno = mrdfdocno WHERE mrdgsite = mrdcsite AND mrdgent = mrdcent AND mrdg003 = mrdd001 AND mrdfstus = 'Y' AND mrdg001 = mrdcdocno),0) ORDER BY mrdcdocno,mrddseq

WHERE 1=1 AND mrdfstus = 'Y' ORDER BY mrdf005

WHERE mrdcent = :ENT AND mrdcstus = 'Y' AND mrdd002 > COALESCE((SELECT SUM(COALESCE(mrdg004,0)) FROM mrdg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN mrdf_t ON mrdgent = mrdfent AND mrdgdocno = mrdfdocno WHERE mrdgsite = mrdcsite AND mrdgent = mrdcent AND mrdg003 = mrdd001 AND mrdfstus = 'Y'),0) ORDER BY mrdcdocno,mrddseq

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,b.nmaal003,nmas003,nmaa004,a.nmaal003,nmas004,nmaastus FROM nmas_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t b ON nmasent =nmaalent AND nmas001 = b.nmaal001 AND b.nmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaa_t ON nmasent = nmaaent AND nmas001 = nmaa001 LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t a ON nmasent =a.nmaalent AND nmaa004 = a.nmaal001 AND a.nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmaastus = 'Y' AND nmaa002 = 'arg1' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmas003,nmaal003,nmaa005,ooag001,ooag011 FROM nmas_t LEFT OUTER JOIN glab_t ON nmasent=glabent AND nmas002 = glab003 AND glabent = :ENT AND glab001='40' AND glab002='40' LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent=glabent AND ooag001=glabud001 AND ooagent=:ENT, nmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmaaent = nmaalent AND nmaa001 =nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmas001 = nmaa001 AND nmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmaal003,nmas003,nmaa005 FROM nmas_t,nmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmaaent = nmaalent AND nmaa001 =nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmas001 = nmaa001 AND nmaa002 = 'arg1' AND nmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmaal003,nmas003,nmaa005 FROM nmas_t,nmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmaaent = nmaalent AND nmaa001 =nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmas001 = nmaa001 AND nmaa002 = 'arg1' AND nmaa004 = 'arg2' AND nmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmas003,nmaal003,nmaa005 FROM nmas_t,nmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmaaent = nmaalent AND nmaa001 =nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmas001 = nmaa001 AND nmas003 = 'arg1' AND nmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmas001,nmaal003,nmas003,nmas005 FROM nmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmas_t ON nmaaent = nmasent AND nmaa001 = nmas001 LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmaaent = nmaalent AND nmaa001 =nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmaastus = 'Y' AND nmaa002 = 'arg1' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmas003,nmaal003,nmaa004 FROM nmas_t,nmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmaaent = nmaalent AND nmaa001 =nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmas001 = nmaa001 AND nmas003 = 'arg1' AND nmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmas003,nmaal003,nmaa004 FROM nmas_t,nmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmaaent = nmaalent AND nmaa001 =nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmas001 = nmaa001 AND nmas003 = 'arg1' AND nmaa004 = 'arg2' AND nmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmas003,nmaal003,nmaa005,ooag001,ooag011 FROM nmas_t LEFT OUTER JOIN glab_t ON nmasent=glabent AND nmas002 = glab003 AND glabent = :ENT AND glab001='40' AND glab002='40' LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent=glabent AND ooag001=glabud001 AND ooagent=:ENT, nmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmaaent = nmaalent AND nmaa001 =nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmas001 = nmaa001 AND nmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmas002

zoom.desc: 交易账户编码开窗---法人及其下层组织所属交易帐号

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmaa001,nmaa005,nmas003 FROM nmaa_t,nmas_t
WHERE nmaaent=:ENT AND nmaaent=nmasent AND nmaa001=nmas001 AND nmaastus='Y' AND nmaa002 IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ooef001 FROM ooef_t WHERE ooefent=:ENT AND ooef017 = 'arg1' ) ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmaal003,nmas003,nmaa003,nmagl003,nmaa004,nmabl004,nmas004,nmaastus FROM nmas_t LEFT JOIN nmaal_t ON nmasent =nmaalent AND nmas001 = nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN nmaa_t ON nmasent = nmaaent AND nmas001 = nmaa001 LEFT JOIN nmabl_t ON nmaaent = nmablent AND nmaa004 = nmabl001 AND nmabl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN nmagl_t ON nmaglent =nmaalent AND nmaa003 = nmagl001 AND nmagl002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmaastus = 'Y' AND nmaa002 = 'arg1' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmaal003,nmas003,nmaa003,nmagl003,nmaa004,nmabl004,nmas004,nmaastus FROM ooef_t b LEFT JOIN nmaa_t ON ooefent = nmaaent AND ooef001 =nmaa002 LEFT JOIN nmas_t ON nmaaent = nmasent AND nmaa001 = nmas001 LEFT JOIN nmaal_t ON nmasent = nmaalent AND nmas001 = nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN nmabl_t ON nmaaent = nmablent AND nmaa004 = nmabl001 AND nmabl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN nmagl_t ON nmaglent = nmaaent AND nmagl001 = nmaa003 AND nmagl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ooef017 FROM ooef_t LEFT JOIN nmaa_t ON ooef001 = nmaa002 WHERE nmaa002 = 'arg1') a ON a.ooef017=b.ooef017
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmas002 IS NOT NULL AND b.ooef017=a.ooef017 AND nmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmas003,nmaal003 FROM ooef_t b LEFT JOIN nmaa_t ON ooefent = nmaaent AND ooef001 =nmaa002 LEFT JOIN nmas_t ON nmaaent = nmasent AND nmaa001 = nmas001 LEFT JOIN nmaal_t ON nmasent = nmaalent AND nmas001 = nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmaal003,nmas003,nmaa002,nmaa007 FROM nmas_t ,nmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmaaent = nmaalent AND nmaa001 =nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmaaent = :ENT AND nmaa004 IN (SELECT nmab001 FROM nmab_t WHERE nmaaent=nmabent AND nmab002 = '0') AND nmasent = nmaaent AND nmas001 = nmaa001 ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmaa001,nmas002,nmaa005,nmas003 FROM nmaa_t,nmas_t
WHERE nmaaent=:ENT AND nmaaent=nmasent AND nmaa001=nmas001 AND nmaastus='Y' AND nmaa001='arg1' ORDER BY nmaa001

SELECT DISTINCT nmaa001,nmas002,nmaa005,nmas003 FROM nmaa_t,nmas_t
WHERE nmaaent=:ENT AND nmaaent=nmasent AND nmaa001=nmas001 AND nmaastus='Y' AND nmaa001='arg1' ORDER BY nmaa001

zoom.desc: 交易账户编码开窗---组织及其下级组织所属交易帐号

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmaa001,nmaa005,nmas003 FROM nmaa_t,nmas_t
WHERE nmaaent=:ENT AND nmaaent=nmasent AND nmaa001=nmas001 AND nmaastus='Y' AND nmaa002 IN ((SELECT DISTINCT ooed004 FROM ooed_t WHERE ooed001='arg1' AND ((ooed006 <= :TODAY AND ooed007 > :TODAY ) OR ooed007 IS NULL) START WITH ooed005='arg2' AND ooed001 = 'arg1' AND ((ooed006 <= :TODAY AND ooed007 > :TODAY ) OR ooed007 IS NULL) CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR ooed004=ooed005 AND ooed001='arg1' ) UNION (SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t WHERE ooed004='arg2' )) ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmas003,ooail003 FROM nmaa_t,nmas_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooail_t ON ooailent=:ENT AND ooail001 = nmas003 AND ooail002=:DLANG
WHERE nmaaent=nmasent AND nmaa001=nmas001 AND nmasent=:ENT AND nmaastus='Y' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmas002,nmas003,nmaal003,nmaa005 FROM nmas_t,nmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmaal_t ON nmaaent = nmaalent AND nmaa001 =nmaal001 AND nmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmasent = :ENT AND nmas001 = nmaa001 AND nmaastus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmas002

SELECT DISTINCT nmbadocno,nmbadocdt,nmbasite,a.ooefl003,nmba002,ooag011,nmbacomp,b.ooefl003 FROM nmba_t LEFT JOIN ooefl_t a ON a.ooeflent = nmbaent AND a.ooefl001 = nmbasite AND a.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = nmbaent AND ooag001 = nmba002 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t b ON b.ooeflent = nmbaent AND b.ooefl001 = nmbacomp AND b.ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmbaent = :ENTAND (nmbastus = 'V' OR nmbastus = 'Y') ORDER BY nmbadocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmbadocno,nmbbseq,nmbadocdt FROM nmba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmbb_t ON nmbaent = nmbbent AND nmbacomp = nmbbcomp AND nmbadocno = nmbbdocno
WHERE nmbaent = :ENT AND (nmbastus = 'V' OR nmbastus = 'Y') AND nmbasite='arg1' AND nmbborga = 'arg2' ORDER BY nmbadocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmbadocno,nmbbseq,nmbadocdt,nmbb004,nmbb006,nmbb007,nmbb008,nmbb009 FROM nmba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmbb_t ON nmbaent = nmbbent AND nmbacomp = nmbbcomp AND nmbadocno = nmbbdocno
WHERE nmbaent = :ENT AND (nmbastus = 'V' OR nmbastus = 'Y') ORDER BY nmbadocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmbadocdt,nmbb030,nmba004,pmaal004,nmbb004,nmbb006,nmbb031,nmbb042,gzcbl004,nmbadocno FROM nmba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmbb_t ON nmbaent = nmbbent AND nmbacomp = nmbbcomp AND nmbadocno = nmbbdocno LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = nmbaent AND pmaal001 = nmba004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001='8714' AND gzcbl002 = nmbb042 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE nmbaent = :ENT AND nmbastus = 'V' AND nmbb029 = '30' AND nmbb042 ='1' AND nmbacomp LIKE 'arg1' ORDER BY nmbadocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmbbdocno,nmbbseq,nmbborga,a.ooeal003,nmbb053,ooag011,nmbb054,b.ooeal003,nmbb004,nmbb006,nmbb001,gzcbl004 FROM nmba_t,nmbb_t LEFT JOIN ooeal_t a ON nmbbent = a.ooealent AND nmbborga = a.ooeal001 AND a.ooeal002= :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooag_t ON nmbbent = ooagent AND nmbb053 = ooag001 LEFT JOIN ooeal_t b ON nmbbent = b.ooealent AND nmbb054 = b.ooeal001 AND b.ooeal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON nmbb001 = gzcbl002 AND gzcbl001 ='8701' AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE nmbaent =nmbbent AND nmbbent = :ENT AND nmbadocno = nmbbdocno ORDER BY nmbbdocno,nmbbseq

SELECT DISTINCT nmbadocdt,nmbb030,nmba004,pmaal004,nmbb004,nmbb006,nmbb031,nmbb042,gzcbl004,nmbadocno FROM nmba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmbb_t ON nmbaent = nmbbent AND nmbacomp = nmbbcomp AND nmbadocno = nmbbdocno LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = nmbaent AND pmaal001 = nmba004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001='8714' AND gzcbl002 = nmbb042 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE nmbaent = :ENT AND nmbastus='V' AND nmbb029 = '30' AND nmbb042 ='1' AND nmbacomp LIKE 'arg1' ORDER BY nmbadocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmbadocno,nmbb030,nmbb006,nmbadocdt,nmbb031,nmbb042 FROM nmba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN nmbb_t ON nmbaent = nmbbent AND nmbacomp = nmbbcomp AND nmbadocno = nmbbdocno
WHERE nmbaent = :ENT AND nmbastus = 'V' AND nmbastus = 'V' ORDER BY nmbadocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmbb026,pmaal003,pmaal004 FROM nmbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON nmbbent = pmaalent AND nmbb026 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmbbent = :ENT AND nmbbdocno = 'arg1' ORDER BY nmbb026

SELECT DISTINCT nmbb026,pmaal004,pmaa002,pmaa004,pmaa047 FROM nmbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON nmbbent = pmaalent AND nmbb026 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG,pmaa_t
WHERE nmbbent = :ENT AND nmbbcomp = 'arg1' AND pmaa001 = nmbb026 AND nmbbent = pmaaent ORDER BY nmbb026

SELECT DISTINCT pmaa004,nmbb027,pmaal004 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT pmaa004,nmbb026,nmbb027,pmak003 pmaal004 FROM nmbb_t,pmaa_t,pmak_t WHERE nmbb026 = pmaa001 AND nmbbent = pmaaent AND pmaaent = pmakent AND pmaa001 = pmak002 AND nmbbent = :ENT AND pmaa004 = '2' AND nmbbcomp = 'arg1' UNION SELECT DISTINCT pmaa004,nmbb026,nmbb027,ooag011 pmaal004 FROM nmbb_t,pmaa_t,ooag_t WHERE nmbb026 = pmaa001 AND nmbbent = pmaaent AND nmbbent= :ENT AND pmaa004 = '4' AND nmbb027 = ooag001 AND nmbbcomp = 'arg1' )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY nmbb027

SELECT DISTINCT nmbb030,nmbb042,pmaal004,nmbb031,nmbb006,nmbb007,nmbbdocno FROM nmba_t,nmbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON nmbbent=pmaalent AND nmbb026 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002=:DLANG
WHERE nmbaent=nmbbent AND nmbacomp=nmbbcomp AND nmbadocno=nmbbdocno AND nmbbent=:ENT AND nmba003='anmt510' ORDER BY nmbb030

SELECT DISTINCT nmbb030,nmbb042,gzcbl004,pmaal004,nmbb031,nmbb006,nmbb007,nmbbdocno FROM nmba_t,nmbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON nmbbent=pmaalent AND nmbb026 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002=:DLANG LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8714' AND gzcbl002 = nmbb042 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE nmbaent=nmbbent AND nmbacomp=nmbbcomp AND nmbadocno=nmbbdocno AND (( nmbastus='V' AND nmba003 NOT IN ('anmt540','anmt541') ) OR (nmba003 IN ('anmt540','anmt541') AND nmbastus='V') ) AND nmbbent=:ENT AND nmbb029='30' ORDER BY nmbb030

SELECT DISTINCT b.nmbb030,nmbb042,pmaal004,nmbb031,nmbb006,nmbb007,nmbbdocno FROM nmba_t,nmbb_t b LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON nmbbent=pmaalent AND nmbb026 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002=:DLANG
WHERE nmbaent=nmbbent AND nmbacomp=nmbbcomp AND nmbadocno=nmbbdocno AND nmbbent=:ENT ORDER BY nmbb030

zoom.desc: 收支缴款单依对象冲账查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT nmbb026,pmaal004,nmbbdocno,nmbb028,ooial003,nmbb030,nmbb004,nmbb006,nmbb008,nmbb007,nmbb009,nmbadocdt FROM nmba_t,nmbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = nmbbent AND nmbb026 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooial_t ON ooialent = nmbbent AND nmbb028 = ooial001 AND ooial002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmbaent = nmbbent AND nmbastus = 'V' AND nmbadocdt <='arg1' AND nmbb026 = 'arg2' AND nmbb006-nmbb008>0 ORDER BY nmbbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmbborga,nmbb026,pmaal004,nmbbdocno,nmbadocdt,nmbb028,ooial003,nmbb003,nmbb030,nmbb004,nmbb006 FROM nmba_t,nmbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON nmbbent = pmaalent AND pmaal001 = nmbb026 AND pmaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooial_t ON ooialent = nmbbent AND ooial001 = nmbb028 AND ooial002=:DLANG
WHERE nmbbent=:ENT AND nmbaent = nmbbent AND nmbadocno = nmbbdocno ORDER BY nmbbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmbborga,nmbb026,pmaal004,nmbbdocno,nmbadocdt,nmbb028,ooial003,nmbb003,nmbb030,nmbb004,nmbb006,nmbb008 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT nmbborga,nmbb026,pmaal004,nmbbdocno,nmbadocdt, nmbb028,ooial003,nmbb003,nmbb030,nmbb004,nmbb006 - nmbb008 nmbb006, COALESCE (n1, 0) + COALESCE (n2, 0) + COALESCE (n3, 0) nmbb008,nmba003,nmbbcomp FROM nmba_t,nmbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON nmbbent = pmaalent AND pmaal001 = nmbb026 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooial_t ON ooialent = nmbbent AND ooial002 = :DLANG AND ooial001 = nmbb028 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM (xrde109) n1, xrde003 a01, xrde004 a02 FROM xrde_t, xrda_t WHERE xrdaent = :ENT AND xrdald = xrdeld AND xrdadocno = xrdedocno AND xrdastus = 'N' GROUP BY xrde003, xrde004) ON a01 = nmbbdocno AND a02 = nmbbseq LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM (xrde109) n2, xrde003 b03, xrde004 b04 FROM xrde_t, xrca_t WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcald = xrdeld AND xrcadocno = xrdedocno AND xrcastus = 'N' GROUP BY xrde003, xrde004) ON b03 = nmbbdocno AND b04 = nmbbseq LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM (xrfb103) n3, xrfb002, xrfb003 FROM xrfa_t, xrfb_t WHERE xrfaent = :ENT AND xrfald = xrfbld AND xrfadocno = xrfbdocno AND xrfastus = 'N' GROUP BY xrfb002, xrfb003) ON xrfb002 = nmbbdocno AND xrfb003 = nmbbseq WHERE nmbbent = :ENT AND nmbaent = nmbbent AND nmbadocno = nmbbdocno AND nmbb001 = '1' AND nmba003 NOT IN ('anmt310','anmt440') AND nmbastus IN ('Y','V') AND nmbb006 - nmbb008 - COALESCE (n1, 0) - COALESCE (n2, 0) - COALESCE (n3, 0) > 0 )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY nmbbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmbborga,ooeal003 FROM nmbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON nmbborga = ooeal001 AND ooeal002 = :DLANG AND nmbbent = ooealent
WHERE nmbbent = :ENT AND nmbbdocno = 'arg1' AND nmbb026 = 'arg2' ORDER BY nmbborga

SELECT DISTINCT nmbborga,ooefl003 FROM nmbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON nmbborga = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND nmbbent = ooeflent
WHERE nmbbent = :ENT ORDER BY nmbborga

SELECT DISTINCT nmbborga,ooefl003 FROM nmbb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON nmbborga = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND nmbbent = ooeflent
WHERE nmbbent = :ENT AND nmbbcomp = 'arg1' AND nmbborga IS NOT NULL ORDER BY nmbborga

SELECT DISTINCT nmbbdocno,nmbbseq,nmbasite,a.ooefl003,nmbacomp,c.ooefl003,nmbb053,ooag011,nmbb054,b.ooefl003,nmbb004,nmbb005,nmbb006,nmbb001 FROM nmba_t LEFT JOIN ooefl_t a ON nmbaent = a.ooeflent AND nmbasite = a.ooefl001 AND a.ooefl002= :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooefl_t c ON nmbaent = c.ooeflent AND nmbacomp = c.ooefl001 AND c.ooefl002= :DLANG, nmbb_t LEFT JOIN ooag_t ON nmbbent = ooagent AND nmbb053 = ooag001 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t b ON nmbbent = b.ooeflent AND nmbb054 = b.ooefl001 AND b.ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmbaent =nmbbent AND nmbbent = :ENT AND nmbadocno = nmbbdocno AND nmbacomp = nmbbcomp AND nmbastus = 'V' ORDER BY nmbbdocno,nmbbseq

SELECT DISTINCTnmbcorga,ooefl003 FROMnmbc_t LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON nmbcorga = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND nmbcent = ooeflent
WHERE nmbcent = :ENT AND nmbccomp = 'arg1' AND nmbcorga IS NOT NULL ORDER BY nmbcorga

SELECT DISTINCT nmbcorga,ooefl003 FROMnmbc_t LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON nmbcorga = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND nmbcent = ooeflent

WHERE nmbnent = :ENT AND nmbnstus = 'Y' ORDER BY nmbn001

SELECT DISTINCT nmbodocno,nmboseq,nmbo006,nmbo008 FROM (SELECT nmbodocno,nmboseq,nmbo006,nmbo008 - nmbo020 - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(nmbw006) FROM nmbw_t,nmbq_t WHERE nmbwent = :ENT AND nmbqent = nmbwent AND nmbqdocno = nmbwdocno AND nmbqstus = 'N' AND nmbw002||nmbw003 = a.nmbodocno||a.nmboseq),0) nmbo008 FROM nmbo_t a,nmbm_t WHERE nmboent = :ENT AND nmboent = nmbment AND nmbodocno = nmbmdocno AND nmbm001 = 'arg1' AND nmbo006 IN (arg2) AND nmbmstus = 'Y' )
WHERE nmbo008 > 0 ORDER BY nmbodocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmck023,c.gzcbl004,nmck001,a.gzcbl004,nmckdocno,nmck002,ooial003,nmck103,nmck100,nmck113,nmckstus,b.gzcbl004 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT nmck023,nmck001,nmckdocno,nmck002,nmck103 -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apde109) FROM apde_t WHERE apdeent = nmckent AND apdecomp =nmckcomp AND apde003 = nmckdocno and (exists (select 1 from apda_t where apdeent = apdaent and apdeld = apdald and apdedocno = apdadocno and apdastus IN('N','Y')) OR exists (select 1 from apca_t where apdeent = apcaent and apdeld = apcald and apdedocno = apcadocno and apcastus IN('N','Y'))) ),0) AS nmck103 ,nmck100, nmck113 -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apde119) FROM apde_t WHERE apdeent = nmckent AND apdecomp =nmckcomp AND apde003 = nmckdocno and (exists (select 1 from apda_t where apdeent = apdaent and apdeld = apdald and apdedocno = apdadocno and apdastus IN('N','Y')) OR exists (select 1 from apca_t where apdeent = apcaent and apdeld = apcald and apdedocno = apcadocno and apcastus IN('N','Y'))) ),0) AS nmck113,nmckstus, nmck043,nmck026,nmck025,nmck005,nmcksite,nmckent FROM nmck_t ) LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '13' AND b.gzcbl002 = nmckstus AND b.gzcbl003 =:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '8722' AND a.gzcbl002 = nmck001 AND a.gzcbl003 =:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t c ON c.gzcbl001 = '8310' AND c.gzcbl002 = nmck023 AND c.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooial_t c ON ooialent = nmckent AND ooial001 = nmck002 AND ooial002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmckent = :ENT AND nmcksite = 'arg1' AND nmck023='arg2' AND nmck005='arg3' AND ((nmck023 ='30' AND nmck025 IS NOT NULL) OR ((nmck023='10' OR nmck023='20') AND nmck026='11' AND nmck043 = 'Y' )) AND nmck001='XX' AND nmckstus='Y' AND nmck103 > 0 ORDER BY nmckdocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmchdocno,nmch001,nmchcomp FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT nmchdocno,nmch001,nmchcomp FROM nmch_t WHERE nmchent = :ENT AND nmchstus = 'Y' AND nmch007 IS NULL AND nmch001 IN ('11','12') )
WHERE 1 =1 ORDER BY nmchdocno,nmch001

WHERE nmckent = :ENT ORDER BY nmckdocno

SELECT DISTINCT nmck023,c.gzcbl004,nmck001,a.gzcbl004,nmckdocno,nmck002,ooial003,nmck103,nmck100,nmck113,nmckstus,b.gzcbl004 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT nmckcomp,nmck023,nmck001,nmckdocno,nmck002,nmck103 -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apde109) FROM apde_t WHERE apdeent = nmckent AND apdecomp =nmckcomp AND apde003 = nmckdocno and (exists (select 1 from apda_t where apdeent = apdaent and apdeld = apdald and apdedocno = apdadocno and apdastus IN('N','Y')) OR exists (select 1 from apca_t where apdeent = apcaent and apdeld = apcald and apdedocno = apcadocno and apcastus IN('N','Y'))) ),0) AS nmck103 ,nmck100, nmck113 -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apde119) FROM apde_t WHERE apdeent = nmckent AND apdecomp =nmckcomp AND apde003 = nmckdocno and (exists (select 1 from apda_t where apdeent = apdaent and apdeld = apdald and apdedocno = apdadocno and apdastus IN('N','Y')) OR exists (select 1 from apca_t where apdeent = apcaent and apdeld = apcald and apdedocno = apcadocno and apcastus IN('N','Y'))) ),0) AS nmck113,nmckstus, nmck043,nmck026,nmck025,nmck005,nmcksite,nmckent FROM nmck_t ) LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '13' AND b.gzcbl002 = nmckstus AND b.gzcbl003 =:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '8722' AND a.gzcbl002 = nmck001 AND a.gzcbl003 =:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t c ON c.gzcbl001 = '8310' AND c.gzcbl002 = nmck023 AND c.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooial_t c ON ooialent = nmckent AND ooial001 = nmck002 AND ooial002 = :DLANG
WHERE nmckent = :ENT AND nmckcomp = 'arg1' AND nmck023='arg2' AND nmck005 LIKE 'arg3' AND ((nmck023 ='30' AND nmck025 IS NOT NULL) OR ((nmck023='10' OR nmck023='20') AND nmck026='11')) AND nmck001<>'AP' AND nmckstus='Y' AND nmck103 > 0 ORDER BY nmckdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmbw031,oocql004 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT pmbw031,oocql004 FROM pmbv_t,pmbw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON pmbwent = oocqlent AND oocql001='2003' AND pmbw031 = oocql002 AND oocql003 = :DLANG WHERE pmbvent = pmbwent AND pmbvdocno = pmbwdocno AND pmbwent = :ENT AND pmbwdocno = 'arg1' AND pmbw013 = 'arg2' AND pmbvstus <> 'X' UNION SELECT DISTINCT pmaw031,oocql004 FROM pmaw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON pmawent = oocqlent AND oocql001='2003' AND pmaw031 = oocql002 AND oocql003 = :DLANG WHERE pmaw001 = 'arg3' AND pmaw002 = 'arg4' AND pmaw013 = 'arg2' AND pmawstus = 'Y')
WHERE pmbw031 NOT IN(' ','arg5') ORDER BY pmbw031

SELECT DISTINCT pmchdocno,pmchdocdt,pmch001,pmch002,rtaxl003 FROM pmch_t LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON pmch002 = rtaxl001 AND pmchent=rtaxlent AND rtaxl002=:DLANG

SELECT DISTINCT oocq002,oocql004 FROM ( ( SELECT DISTINCT oocq002,oocql004 FROM oocq_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocq001 = oocql001 AND oocq002 = oocql002 AND oocqent = oocqlent AND oocql003 = :DLANG WHERE oocqent = :ENT AND oocq001 = '2052' AND oocqstus = 'Y' ) UNION ( SELECT DISTINCT gzcb002,gzcbl004 FROM gzcb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcb001 = gzcbl001 AND gzcb002 = gzcbl002 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG WHERE gzcb001 = '6001' ) )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY oocq002

SELECT DISTINCT pmck001,pmck002,pmck003,pmaal004,rtaxl003 FROM pmck_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = pmck003 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON rtaxlent = :ENT AND rtaxl001 = pmck002 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmckent = :ENT ORDER BY pmck001

SELECT DISTINCT pmck001,pmck002,pmck003,pmaal004,rtaxl003 FROM pmck_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = pmck003 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON rtaxlent = :ENT AND rtaxl001 = pmck002 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG

SELECT DISTINCT pmcz001,pmcz002,pmcz004,imaal003,imaal004,pmczsite,t1.ooefl003,pmcz021,t2.ooefl003 FROM pmcz_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t on pmczent=imaalent AND pmcz004=imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t t1 ON pmczent=t1.ooeflent AND pmczsite=t1.ooefl001 AND t1.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t t2 ON pmczent=t2.ooeflent AND pmcz021=t2.ooefl001 AND t2.ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmcz031 IN('1','2','3','4','5') AND pmczent = :ENT AND pmcz060='1' AND pmcz027 = 'arg1' AND pmcz042= 'arg2' ORDER BY pmcz001

WHERE 1=1 AND pmczent = :ENT AND pmcz005 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY pmcz004

SELECT DISTINCT pmcz024 FROM pmcz_t
WHERE 1=1 AND pmczent = :ENT ORDER BY pmcz024

SELECT DISTINCT t1.pmcz062,t1.ooefl003 FROM (SELECT pmczent, pmcz062,CASE WHEN pmcz063 = '1' THEN ooefl003 ELSE pmaal004 END ooefl003 FROM pmcz_t LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmczent AND ooefl001 = pmcz062 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmczent AND pmaal001 = pmcz062 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG ) t1
WHERE t1.pmczent = :ENT ORDER BY t1.pmcz062

SELECT DISTINCT t1.pmcz062,t1.ooefl003 FROM (SELECT pmczent, pmcz062,CASE 'arg1' WHEN '1' THEN ooefl003 WHEN '2' THEN pmaal004 END ooefl003 FROM pmcz_t LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmczent AND ooefl001 = pmcz062 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmczent AND pmaal001 = pmcz062 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG WHERE pmczent = :ENT AND pmcz063 ='arg1' ) t1
WHERE t1.pmczent = :ENT ORDER BY t1.pmcz062

SELECT DISTINCT pmdadocno,pmdadocdt,pmda002,ooag011,pmda003,ooefl003 FROM pmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON pmdaent = ooagent AND pmda002= ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = pmda003 AND ooeflent = pmdaent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdaent = :ENT AND pmdasite = :SITE AND pmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdadocno,pmdadocdt,pmda002,ooag011,pmda003,ooefl003 FROM pmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON pmdaent = ooagent AND pmda002= ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = pmda003 AND ooeflent = pmdaent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG ,pmdb_t
WHERE pmdaent = :ENT AND pmdasite = :SITE AND pmdadocno = pmdbdocno AND pmdaent = pmdbent AND pmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdb005,inaml004,pmdb004,imaal003,imaal004 FROM pmdb_t LEFT JOIN inaml_t ON inamlent = pmdbent AND inaml001 = pmdb004 AND inaml002 = pmdb005 AND inaml003 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdbent AND imaal001 = pmdb004 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdbent = :ENT AND pmdb005 IS NOT NULL AND pmdb005<>' ' ORDER BY pmdb005,pmdb004

SELECT DISTINCT pmdbdocno,pmdbseq,pmdb004,imaal003,imaal004,pmdbsite,t1.ooefl003,pmdb037,t2.ooefl003 FROM pmda_t,pmdb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON pmdbent = imaalent AND pmdb004 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t t1 ON pmdbent = t1.ooeflent AND pmdbsite = t1.ooefl001 AND t1.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t t2 ON pmdbent = t2.ooeflent AND pmdb037 = t2.ooefl001 AND t2.ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdaent = pmdbent AND pmdadocno = pmdbdocno AND pmdaent = :ENT AND pmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdcdocno,pmdcdocdt,pmdc002,ooag011,pmdc003,ooefl003 FROM pmdc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON pmdcent = ooagent AND pmdc002= ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = pmdc003 AND ooeflent = pmdcent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdcent = :ENT AND pmdcsite = :SITE AND pmdcstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdcdocno

WHERE pmdfent = :ENT AND pmdfsite = :SITE AND pmdfstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdfdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdi034,pmdidocno,pmdidocdt,pmdi004,pmaal004 FROM pmdi_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdient = pmaalent AND pmdi004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdient = :ENT AND pmdi034 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY pmdi034

SELECT DISTINCT pmdidocno,pmdidocdt,pmdistus,pmdi002,ooag011,pmdi003,ooefl003 FROM pmdi_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON pmdi002 = ooag001 AND pmdient = ooagent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON pmdi003 = ooefl001 AND pmdient = ooeflent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdient = :ENT AND pmdisite = :SITE AND pmdistus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdidocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdj002,imaal003,imaal004 FROM pmdj_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON pmdjent = imaalent AND pmdj002 = imaal001 AND imaal002 =:DLANG
WHERE pmdjent = :ENT AND pmdjsite = :SITE ORDER BY pmdj002

WHERE pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdlsite = :SITE AND pmdlstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdl008

WHERE pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdl005 = '2' AND pmdlstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdl008

SELECT DISTINCT pmdl031 FROM pmdl_t
WHERE pmdlent = :ENT ORDER BY pmdl031
