zoom.desc: 采购单单号查询(采购收货据点为当前营运据点)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdl002,ooag011,pmdl003,ooefl003 FROM pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdlent AND ooag001 = pmdl002 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG,pmdn_t
WHERE pmdlent = pmdnent AND pmdldocno = pmdndocno AND pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdnunit= :SITE AND pmdlstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004 FROM pmdo_t,pmdn_t,pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdoent = pmdnent AND pmdodocno = pmdndocno AND pmdoseq = pmdnseq AND pmdnent = pmdlent AND pmdndocno = pmdldocno AND pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdl005 = '1' AND pmdl006 = '1' AND pmdnunit= 'arg1' AND pmdn045 = '1' AND pmdlstus = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pmem_t,pmel_t WHERE pmement = pmelent AND pmemdocno = pmeldocno AND pmelstus <> 'X' AND pmem001 = pmdodocno AND pmem002 = pmdoseq AND pmem003 = pmdoseq1 AND pmem004 = pmdoseq2) ORDER BY pmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdl002,oofa011,pmdl003,ooefl003 FROM pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = pmdlent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = pmdl002 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG,pmdn_t
WHERE pmdlent = pmdnent AND pmdldocno = pmdndocno AND pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdlstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdl004,pmaal004 FROM pmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdldocno IN (SELECT DISTINCT pmdt001 FROM pmds_t,pmdt_t WHERE pmdsent = pmdtent AND pmdsdocno = pmdtdocno AND pmdsent=:ENT AND (SELECT ooef017 FROM ooef_t WHERE ooefent = pmdsent AND ooef001 = pmdssite) = 'arg1' AND pmds001 BETWEEN 'arg2' AND 'arg3' AND pmds011 = 'arg4' AND pmds100 = '4') ORDER BY pmdldocno

zoom.desc: 采购单单号查询(采购收货据点为当前营运据点且可收货数量大于0)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdl002,oofa011,pmdl003,ooefl003,pmdl015,ooail003,pmdoseq,pmdoseq1,pmdoseq2,pmdo001,imaal003,imaal004,pmdo002,pmdo004,oocal003,pmdo006,pmdo015,pmdo016,pmdo017,pmdo040,pmdo019 FROM pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = pmdlent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = pmdl002 AND oofastus = 'Y' LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooail_t ON ooailent = pmdlent AND ooail001 = pmdl015 AND ooail002 = :DLANG,pmdn_t, pmdo_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdoent AND imaal001 = pmdo001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN oocal_t ON oocalent = pmdoent AND oocal001 = pmdo004 AND oocal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdlent = pmdnent AND pmdldocno = pmdndocno AND pmdoent = pmdnent AND pmdodocno = pmdndocno AND pmdoseq = pmdnseq AND pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdnunit= :SITE AND ((CASE WHEN pmdo006 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo006 END)-(CASE WHEN pmdo015 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo015 END)+(CASE WHEN pmdo016 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo016 END)+(CASE WHEN pmdo017 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo017 END))>0 AND pmdlstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdldocno

zoom.desc: 采购单单号查询(采购收货据点为当前营运据点且可收货数量大于0)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdl002,oofa011,pmdl003,ooefl003,pmdl015,pmdoseq,pmdoseq1,pmdoseq2,pmdo001,imaal003,imaal004,pmdo002,pmdo004,oocal003,pmdo006,pmdo015,pmdo016,pmdo017,pmdo040,pmdo019 FROM pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = pmdlent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = pmdl002 AND oofastus = 'Y' LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG,pmdn_t, pmdo_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdoent AND imaal001 = pmdo001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN oocal_t ON oocalent = pmdoent AND oocal001 = pmdo004 AND oocal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdlent = pmdnent AND pmdldocno = pmdndocno AND pmdoent = pmdnent AND pmdodocno = pmdndocno AND pmdoseq = pmdnseq AND pmdlent = :ENT AND ((CASE WHEN pmdo006 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo006 END)-(CASE WHEN pmdo015 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo015 END)+(CASE WHEN pmdo016 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo016 END)+(CASE WHEN pmdo017 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo017 END))>0 AND pmdlstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdldocno

zoom.desc: 来源采购单据查询 给应付模块使用查询单身

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdl005,pmdmdocno,pmdldocdt,pmdm001,pmdm006,pmdl046,b.gzcbl004,pmdl003,ooefl003,pmdm014 FROM (SELECT pmdl005,pmdmdocno,pmdldocdt,pmdm001,pmdm006,pmdl046,pmdl003, CASE WHEN pmdm005 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm005 END AS pmdm005, CASE WHEN pmdm008 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm008 END AS pmdm008, CASE WHEN pmdm010 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm010 END AS pmdm010, CASE WHEN pmdm012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm012 END AS pmdm012, pmdlent,pmdmsite,pmdm014 FROM pmdm_t,pmdl_t WHERE pmdment = :ENT AND pmdl021 = 'arg4' AND pmdment = pmdlent AND pmdmdocno = pmdldocno AND pmdlstus = 'Y' AND pmdldocdt <= 'arg3') LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '2052' AND a.gzcbl002 = pmdl005 AND a.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '8321' AND b.gzcbl002 = pmdl046 AND b.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND (( 1=arg2 AND pmdm005 > pmdm008) OR (2=arg2 AND pmdm005 > pmdm010) OR (3=arg2 AND pmdm005 > pmdm012)) ORDER BY pmdmdocno,pmdm001

zoom.desc: 来源采购单据查询 给应付模块使用查询单身

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdl005,a.gzcbl004,pmdmdocno,pmdldocdt,pmdm001,pmdm006,pmdl046,b.gzcbl004,pmdl003,ooefl003 FROM (SELECT pmdl005,pmdmdocno,pmdldocdt,pmdm001,pmdm006,pmdl046,pmdl003, CASE WHEN pmdm005 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm005 END AS pmdm005, CASE WHEN pmdm008 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm008 END AS pmdm008, CASE WHEN pmdm010 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm010 END AS pmdm010, CASE WHEN pmdm012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm012 END AS pmdm012, pmdlent,pmdmsite FROM pmdm_t,pmdl_t WHERE pmdment = :ENT AND pmdmsite IN (SELECT xrah004 from xrah_t WHERE xrah001 = '2' AND xrah002 IN arg1) AND pmdl021 = 'arg4' AND pmdment = pmdlent AND pmdmdocno = pmdldocno AND pmdlstus = 'Y' AND pmdldocdt <= 'arg3') LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '2052' AND a.gzcbl002 = pmdl005 AND a.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '8321' AND b.gzcbl002 = pmdl046 AND b.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND (( 1=arg2 AND pmdm005 > pmdm008) OR (2=arg2 AND pmdm005 > pmdm010) OR (3=arg2 AND pmdm005 > pmdm012)) ORDER BY pmdmdocno,pmdm001

SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdl002,oofa011,pmdl003,ooefl003 FROM pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = pmdlent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = pmdl002 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdlsite = :SITE AND pmdlstus = 'arg1' AND pmdlstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdldocno

zoom.desc: 来源采购单据查询 给应付模块使用查询单身

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdl005,a.gzcbl004,pmdldocno,pmdm001,pmdldocdt,pmdm006,pmdl046,b.gzcbl004,pmdl003,ooefl003,pmdl004,pmaal004 FROM (SELECT pmdl011,pmdl005,pmdldocno,pmdm001,pmdldocdt, (SELECT SUM(pmdm006) FROM pmdm_t WHERE pmdment=pmdlent AND pmdmdocno=pmdldocno AND pmdm014 IN ('1','2') AND pmdm007 IS NULL) AS pmdm006, pmdl046,pmdl003,pmdl004,pmdlent,pmdlsite,pmdlstus FROM pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmdm_t ON pmdlent=pmdment AND pmdldocno=pmdmdocno WHERE pmdlent = :ENT AND (( 1=arg1 AND pmdm005 > CASE WHEN pmdm008 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm008 END) OR (2=arg1 AND pmdm005 > CASE WHEN pmdm010 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm010 END) OR (3=arg1 AND pmdm005 > CASE WHEN pmdm012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdm012 END)) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM apca_t WHERE apcaent=pmdlent AND apca018=pmdldocno AND apca064=pmdm001) AND pmdm014 IN ('1','2') ) LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '2052' AND a.gzcbl002 = pmdl005 AND a.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '8321' AND b.gzcbl002 = pmdl046 AND b.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdlent = :ENT ORDER BY pmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdl002,ooag011,pmdl003,ooefl003 FROM pmdn_t, pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdlent AND ooag001 = pmdl002 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdnent = pmdlent AND pmdndocno = pmdldocno AND pmdlent = :ENT AND (pmdlstus = 'Y' AND pmdn045 <> '0' ) ORDER BY pmdldocno

zoom.desc: 采购单单号查询(采购收货据点为当前营运据点且可收货数量大于0)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdl002,oofa011,pmdl003,ooefl003,pmdl015,pmdoseq,pmdoseq1,pmdoseq2,pmdo001,imaal003,imaal004,pmdo002,pmdo004,oocal003,pmdo006,pmdo015,pmdo016,pmdo017,pmdo040,pmdo019 FROM pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = pmdlent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = pmdl002 AND oofastus = 'Y' LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG,pmdn_t, pmdo_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdoent AND imaal001 = pmdo001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN oocal_t ON oocalent = pmdoent AND oocal001 = pmdo004 AND oocal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdlent = pmdnent AND pmdldocno = pmdndocno AND pmdoent = pmdnent AND pmdodocno = pmdndocno AND pmdoseq = pmdnseq AND pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdnunit= :SITE AND ((CASE WHEN pmdo006 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo006 END)-(CASE WHEN pmdo015 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo015 END)+(CASE WHEN pmdo016 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo016 END)+(CASE WHEN pmdo017 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdo017 END))>0 AND pmdlstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdldocno

zoom.desc: 采购单单号查询(采购收货据点为当前营运据点)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdl002,ooag011,pmdl003,ooefl003 FROM pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdlent AND ooag001 = pmdl002 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG,pmdn_t,pmdo_t
WHERE pmdlent = pmdnent AND pmdldocno = pmdndocno AND pmdnent = pmdoent AND pmdndocno = pmdodocno AND pmdnseq = pmdoseq AND pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdnunit= :SITE AND pmdl005 = '1' AND pmdl006 = '1' AND pmdlstus ='Y' AND pmdlstus ='Y' AND pmdn045 = '1' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pmel_t,pmem_t WHERE pmelent = pmement AND pmeldocno = pmemdocno AND pmelstus != 'X' AND pmement = pmdoent AND pmem001 = pmdodocno AND pmem002 = pmdoseq ANd pmem003 = pmdoseq1 AND pmem004 = pmdoseq2) AND 0 < (COALESCE (pmdo006, 0)-COALESCE (pmdo015, 0)+ COALESCE (pmdo016, 0)-COALESCE ( ( SELECT COALESCE (SUM (pmdt020), 0) FROM pmds_t, pmdt_t WHERE pmdsent = pmdtent AND pmdsdocno = pmdtdocno AND (pmds000 = '1' OR pmds000 = '3') AND pmdsstus = 'N' AND pmdtent = pmdoent AND pmdt001 = pmdodocno AND pmdt002 = pmdoseq AND pmdt003 = pmdoseq1 AND pmdt004 = pmdoseq2 GROUP BY pmdtent, pmdt001,pmdt002, pmdt003, pmdt004),0)) ORDER BY pmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdoseq,pmdoseq1,pmdoseq2,pmdn200,pmdn001,imaal003,imaal004 FROM pmdo_t ,pmdn_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON pmdnent = imaalent AND pmdn001 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG ,pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdoent = pmdnent AND pmdodocno = pmdndocno AND pmdoseq = pmdnseq AND pmdnent = pmdlent AND pmdndocno = pmdldocno AND pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdl005 = '1' AND pmdl006 = '1' AND pmdnunit= 'arg1' AND pmdn045 = '1' AND pmdlstus = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pmem_t,pmel_t WHERE pmement = pmelent AND pmemdocno = pmeldocno AND pmelstus <> 'X' AND pmem001 = pmdodocno AND pmem002 = pmdoseq AND pmem003 = pmdoseq1 AND pmem004 = pmdoseq2) ORDER BY pmdldocno

zoom.desc: 采购单产品特征位数据查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdn002 FROM pmdn_t
WHERE pmdnent = :ENT ORDER BY pmdn002

SELECT DISTINCT pmdn023,pmaal004 FROM pmdn_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdnent AND pmaal001 = pmdn023 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdnent = :ENT AND pmdndocno = 'arg1' ORDER BY pmdn023

zoom.desc: 采购预付请款立账查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdmdocno,pmdm001,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdm005,pmdm006 FROM pmdl_t LEFT JOIN pmdm_t ON pmdlent = pmdment AND pmdldocno=pmdmdocno LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdlent AND pmaal001 = pmdl004 AND pmaal002=:DLANG
WHERE pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdldocdt<='arg1' AND ( pmdl004 = 'arg2' OR pmdl021 = 'arg2') AND pmdlstus='Y' AND pmdm007 IS NULL ORDER BY pmdmdocno

zoom.desc: 采购单交期明细料号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdo003,pmdo001,imaal003,imaal004 FROM pmdo_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdoent AND imaal001 = pmdo001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdoent = :ENT AND pmdosite = :SITE ORDER BY pmdo001

SELECT DISTINCT pmdodocno,pmdoseq,pmdoseq1,pmdoseq2,pmdo001,imaal003,imaal004,pmdo002,pmdo004,oocal003,pmdo006,pmdo015,pmdo016,pmdo017,pmdo040,pmdo019 FROM pmdo_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdoent AND imaal001 = pmdo001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN oocal_t ON oocalent = pmdoent AND oocal001 = pmdo004 AND oocal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdoent = :ENT AND pmdosite = :SITE AND pmdodocno = 'arg1' ORDER BY pmdodocno,pmdoseq,pmdoseq1,pmdoseq2

SELECT DISTINCT pmdp003,pmdp004,pmdp005 FROM pmdp_t
WHERE pmdpent = :ENT AND pmdpsite = :SITE ORDER BY pmdp003,pmdp004,pmdp005

SELECT DISTINCT pmdrdocno,pmdrsite,pmdrdocdt,pmdr001,pmdr011 FROM pmdr_t
WHERE 1=1 AND pmdrent=:ENT ORDER BY pmdrdocno,pmdrsite,pmdrdocdt,pmdr001,pmdr011

SELECT DISTINCT pmds010 FROM pmds_t
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmdsstus='Y' ORDER BY pmds010

SELECT DISTINCT pmds010 FROM pmds_t
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdsstus='Y' ORDER BY pmds010

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmds026 FROM pmds_t
WHERE pmds026 IS NOT NULL AND pmdsent = :ENT ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmds041,pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds006,pmds007,pmaal003 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdsent = pmaalent AND pmds007 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmds000 = 'arg1' ORDER BY pmds041

SELECT DISTINCT pmds041,pmds000,pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds006,pmds007,pmaal003 FROM ( SELECT pmdsent,pmds000,pmds041,pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds006,pmds007,pmaal003 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdsent = pmaalent AND pmds007 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmds000 IN ('3','4','6','7','12','14') AND pmds041 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xmdkent,xmdk000,xmdk035,xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk006,xmdk007,pmaal003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON xmdkent = pmaalent AND xmdk007 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdk000 = '6' AND xmdk035 IS NOT NULL)
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT ORDER BY pmds041

SELECT DISTINCT pmds041,pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds006,pmds007,pmaal003 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdsent = pmaalent AND pmds007 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG ,icaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN icab_t ON icabent = icaaent AND icab001 = icaa001 AND icab002 = 0
WHERE pmdsent = icaaent AND icaaent = :ENT AND pmds053 = icaa001 AND pmds041 IS NOT NULL AND (icaa003 = '2' OR icaa003 = '3') AND icaa004 = '2' AND icaa005 = 'Y' AND icab003 = :SITE AND pmds041 NOT IN (SELECT pmds041 FROM pmds_t WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmds000 = 'arg1' AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmdsdocno = COALESCE('arg2',' ') AND pmds041 IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY pmds041

SELECT DISTINCT pmds042 FROM pmds_t
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE ORDER BY pmds042

SELECT DISTINCT pmds055 FROM pmds_t
WHERE pmdsent=:ENT AND pmdssite=:SITE ORDER BY pmds055

SELECT DISTINCT pmds201,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmdsstus FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001= pmds002
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmds000='arg1' ORDER BY pmds201,pmdsdocdt

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003,pmds008,pmaal004 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001= pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdsent = pmaalent AND ( pmds008 = pmaal001) AND pmaal002 = :DLANG, pmdt_t
WHERE pmdsent = pmdtent AND pmdsdocno = pmdtdocno AND pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmds000 IN arg1 AND (pmdsstus = 'Y' OR pmdsstus = 'S') ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003,pmds008,pmaal004 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001= pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdsent = pmaalent AND ( pmds008 = pmaal001) AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmdsstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001 = pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmdsstus NOT IN ('N','X') AND pmdsstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003,pmds008,pmaal004 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001= pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdsent = pmaalent AND ( pmds008 = pmaal001) AND pmaal002 = :DLANG, pmdt_t
WHERE pmdsent = pmdtent AND pmdsdocno = pmdtdocno AND pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmds000='5' AND (pmdsstus = 'Y' OR pmdsstus = 'S') ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmds007,pmaal004,pmds037,pmds044 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdsent AND pmaal001 = pmds007 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent=:ENT AND (SELECT ooef017 FROM ooef_t WHERE ooefent = pmdsent AND ooef001 = pmdssite) = 'arg1' AND pmds001 BETWEEN 'arg2' AND 'arg3' AND pmds011 = 'arg4' AND pmds100 = '4' ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003,pmds008,pmaal004 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001= pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdsent = pmaalent AND ( pmds008 = pmaal001) AND pmaal002 = :DLANG, pmdt_t
WHERE pmdsent = pmdtent AND pmdsdocno = pmdtdocno AND pmdsent = :ENT AND pmds000 IN arg1 AND (pmdsstus = 'Y' OR pmdsstus = 'S') ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001 = pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmdsstus = 'S' AND pmds000 IN arg1 AND pmdsstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001 = pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmdsstus = 'Y' AND pmds000 IN arg1 AND pmdsstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001= pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmdsstus = 'S' AND pmds000 IN arg1 ORDER BY pmdsdocno

zoom.desc: 采购入库/仓退/销退单号查询(For aicp570)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmds000,pmdssite,ooefl003,pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds007,pmaal004,pmds041 FROM ( SELECT pmds000,pmdsent,pmdssite,ooefl003,pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds007,pmaal004,pmds041,pmdsstus FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmdssite AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdsent AND pmaal001 = pmds007 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG WHERE pmds000 IN ('3','4','6','7','12','14') AND pmds041 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xmdk000,xmdkent,xmdksite,ooefl003,xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk007,pmaal004,xmdk035,xmdkstus FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdksite AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = xmdkent AND pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG WHERE xmdk000 = '6' AND xmdk035 IS NOT NULL)
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdsstus = 'S' ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmds000,gzcbl004,pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds001,pmds008,pmaal004 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '2060' AND gzcbl002 = pmds000 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdsent AND pmaal001 = pmds008 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND pmdsent = :ENT ORDER BY pmdsdocno,pmds001

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003,pmds008,pmaal004 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001= pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdsent = pmaalent AND ( pmds008 = pmaal001) AND pmaal002 = :DLANG, pmdt_t
WHERE pmdsent = pmdtent AND pmdsdocno = pmdtdocno AND pmdsent = :ENT AND pmds000 IN arg1 AND (pmdsstus = 'Y' OR pmdsstus = 'S') ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001= pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG, pmdt_t
WHERE pmdsent = pmdtent AND pmdsdocno = pmdtdocno AND pmdsent = :ENT AND pmds000 IN arg1 AND (pmdsstus = 'Y' OR pmdsstus = 'S') ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001= pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmds000 IN ('1','2') AND (pmdsstus = 'Y' OR pmdsstus = 'S') AND pmds011 IN ('1','2') AND pmds053 IS NOT NULL AND pmds041 IS NULL AND pmds014 IN ('1','2','3','8') AND pmds053 IN (SELECT icaa001 FROM icaa_t WHERE icaaent = :ENT AND (icaa003 = '3' OR (icaa003 = '2' AND icaa004 = '1'))) UNION SELECT DISTINCT pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl002,ooag011,pmdl003,ooefl003 FROM pmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdlent AND ooag001 = pmdl002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdlent AND ooefl001 = pmdl003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG WHERE pmdlent = :ENT AND pmdlsite = :SITE AND pmdl005 IN ('1','2') AND pmdlstus = 'Y' AND pmdl051 IS NOT NULL AND pmdl031 IS NOT NULL AND pmdl006 IN ('1','2','3','8') AND pmdl051 IN (SELECT icaa001 FROM icaa_t WHERE icaaent = :ENT AND (icaa003 = '3' OR (icaa003 = '2' AND icaa004 = '1'))) )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY pmdsdocno

zoom.desc: 入库单参考单号立账查询 for 应付模块查询用

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmds000,a.gzcbl004,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,imaal003,pmdt001,pmds011,b.gzcbl004,pmdt039,pmds008,pmaal004 FROM (SELECT pmds000,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,pmdt001,pmds011,pmdt039,pmds008, CASE WHEN pmdt024 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt024 END AS pmdt024, CASE WHEN pmdt056 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt056 END AS pmdt056, CASE WHEN pmdt057 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt057 END AS pmdt057, CASE WHEN pmdt058 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt058 END AS pmdt058, pmdtsite,pmdsstus,pmdtent,pmdtseq,pmds100 FROM pmds_t,pmdt_t WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdtsite IN (SELECT xrah004 from xrah_t WHERE xrah001 = '2' AND xrah002 = 'arg1') AND pmdtent = pmdsent AND pmdtdocno = pmdsdocno AND pmds001 <= 'arg3') LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '2060' AND a.gzcbl002 = pmds000 AND a.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '2052' AND b.gzcbl002 = pmds011 AND b.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdtent AND pmaal001 = pmds008 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND (( 1=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt056) OR (2=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt057) OR (3=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt058)) ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdtseq,pmdt006,imaal003,imaal004,pmds037,pmdt039 FROM pmds_t,pmdt_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent = pmdtent AND pmdsdocno = pmdtdocno AND pmdsent=:ENT AND (SELECT ooef017 FROM ooef_t WHERE ooefent = pmdsent AND ooef001 = pmdssite) = 'arg1' AND pmds001 BETWEEN 'arg2' AND 'arg3' AND pmds011 = 'arg4' AND pmds100 = '4' ORDER BY pmdsdocno,pmdtseq

SELECT DISTINCT pmdt070 FROM pmdt_t
WHERE pmdtent=:ENT AND pmdtsite=:SITE ORDER BY pmdt070

zoom.desc: 入库单立账查询 for 应付模块

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdtseq,pmds000,pmds001,pmdt006,imaal003,pmdt001,pmds011,pmdt039,pmds008,pmaal004,pmdt084 FROM (SELECT pmds000,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,pmdt001,pmds011,pmdt039,pmds008, CASE WHEN pmdt024 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt024 END AS pmdt024, CASE WHEN pmdt056 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt056 END AS pmdt056, CASE WHEN pmdt057 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt057 END AS pmdt057, CASE WHEN pmdt058 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt058 END AS pmdt058, pmdtsite,pmdsstus,pmdtent,pmdtseq,pmds100,pmdt084,pmds028 FROM pmds_t,pmdt_t WHERE pmds000 IN (arg6) AND pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdtsite IN ('arg1') AND pmds008 = 'arg4' AND pmdtent = pmdsent AND pmdtdocno = pmdsdocno AND pmds001 <= 'arg3') LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdtent AND pmaal001 = pmds008 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND (( 1=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt056) OR (2=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt057) OR (3=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt058)) ORDER BY pmdsdocno

zoom.desc: 入库单立账查询(应付模块单头用)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmds000,a.gzcbl004,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt001,pmds011,b.gzcbl004,pmdt039,pmds008,pmaal004,pmdt084 FROM (SELECT pmds000,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,pmdt001,pmds011,pmdt039,pmds008,pmds037,pmds033, CASE WHEN pmdt024 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt024 END AS pmdt024, CASE WHEN pmdt056 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt056 END AS pmdt056, CASE WHEN pmdt057 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt057 END AS pmdt057, CASE WHEN pmdt058 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt058 END AS pmdt058, pmdtsite,pmdsstus,pmdtent,pmdtseq,pmds100,pmdt084 FROM pmds_t,pmdt_t WHERE pmds000 IN (arg6) AND pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdtsite IN arg1 AND pmds008 = 'arg4' AND pmdtent = pmdsent AND pmdtdocno = pmdsdocno AND pmds001 <= 'arg3') LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '2060' AND a.gzcbl002 = pmds000 AND a.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '2052' AND b.gzcbl002 = pmds011 AND b.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdtent AND pmaal001 = pmds008 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND (( 1=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt056) OR (2=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt057) OR (3=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt058)) ORDER BY pmdsdocno

zoom.desc: 入库单立账查询 for 应付模块查询用

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmds000,a.gzcbl004,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,imaal003,pmdt001,pmds011,b.gzcbl004,pmdt039,pmds008,pmaal004 FROM (SELECT pmds000,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,pmdt001,pmds011,pmdt039,pmds008, CASE WHEN pmdt024 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt024 END AS pmdt024, CASE WHEN pmdt056 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt056 END AS pmdt056, CASE WHEN pmdt057 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt057 END AS pmdt057, CASE WHEN pmdt058 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt058 END AS pmdt058, pmdtsite,pmdsstus,pmdtent,pmdtseq,pmds100 FROM pmds_t,pmdt_t WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdtsite IN (SELECT xrah004 from xrah_t WHERE xrah001 = '2' AND xrah002 = 'arg1') AND pmdtent = pmdsent AND pmdtdocno = pmdsdocno AND pmds001 <= 'arg3') LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '2060' AND a.gzcbl002 = pmds000 AND a.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '2052' AND b.gzcbl002 = pmds011 AND b.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdtent AND pmaal001 = pmds008 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND (( 1=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt056) OR (2=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt057) OR (3=arg2 AND pmdt024 > pmdt058)) ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdtseq,pmdt006,imaal003,imaal004,pmdsdocdt,pmds002,ooag011,pmds003,ooefl003 FROM pmds_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = pmdsent AND ooag001= pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG, pmdt_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdssite = :SITE AND pmdsdocno = pmdtdocno AND pmds000 IN arg1 AND pmdt026='Y' AND (pmdt020 - pmdt053) > 0 AND pmdsstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdsdocno

zoom.desc: 入库单立账查询 for 应付模块查询用

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmds000,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,imaal003,pmdt001,pmds011,pmdt039,pmds008,pmaal004 FROM (SELECT pmds000,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,pmdt001,pmds011,pmdt039,pmds008,pmds037,pmds033,CASE WHEN pmdt024 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt024 END AS pmdt024, CASE WHEN pmdt056 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt056 END AS pmdt056,CASE WHEN pmdt057 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt057 END AS pmdt057, CASE WHEN pmdt058 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt058 END AS pmdt058,CASE WHEN pmdt066 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt066 END AS pmdt066, CASE WHEN pmdt067 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt067 END AS pmdt067, CASE WHEN pmdt068 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt068 END AS pmdt068, CASE WHEN pmdt069 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt069 END AS pmdt069, pmdtsite,pmdsstus,pmdtent,pmdtseq,pmds100,pmdt084,pmds006 FROM pmds_t,pmdt_t WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdtent = pmdsent AND pmdtdocno = pmdsdocno) LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdtent AND pmaal001 = pmds008 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND (( 1=arg1 AND pmdt024 > (pmdt056+pmdt066)) OR (2=arg1 AND pmdt024 > (pmdt057+pmdt067)) OR (3=arg1 AND pmdt024 > (pmdt058+pmdt068))) ORDER BY pmdsdocno

zoom.desc: 入库单立账查询(应付模块单头用)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdtseq,pmds001,pmdt006,imaal003,pmds006,pmdt001,pmdt046,pmds037,pmdt019,pmdt036,pmdt020,pmdt038,pmdt039,pmdt047 FROM pmds_t,pmdt_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdtent = pmdsent AND pmdtdocno = pmdsdocno AND pmdsstus = 'S' AND (pmdt020-pmdt069>0 OR pmdt069 IS NULL) AND pmdtsite IN arg1 AND pmds008 = 'arg2' AND pmds000 IN arg3 AND pmdt046 = 'arg4' ORDER BY pmdsdocno

zoom.desc: 入库/退库单_AP立账_暂估用

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdsdocno,pmdtseq,a.gzcbl004,pmds001,pmdt006,imaal003,pmdt001,pmds011,b.gzcbl004,pmdt039,pmds008,pmaal004,pmds000,pmdt084 FROM (SELECT pmds000,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,pmdt001,pmds011,pmdt039,pmds008, CASE WHEN pmdt024 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt024 END AS pmdt024, CASE WHEN pmdt056 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt056 END AS pmdt056, CASE WHEN pmdt057 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt067 END AS pmdt057, CASE WHEN pmdt058 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt068 END AS pmdt058, CASE WHEN pmdt066 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt066 END AS pmdt066, CASE WHEN pmdt067 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt067 END AS pmdt067, CASE WHEN pmdt068 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt068 END AS pmdt068, pmdtsite,pmdsstus,pmdtent,pmdtseq,pmds100,pmdt084,pmds028 FROM pmds_t,pmdt_t WHERE pmds000 IN (arg6) AND pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdtsite IN ('arg1') AND pmds008 = 'arg4' AND pmdtent = pmdsent AND pmdtdocno = pmdsdocno AND pmds001 <= 'arg3') LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '2060' AND a.gzcbl002 = pmds000 AND a.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '2052' AND b.gzcbl002 = pmds011 AND b.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdtent AND pmaal001 = pmds008 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND (( 1=arg2 AND pmdt024 > (pmdt066+pmdt056)) OR (2=arg2 AND pmdt024 > (pmdt067+pmdt057)) OR (3=arg2 AND pmdt024 >(pmdt068+pmdt058))) ORDER BY pmdsdocno

zoom.desc: 入库单立账查询 for 应付模块查询用

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmds000,a.gzcbl004,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,imaal003,pmdt001,pmds011,b.gzcbl004,pmdt039,pmds008,pmaal004 FROM (SELECT pmds000,pmdsdocno,pmds001,pmdt006,pmdt001,pmds011,pmdt039,pmds008,CASE WHEN pmdt024 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt024 END AS pmdt024, CASE WHEN pmdt056 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt056 END AS pmdt056,CASE WHEN pmdt057 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt057 END AS pmdt057, CASE WHEN pmdt058 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt058 END AS pmdt058,CASE WHEN pmdt066 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt066 END AS pmdt066, CASE WHEN pmdt067 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt067 END AS pmdt067, CASE WHEN pmdt068 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE pmdt068 END AS pmdt068, pmdtsite,pmdsstus,pmdtent,pmdtseq,pmds100,pmdt084,pmds033 FROM pmds_t,pmdt_t WHERE pmdsent = :ENT AND pmdtent = pmdsent AND pmdtdocno = pmdsdocno) LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '2060' AND a.gzcbl002 = pmds000 AND a.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '2052' AND b.gzcbl002 = pmds011 AND b.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmdtent AND pmaal001 = pmds008 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND (( 1=arg1 AND pmdt024 > pmdt056) OR (2=arg1 AND pmdt024 > pmdt057) OR (3=arg1 AND pmdt024 > pmdt058)) ORDER BY pmdsdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmdtdocno,pmdtseq,pmdt200,pmdt006,imaal003,imaal004 FROM pmdt_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON pmdtent = imaalent AND pmdt006 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdtent = :ENT AND pmdtdocno = 'arg1' ORDER BY pmdtdocno,pmdtseq

SELECT DISTINCT pmdtdocno,pmdtseq,pmdt006,imaal003,imaal004,pmdt020,pmdt053,pmdt054,pmdt055 FROM pmdt_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmdtent AND imaal001 = pmdt006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdtent = :ENT AND pmdtsite = :SITE AND pmdtdocno = 'arg1' ORDER BY pmdtdocno,pmdtseq

SELECT DISTINCT pmdv011,pmdsdocno,pmds002,oofa011,pmds003,ooefl003 FROM pmdv_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmds_t ON pmdsent = pmdvent AND pmdsdocno = pmdvdocno LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = pmdsent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003= pmds002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmdsent AND ooefl001 = pmds003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND pmdvent = :ENT AND pmdvsite = :SITE ORDER BY pmdv011

SELECT DISTINCT pmdxdocno,pmdxdocdt,pmdxstus,pmdx002,ooag011,pmdx003,ooefl003,pmdx004,pmaal004 FROM pmdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooag001 = pmdx002 AND ooagent = :ENT LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = pmdx003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = pmdx004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdxent = :ENT AND pmdxsite = :SITE AND pmdxstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdxdocno

zoom.desc: 采购合同单号开窗(不过滤采购组织)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmdxdocno,pmdxdocdt,pmdxstus,pmdx002,oofa011,pmdx003,ooefl003,pmdx004,pmaal004 FROM pmdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = pmdx002 AND oofaent = :ENT LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = pmdx003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = :ENT AND pmaal001 = pmdx004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmdxent = :ENT AND pmdxstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmdxdocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmee208 FROM pmee_t
WHERE pmeeent = :ENT AND pmeesite = :SITE AND pmeestus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmee208

SELECT DISTINCT pmeedocno,pmeedocdt,pmee004,pmaal004,pmee002,oofa011,pmee003,ooefl003 FROM pmee_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = pmeeent AND pmaal001 = pmee004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = pmeeent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = pmee002 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = pmeeent AND ooefl001 = pmee003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmeeent = :ENT AND pmeesite = :SITE AND pmeestus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmeedocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmeldocno,pmeldocdt,pmel004,ooag011,pmel005,ooefl003,pmel002,pmel006,t1.pmaal004,pmel007,t2.pmaal004 FROM pmel_t left outer join ooag_t ON pmelent = ooagent AND pmel004 = ooag001 left outer join ooefl_t ON pmelent = ooeflent AND pmelsite = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG left outer join pmaal_t t1 ON pmelent = t1.pmaalent AND pmel006 = t1.pmaal001 AND t1.pmaal002 = :DLANG left outer join pmaal_t t2 ON pmelent = t2.pmaalent AND pmel007 = t2.pmaal001 AND t2.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmelent = :ENT AND pmel000 = 'arg1' AND pmelstus = 'Y' AND pmelsite ='arg2' ORDER BY pmeldocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmeldocno,pmeldocdt,pmel006,t1.pmaal004,pmel007,t2.pmaal004,pmel002,pmel003,oocql004 FROM pmel_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON pmelent = ooagent AND pmel004 = ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON pmelent = ooeflent AND pmelsite = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t t1 ON pmelent = t1.pmaalent AND pmel006 = t1.pmaal001 AND t1.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t t2 ON pmelent = t2.pmaalent AND pmel007 = t2.pmaal001 AND t2.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON pmelent = oocqlent AND oocql001 = '274' AND oocql002 = pmel003 AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE pmelent = :ENT AND pmel000 = 'arg1' AND pmelstus = 'Y' AND pmelsite ='arg2' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pmds_t WHERE pmdsent = pmelent AND pmds200 = pmeldocno AND pmdsstus != 'X' ) ORDER BY pmeldocno

SELECT DISTINCT pmen001,pmenl003 FROM pmen_t LEFT JOIN pmenl_t ON pmenent = pmenlent AND pmensite = pmenlsite AND pmen001 = pmenl001 AND pmenl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmenent = :ENT AND pmensite = 'arg1'AND pmenstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmen001

SELECT DISTINCT pmeo002 FROM pmeo_t
WHERE pmeoent = :ENT AND pmeosite = :SITE AND pmeo000 = '1' ORDER BY pmeo002

zoom.desc: 采购合同/核价结算来源单据查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT pmeo003,pmeo004,pmds000 FROM pmeo_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmds_t ON pmeoent=pmdsent AND pmeo003 = pmdsdocno
WHERE pmeoent=:ENT AND pmeosite=:SITE ORDER BY pmeo003,pmeo004

SELECT DISTINCT pmeq001,pmeql003,pmequnit,ooefl003,pmeq002,rtaal003 FROM pmeq_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmeql_t ON pmeqent = pmeqlent AND pmeq001 = pmeql001 AND pmeql002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON pmeqent = ooeflent AND pmequnit = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaal_t ON pmeqent = rtaalent AND pmeq002 = rtaal001 AND rtaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmeqent = :ENT AND pmeqstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmeq001

SELECT DISTINCT pmevdocno,pmevdocdt,pmev003,pmaal004,pmev001,ooag011,pmev002,ooefl003 FROM pmev_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmevent = pmaalent AND pmev003 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON pmevent = ooagent AND pmev001 = ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON pmevent = ooeflent AND pmev002 = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE pmevent = :ENT AND pmevsite = :SITE AND pmevstus = 'Y' ORDER BY pmevdocdt

SELECT DISTINCT pmex001,pmex002,imaal003,imaal004 FROM ( SELECT pmex001,pmex002,imaal003,imaal004 FROM pmex_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = pmexent AND imaal001=pmex002 AND imaal002=:DLANG WHERE pmexent =:ENT AND pmexsite=:SITE AND pmex001 ='1' UNION SELECT pmex001,pmex002,rtaxl003 imaal003,'' imaal004 FROM pmex_t LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON rtaxlent = pmexent AND rtaxl001=pmex002 AND rtaxl002=:DLANG WHERE pmexent =:ENT AND pmexsite=:SITE AND pmex001 ='2' UNION SELECT pmex001,pmex002,oocql004 imaal003,'' imaal004 FROM pmex_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = pmexent AND oocql001='2003' AND oocql002=pmex002 AND oocql003=:DLANG WHERE pmexent =:ENT AND pmexsite=:SITE AND pmex001 ='3' )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY pmex001,pmex002

SELECT DISTINCT prba001,ooefl003 FROM prba_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON prba001 = ooefl001 AND prbaent=:ENT AND ooefl002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooef_t ON prba001 = ooef001 AND prbaent=ooefent
WHERE prbaent=:ENT AND ooefstus='Y' ORDER BY prba001

SELECT DISTINCT prba002,prba003 FROM prba_t
WHERE prbaent = :ENT AND 1=1 AND prbastus='Y' ORDER BY prba002

SELECT DISTINCT prbbdocno,prbbdocdt,prbb006,prbbstus FROM prbb_t
WHERE 1=1 AND prbbent = :ENT AND prbbstus='Y' ORDER BY prbbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT prbbsite,prbbdocno,prbbdocdt,prbb002,prbb003,prbb006,prbb007 FROM prbb_t
WHERE prbbent = :ENT AND prbbstus='Y' AND prbbstus='Y' ORDER BY prbbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT prbddocno,prbddocdt,prbd007,prbdstus FROM prbd_t
WHERE prbdent = :ENT AND 1=1 AND prbdstus='Y' ORDER BY prbddocno

SELECT DISTINCT prbfdocno,prbfdocdt,prbf004,pmaal004,prbf005,prbf010,oofa011 FROM prbf_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON prbfent = pmaalent AND prbf004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON prbfent = oofaent AND prbf010 = oofa003 AND oofa002 = '2'
WHERE 1=1 AND prbf001 = 'arg1' ORDER BY prbfdocno

SELECT DISTINCT prbfdocno,prbfdocdt FROM prbf_t
WHERE 1=1 AND prbfent = :ENT AND prbfstus='Y' ORDER BY prbfdocno

zoom.desc: 调价制定组织查询开窗

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT prbfsite,ooefl003 FROM prbf_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON prbfent = ooeflent AND prbfsite = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND prbfsite IN (SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t START WITH ooed005='arg1' AND ooed001='arg2' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) CONNECT BY nocycle PRIOR ooed004=ooed005 AND ooed001='arg2' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) UNION SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t WHERE ooed004='arg1' ) ORDER BY prbfsite

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,rtdx002,imaal003,imaal004,imaa009,rtaxl003 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaf_t ON rtdxent = imafent AND rtdxsite = imafsite AND rtdx001 = imaf001, imaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaa001 = imaal001 AND imaaent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON imaaent = rtaxlent AND imaa009 = rtaxl001 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxent = imaaent AND rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND rtdxsite='arg1' AND imaa009 IN (SELECT DISTINCT rtax001 FROM rtax_t WHERE rtax005 = 0 START WITH rtax003 = 'arg2' CONNECT BY nocycle PRIOR rtax001 = rtax003 UNION SELECT rtax001 FROM rtax_t WHERE rtaxent = :ENT AND rtax001 = 'arg2') AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

WHERE rmdaent = :ENT AND rmdasite = :SITE AND rmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY rmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT rmdadocno,rmdadocdt,rmda002,ooag011,rmda003,ooefl003,rmda007,pmaal004 FROM rmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON rmdaent = ooagent AND rmda002 = ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = rmdaent AND pmaal001 = rmda007 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = rmdaent AND ooefl001 = rmda003 AND ooefl002 = :LANG ,rmdb_t
WHERE rmdaent = :ENT AND rmdaent = rmdbent AND rmdadocno = rmdbdocno AND rmdastus = 'S' ORDER BY rmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT rmdadocno,rmdbseq,rmdadocdt,rmda002,ooag011,rmda003,ooefl003,rmda007,pmaal004 FROM rmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON rmdaent = ooagent AND rmda002 = ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = rmdaent AND pmaal001 = rmda007 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = rmdaent AND ooefl001 = rmda003 AND ooefl002 = :LANG ,rmdb_t , rmba_t a
WHERE rmdaent = :ENT AND rmdaent = rmdbent AND rmdadocno = rmdbdocno AND rmdbent = rmbaent AND rmdb001 = rmbadocno AND rmba000 = (SELECT MAX (rmba000) FROM rmba_t WHERE rmbadocno = a.rmbadocno AND rmbaent = a.rmbaent) AND rmdastus = 'S' AND rmda007 ='arg1' AND rmda008='arg2' AND rmba006 ='arg3' AND rmba010='arg4' ORDER BY rmdadocno,rmdbseq

WHERE rtaaent=rtakent AND rtaa001=rtak001 AND rtak002= 'arg1' AND rtak003='Y' AND rtaaent = :ENT AND rtaaent = rtabent AND rtaa001 = rtab001 AND rtaastus = 'Y' AND rtab002 IN (SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t START WITH ooed005='arg2' AND ooed001='arg3' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) CONNECT BY nocycle PRIOR ooed004=ooed005 AND ooed001='arg3' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) UNION SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t WHERE ooed004='arg2' ) ORDER BY rtaa001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,imaal003,imaal004,imaal005 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG

WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxent = imaaent AND rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND rtdxsite IN (SELECT rtab002 FROM rtab_t WHERE rtabent = :ENT AND rtab001 = 'arg1') AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT imay001,imay003,imaal003,imaal004,imaa009,rtaxl003 FROM imay_t,imaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaa001 = imaal001 AND imaaent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON imaaent = rtaxlent AND imaa009 = rtaxl001 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG,rtdx_t
WHERE imayent = :ENT AND rtdxent = imaaent AND rtdxent = imayent AND rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdx001 = imay001 AND rtdxsite='arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND imaystus = 'Y' AND imaa009 IN (SELECT DISTINCT rtax001 FROM rtax_t WHERE rtax005 = 0 AND rtax002 = '2' START WITH rtax003 IN (SELECT prbs001 FROM prbs_t,rtax_t WHERE prbsent = rtaxent AND prbs001 = rtax001 AND prbsent = :ENT AND prbsstus = 'Y' AND rtax004 = 'arg2') CONNECT BY nocycle PRIOR rtax001 = rtax003 UNION SELECT rtax001 FROM rtax_t WHERE rtax001 IN (SELECT prbs001 FROM prbs_t,rtax_t WHERE prbsent = rtaxent AND prbs001 = rtax001 AND prbsent = :ENT AND prbsstus = 'Y' AND rtax004 = 'arg2') AND rtax002 = '2') ORDER BY imay001,imay003

WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxent = imaaent AND rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND rtdxsite='arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND imaaent = rtdxent AND imaa001 = rtdx001 AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND rtdx001 NOT IN(SELECT rtke004 FROM rtke_t WHERE rtkeent = :ENT AND ((rtke001 = '1' AND rtke002 = 'arg2') OR (rtke001 = '2' AND rtke002 = 'arg1')) AND rtkestus = 'Y') ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,imaal003,imaal004,imaal005 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG,imaa_t
WHERE rtdxent = imaaent AND rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' AND imaa004 = 'E' AND rtdxstus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,imaal003,imaal004,imaal005,rtdx002,imaa009 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxent = imaaent LEFT OUTER JOIN imaf_t ON rtdxent = imafent AND rtdxsite = imafsite AND rtdx001 = imaf001
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND (imaf153 IS NULL OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM stan_t,star_t,stas_t WHERE stan001 = star004 AND star001 = stas001 AND starsite = stassite AND starsite = rtdxsite AND stas003 =rtdx001 AND star003 = imaf153 AND starstus = 'Y' AND 'arg2' between stan017 AND stan018 AND imaf153 IS NOT NULL )) ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,rtdx002,imaal003,imaal004,imaa009,rtaxl003 FROM rtdx_t,imaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaa001 = imaal001 AND imaaent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON imaaent = rtaxlent AND imaa009 = rtaxl001 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxent = imaaent AND rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND rtdxsite='arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT imay001,imay003,imaal003,imaal004,imaa009,rtaxl003 FROM imay_t,imaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaa001 = imaal001 AND imaaent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON imaaent = rtaxlent AND imaa009 = rtaxl001 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG,rtdx_t
WHERE imayent = :ENT AND rtdxent = imaaent AND rtdxent = imayent AND rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdx001 = imay001 AND rtdxsite='arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND imaystus = 'Y' AND imaa009 IN (SELECT DISTINCT rtax001 FROM rtax_t WHERE rtax005 = 0 START WITH rtax003 ='arg2' CONNECT BY nocycle PRIOR rtax001 = rtax003 UNION SELECT rtax001 FROM rtax_t WHERE rtax001 ='arg2') ORDER BY imay001,imay003

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,imaal003,imaal004,imaal005 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxstus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx_t.rtdx001,imaal_t.imaal003 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = :ENT AND imaal002=:DLANG AND imaalent= :ENT LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxent = :ENT
WHERE 1=1 AND rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx_t.rtdx001,imaal_t.imaal003 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = :ENT AND imaal002=:DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND rtdxstus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,imaal003,imaal004,imaal005,rtdx002,imaa009 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxent = imaaent
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,imaal003,imaal004,imaal005,rtdx002,imaa009 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxent = imaaent
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,imaal003 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,rtdx002,imaal003,imaal004,imaa009 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxent = imaaent
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxsite=:SITE AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,rtdx002,imaal003,imaal004,imaa009,rtaxl003 FROM rtdx_t,imaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaa001 = imaal001 AND imaaent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON imaaent = rtaxlent AND imaa009 = rtaxl001 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxent = imaaent AND rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND rtdxsite='arg1' AND imaa009 = 'arg2' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,rtdx002,imaal003,imaal004,imaa009,rtaxl003 FROM rtdx_t,imaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaa001 = imaal001 AND imaaent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON imaaent = rtaxlent AND imaa009 = rtaxl001 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxent = imaaent AND rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND rtdxsite IN (SELECT rtab002 FROM rtab_t WHERE rtabent = :ENT AND rtab001 = 'arg1') AND imaa009 = 'arg2' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx001,rtdx002,imaal003,imaal004,imaa009,rtaxl003 FROM rtdx_t,imaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaa001 = imaal001 AND imaaent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON imaaent = rtaxlent AND imaa009 = rtaxl001 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxent = imaaent AND rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxsite='arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT rtdx002,rtdx001,imaal004,imaal005,imaa009,imaal003 FROM rtdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON rtdx001 = imaal001 AND rtdxent = imaalent AND imaal002=:DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON rtdx001 = imaa001 AND rtdxent = imaaent LEFT OUTER JOIN imay_t ON rtdx001 = imay001 AND rtdxent = imayent AND rtdx002=imay003 LEFT OUTER JOIN imaf_t ON rtdx001 = imaf001 AND rtdxent = imafent AND rtdxsite = imafsite
WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaystus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' AND imafstus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

WHERE rtdxent = :ENT AND rtdxsite = 'arg1' AND rtdxstus='Y' AND imaystus='Y' AND imaastus='Y' ORDER BY rtdx001

SELECT DISTINCT oodb002,oodbl004 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT oodb002,oodbl004 FROM oodb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oodbl_t ON oodb001 = oodbl001 AND oodb002 = oodbl002 AND oodblent = :ENT AND oodbl001 = 'arg1' AND oodbl003 = :DLANG WHERE oodb001 = 'arg1' UNION SELECT DISTINCT oodc002,oodbl004 FROM oodc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oodbl_t ON oodc001 = oodbl001 AND oodc002 = oodbl002 AND oodblent = :ENT AND oodbl001 = 'arg1' AND oodbl003 = :DLANG WHERE oodc001 = 'arg1' )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY oodb002

SELECT DISTINCT rtdy001,rtdyl003,rtdy002,rtdy003 FROM rtdy_t LEFT OUTER JOIN rtdyl_t ON rtdyl001 = rtdy001 AND rtdyent = rtdylent AND rtdyl002 = :LANG
WHERE rtdyent = :ENT ORDER BY rtdy001

SELECT DISTINCT rtia002,pmaal003,rtiasite,rtiadocdt,rtiadocno,rtibseq,rtib004,imaal003,rtib028,rtib021,rtiborga FROM ( SELECT rtia002,pmaal003,rtiasite,ooefl003,rtiadocdt, rtiadocno,rtibseq,rtib004,imaal003,rtib028,rtib021,rtiborga,rtibsite, CASE WHEN 'arg2' = '1' THEN rtib017 /* - rtib031 */ WHEN 'arg2' = '2' THEN rtib017 /* - rtib032 */ WHEN 'arg2' = '3' THEN rtib017 /* - rtib033 */ END rtib017 FROM rtia_t,rtib_t,pmaal_t,ooefl_t,imaal_t WHERE rtiadocno = rtibdocno AND rtiaent = rtibent AND pmaalent = rtiaent AND pmaal001 = rtia002 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG AND ooefl001 = rtiasite AND ooeflent = rtiaent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND imaal001 = rtib004 AND imaalent = rtibent AND imaal002 = :DLANG AND rtiaent = :ENT AND rtia032 = '1' AND rtiastus = 'S' AND rtia002 = 'arg4' AND rtiadocdt<= 'arg3' AND rtib017 > 0 AND rtiborga IN (SELECT xrah004 FROM xrah_t WHERE xrah001 = '1' AND xrah002 = 'arg1') )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY rtiadocno

SELECT DISTINCT rtiedocno,rtia002,rtie006 FROM ( SELECT rtiedocno,SUM(rtie006) rtie006,rtia002,rtiasite,rtiaent FROM rtia_t,rtie_t WHERE rtiaent = rtieent AND rtiadocno = rtiedocno AND rtia000 = 'crtt620' AND rtie001 in( '91','92') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM nmee_t WHERE nmeeent = rtiaent AND nmee003 = rtiedocno AND nmee004 = rtieseq) GROUP BY rtiedocno,rtia002,rtiasite,rtiaent )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY rtiedocno

SELECT DISTINCT stbe002,stbe003,stbe001,stbe008,stbe009,stbe016,stbe021 FROM ( SELECT stbe002,stbe003,stbe001,stbe008,stbe009,stbe016, CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN stbe021 WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN stbe022 ELSE stbe023 END stbe021 FROM ( SELECT stbe002,stbe003,stbe001,stbe008,stbe009,stbe016, CASE WHEN stbe021 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE stbe021 END stbe021, CASE WHEN stbe022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE stbe022 END stbe022, CASE WHEN stbe023 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE stbe023 END stbe023 FROM stbe_t,stbd_t WHERE stbeent = :ENT AND stbeent = stbdent AND stbedocno = stbddocno AND stbdstus = 'Y' AND stbddocno = 'arg2' AND stbe001 = 'arg3' ) )
WHERE stbe016 - stbe021 > 0 ORDER BY stbe002,stbe003

SELECT DISTINCT stbedocno,stbd038,stbe012,stbe013,stbd012 FROM ( SELECT stbedocno,stbd038,SUM(stbe012 * CASE WHEN stbe001 = '3' THEN stbe011*-1 ELSE stbe011 END) stbe012, SUM(stbe013 * CASE WHEN stbe001 = '3' THEN stbe011*-1 ELSE stbe011 END) stbe013, (SUM(stbe013 * CASE WHEN stbe001 = '3' THEN stbe011*-1 ELSE stbe011 END) - SUM(stbe012 * CASE WHEN stbe001 = '3' THEN stbe011*-1 ELSE stbe011 END)) stbd012 FROM stbe_t,stbd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN stan_t ON stbd001 = stan001 AND stbdent = stanent LEFT OUTER JOIN stfa_t ON stbd001 = stfa001 AND stbdent = stfaent WHERE stbeent = :ENT AND stbeent = stbdent AND stbedocno = stbddocno AND stbdstus = 'Y' AND (SELECT pmac002 FROM pmac_t WHERE pmacent = :ENT AND pmac001 = stbd002 AND pmac003 = '3' AND pmac004 = 'Y' ) = 'arg1' AND stbe008 = 'arg2' AND 1 = arg3 AND ((stbd003 IN ('4','5') AND stfa035 = 'arg4') OR (stbd003 IN ('1','3','A','B') AND stan008 = 'arg4')) AND (SELECT ooef017 FROM ooef_t WHERE ooefent =:ENT AND ooef001 = stbesite) = 'arg5' AND stbe024 = 'Y' AND stbe025 = 'Y' AND stbd003 = 'arg7' AND stbe001 IN (arg8) AND stbe002||stbe003 NOT IN (SELECT apba005||apba006 FROM apba_t WHERE apbaent = :ENT and apba005 IS NOT NULL AND apba006 IS NOT NULL) AND ABS(stbe016) - ABS(stbe021) > 0 GROUP BY stbedocno,stbd038 )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY stbedocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmbw011,imaal003,imaal004,xmbw012 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT xmbw011,imaal003,imaal004,xmbw012 FROM xmbv_t,xmbw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = xmbw011 AND xmbwent = imaalent AND imaal002 = :DLANG WHERE xmbvent = xmbwent AND xmbvdocno = xmbwdocno AND xmbwent = :ENT AND xmbwdocno = 'arg1' AND xmbw013 = 'arg2' AND xmbvstus <> 'X' UNION SELECT DISTINCT xmaw011,imaal003,imaal004,xmaw012 FROM xmaw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = xmaw011 AND xmawent = imaalent AND imaal002 = :DLANG WHERE xmaw001 = 'arg3' AND xmaw002 = 'arg4' AND xmaw013 = 'arg2' AND xmawstus = 'Y')
WHERE xmbw011 <>'arg5' OR xmbw012 <> 'arg6' ORDER BY xmbw011

SELECT DISTINCT xmbw011,imaal003,imaal004,xmbw012 FROM xmbw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON xmbwent = imaalent AND xmbw011 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmbwent = :ENT AND xmbwdocno = 'arg1' AND xmbw013 = 'arg2' ORDER BY xmbw011

SELECT DISTINCT xmbw012 FROM xmbw_t
WHERE xmbwent = :ENT ORDER BY xmbw012

SELECT DISTINCT xmbw012 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT xmbw011,xmbw012 FROM xmbv_t,xmbw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = xmbw011 AND xmbwent = imaalent AND imaal002 = :DLANG WHERE xmbvent = xmbwent AND xmbvdocno = xmbwdocno AND xmbwent = :ENT AND xmbwdocno = 'arg1' AND xmbw011 = 'arg2' AND xmbw013 = 'arg3' AND xmbvstus <> 'X' UNION SELECT DISTINCT xmaw011,xmaw012 FROM xmaw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = xmaw011 AND xmawent = imaalent AND imaal002 = :DLANG WHERE xmaw001 = 'arg4' AND xmaw002 = 'arg5' AND xmaw013 = 'arg3' AND xmawstus = 'Y')
WHERE xmbw011 <> 'arg6' OR xmbw012 <>'arg7' ORDER BY xmbw012

SELECT DISTINCT xmbw012 FROM xmbw_t
WHERE xmbwent = :ENT AND xmbwdocno = 'arg1' AND xmbw013 = 'arg2' ORDER BY xmbw012

SELECT DISTINCT xmbw031,oocql004 FROM xmbw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON xmbwent = oocqlent AND oocql001='2003' AND xmbw031 = oocql002 AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmbwent = :ENT ORDER BY xmbw031

SELECT DISTINCT xmbw031,oocql004 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT xmbw031,oocql004 FROM xmbv_t,xmbw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON xmbwent = oocqlent AND oocql001='2003' AND xmbw031 = oocql002 AND oocql003 = :DLANG WHERE xmbvent = xmbwent AND xmbvdocno = xmbwdocno AND xmbwent = :ENT AND xmbwdocno = 'arg1' AND xmbw013 = 'arg2' AND xmbvstus <> 'X' UNION SELECT DISTINCT xmaw031,oocql004 FROM xmaw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON xmawent = oocqlent AND oocql001='2003' AND xmaw031 = oocql002 AND oocql003 = :DLANG WHERE xmaw001 = 'arg3' AND xmaw002 = 'arg4' AND xmaw013 = 'arg2' AND xmawstus = 'Y')
WHERE xmbw031 NOT IN(' ','arg5') ORDER BY xmbw031

SELECT DISTINCT xmbw032,rtaxl003 FROM xmbw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON xmbwent = rtaxlent AND xmbw032 = rtaxl001 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmbwent = :ENT ORDER BY xmbw032

SELECT DISTINCT xmbw032,rtaxl003 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT xmbw032,rtaxl003 FROM xmbv_t,xmbw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON xmbwent = rtaxlent AND xmbw032 = rtaxl001 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG WHERE xmbvent = xmbwent AND xmbvdocno = xmbwdocno AND xmbwent = :ENT AND xmbwdocno = 'arg1' AND xmbw013 = 'arg2' AND xmbvstus <> 'X' UNION SELECT DISTINCT xmaw032,rtaxl003 FROM xmaw_t LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON xmawent = rtaxlent AND xmaw032 = rtaxl001 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG WHERE xmaw001 = 'arg3' AND xmaw002 = 'arg4' AND xmaw013 = 'arg2' AND xmawstus = 'Y')
WHERE xmbw032 NOT IN(' ','arg5') ORDER BY xmbw032

WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE AND xmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmda008

WHERE xmdaent = :ENT ORDER BY xmda031

WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITEAND xmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmda033

SELECT DISTINCT xmda037 FROM xmda_t
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE ORDER BY xmda037

SELECT DISTINCT xmda020,oocql004,xmda037 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdaent AND oocql001 = 263 AND oocql002 = xmda020 AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE ORDER BY xmda037

SELECT DISTINCT xmda038 FROM xmda_t
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE ORDER BY xmda038

SELECT DISTINCT xmda020,oocql004,xmda038 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdaent AND oocql001 = 263 AND oocql002 = xmda020 AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE ORDER BY xmda038

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmdastus,gzcbl004,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmdaent AND ooag001 = xmda002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = xmda003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '13' AND gzcbl002 = xmdastus AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdcseq,xmdc001,imaal003,imaal004,xmdc011,xmdc010 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xmdc_t ON xmdaent = xmdcent AND xmdadocno = xmdcdocno LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON xmdcent = imaalent AND xmdc001 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE AND xmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda004,pmaal004,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003,xmdastus FROM ( SELECT xmdaent,xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda004,pmaal004,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003,xmdastus FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON xmdaent = pmaalent AND xmda004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON xmdaent = ooagent AND xmda002 = ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON xmdaent = ooeflent AND xmda003 = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG UNION SELECT pmdlent,pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmaal004,pmdl002,ooag011,pmdl003,ooefl003,pmdlstus FROM pmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdlent = pmaalent AND pmdl004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON pmdlent = ooagent AND pmdl002 = ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON pmdlent = ooeflent AND pmdl003 = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG WHERE (pmdl005 = '1' OR pmdl005 = '2') AND (pmdl006 = '2' OR pmdl006 = '3' AND pmdl006 = '4') )
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooag001 = xmda002 AND ooagent = :ENT LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = xmda003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE AND xmdastus IN ('Y','H') ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda004,pmaal004,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003,xmdastus FROM ( SELECT xmdaent,xmdasite,xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda004,xmda006,pmaal004,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003,xmdastus FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON xmdaent = pmaalent AND xmda004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON xmdaent = ooagent AND xmda002 = ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON xmdaent = ooeflent AND xmda003 = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG WHERE xmda006 = '2' UNION SELECT pmdlent,pmdlsite,pmdldocno,pmdldocdt,pmdl004,pmdl006,pmaal004,pmdl002,ooag011,pmdl003,ooefl003,pmdlstus FROM pmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmdlent = pmaalent AND pmdl004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON pmdlent = ooagent AND pmdl002 = ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON pmdlent = ooeflent AND pmdl003 = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG WHERE (pmdl006 = '2' OR pmdl006 = '3' ) )
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE AND xmdastus <> 'X' ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmda021,b.pmaal004,xmda022,c.pmaal004,xmda020,oocql004,xmdcseq FROM xmdd_t,xmdc_t,xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdaent AND b.pmaal001 = xmda021 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdaent AND c.pmaal001 = xmda022 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdaent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmda020 AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmddent = xmdcent AND xmdcent = xmdaent AND xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdddocno = xmdcdocno AND xmdcdocno = xmdadocno AND xmddseq = xmdcseq AND xmda005 <> '5' AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmda045 = 'N' AND NOT(xmda006 = '2' AND xmda050 IS NULL) ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmdastus,gzcbl004,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmdaent AND ooag001 = xmda002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = xmda003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '13' AND gzcbl002 = xmdastus AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE AND xmda005='8' ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmdastus,gzcbl004,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmdaent AND ooag001 = xmda002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = xmda003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '13' AND gzcbl002 = xmdastus AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN xmdc_t ON xmdcdocno = xmdadocno AND xmdcent = :ENT LEFT OUTER JOIN imaa_t ON imaa001 = xmdc001 AND imaaent= :ENT AND imaa004 = 'M'
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmda021,b.pmaal004,xmda022,c.pmaal004,xmda020,oocql004 FROM xmdd_t,xmdc_t,xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdaent AND b.pmaal001 = xmda021 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdaent AND c.pmaal001 = xmda022 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdaent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmda020 AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmddent = xmdcent AND xmdcent = xmdaent AND xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdddocno = xmdcdocno AND xmdcdocno = xmdadocno AND xmddseq = xmdcseq AND xmda005 <> '5' AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdcunit = :SITE AND xmda045 = 'N' AND NOT(xmda006 = '2' AND xmda050 IS NULL) ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmda021,b.pmaal004,xmda022,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdc_t,xmdd_t,xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdaent AND b.pmaal001 = xmda021 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdaent AND c.pmaal001 = xmda022 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmddent = xmdaent AND xmddent = :ENT AND xmdddocno = xmdadocno AND xmdcent = xmdaent AND xmdcdocno = xmdadocno AND xmda005 <> '5' AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdc045 = '1' ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmda021,b.pmaal004,xmda022,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdc_t,xmdd_t,xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdaent AND b.pmaal001 = xmda021 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdaent AND c.pmaal001 = xmda022 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmddent = xmdaent AND xmddent = :ENT AND xmdddocno = xmdadocno AND xmdcent = xmdaent AND xmdcdocno = xmdadocno AND xmda005 <> '5' AND xmddunit ='arg3' AND xmddsite = ( SELECT DISTINCT ooed004 FROM ooed_t WHERE xmddsite = ooed004 AND ooedent=:ENT AND ooed001='arg2' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) AND ooed004 in (SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t START WITH ooed005='arg1' AND ooed001='arg2' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) CONNECT BY nocycle PRIOR ooed004=ooed005 AND ooed001='arg2' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) UNION SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t WHERE ooed004='arg1' )) AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdc045 = '1' ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmdasite,ooefl003,xmda004,pmaal004 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = xmdaent AND pmaal001 = xmda004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdaent AND ooefl001 = xmdasite AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmda045 <> 'Y' ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda002,oofa011,xmda003,ooefl003 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmda002 AND oofaent = :ENT LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = xmda003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE AND xmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmdaent AND ooag001 = xmda002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = xmda003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG ,xmdc_t
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE AND xmdaent = xmdcent AND xmdadocno = xmdcdocnoAND xmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmdastus,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmdaent AND ooag001 = xmda002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = xmda003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdastus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmdastus,xmda002,ooag011,xmda003,ooefl003,xmda004,pmaal004 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmdaent AND ooag001 = xmda002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = xmda003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = xmdaent AND pmaal001 = xmda004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdasite = :SITE ORDER BY xmdadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdbdocno,xmdb001,xmdb003,xmdb004,xmdb005 FROM ( SELECT xmdasite,xmda004,xmda009,xmda021,xmdbdocno,xmdb001,xmdb003,xmdb004,xmdb005,xmdb016,xmda028 FROM ( SELECT xmdasite,xmda004,xmda009,xmdbdocno,xmdb001,xmdb003,xmdb004,xmdadocdt,xmda021,xmdb005,xmdb016,xmda028 FROM xmdb_t,xmda_t WHERE xmdadocno = xmdbdocno AND xmdaent = xmdbent AND xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdastus ='Y' AND xmdadocdt <= 'arg2' AND xmda021 = 'arg3' ) )
WHERE xmdb005 > 0 ORDER BY xmdbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmda004,pmaal003,xmdbdocno,xmdb001,xmda015,xmdb006,xmdb004,ooag011,xmda005,xmda039 FROM ( SELECT xmdaent,xmda004,pmaal003,xmdbdocno,xmdb001,xmda015,xmdb006,xmdb004,xmdasite,xmda028, xmda002||'('||ooag011||')' ooag011,xmda005,xmda039, CASE WHEN 'arg2' = '1' THEN xmdb005 - CASE WHEN xmdb008 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdb008 END WHEN 'arg2' = '2' THEN xmdb005 - CASE WHEN xmdb010 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdb010 END WHEN 'arg2' = '3' THEN xmdb005 - CASE WHEN xmdb014 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdb014 END END xmdb005,xmdadocdt FROM xmda_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaal001 = xmda004 AND pmaal002 = :LANG AND pmaalent = :ENT LEFT JOIN ooag_t ON ooag001 = xmda002 AND ooagent = :ENT , xmdb_t WHERE xmdadocno = xmdbdocno AND xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdadocdt <= 'arg3' AND (xmda021 = 'arg4' OR 'arg4' = 'ALL') AND xmdb005 > 0 AND xmdb007 IS NULL AND xmdb016 IN ('1','2') )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xmdbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmda004,pmaal003,xmdbdocno,xmda015,xmdb006,ooag011,xmda005,xmda039 FROM ( SELECT xmdaent,xmda004,pmaal003,xmdbdocno,xmda015,SUM(xmdb006) xmdb006,xmdasite,xmda011, xmda002||'('||ooag011||')' ooag011,xmda005,xmda039, SUM(CASE WHEN 'arg2' = '1' THEN xmdb005 - CASE WHEN xmdb008 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdb008 END WHEN 'arg2' = '2' THEN xmdb005 - CASE WHEN xmdb010 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdb010 END WHEN 'arg2' = '3' THEN xmdb005 - CASE WHEN xmdb014 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdb014 END END) xmdb005,xmdadocdt FROM xmda_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaal001 = xmda004 AND pmaal002 = :LANG AND pmaalent = :ENT LEFT JOIN ooag_t ON ooag001 = xmda002 AND ooagent = :ENT , xmdb_t WHERE xmdadocno = xmdbdocno AND xmdaent = :ENT AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdadocdt <= 'arg3' AND (xmda021 = 'arg4' OR 'arg4' = 'ALL') AND xmdb007 IS NULL AND xmdb016 IN ('1','2') GROUP BY xmdaent,xmda004,pmaal003,xmdbdocno,xmda015,xmdasite, xmda002,ooag011,xmda005,xmda039,xmdadocdt,xmda011 )
WHERE 1=1 AND xmdb005 > 0 ORDER BY xmdbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdddocno,xmdadocdt,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2,xmdd001,imaal003,imaal004,xmdd002,xmdd006,xmdd004 FROM xmdd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON xmddent=imaalent AND xmdd001 = imaal001 AND imaal002=:DLANG,xmda_t
WHERE xmdaent=xmddent AND xmdasite=xmddsite AND xmdadocno=xmdddocno AND xmdastus IN ('Y','H') AND xmddent=:ENT AND xmddsite=:SITE AND xmdd006 > COALESCE((SELECT SUM(sfaa012) FROM sfaa_t WHERE sfaaent = xmddent AND sfaa006 = xmdddocno AND sfaa007 = xmddseq AND sfaa008 = xmddseq1 AND sfaa063 = xmddseq2 AND sfaastus<>'X'),0) ORDER BY xmdddocno,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2

SELECT DISTINCT xmdddocno,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmda021,b.pmaal004,xmdd211,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdc_t,xmdd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmddent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdd211 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG, xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdaent AND b.pmaal001 = xmda021 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmddent = xmdaent AND xmddent = :ENT AND xmdddocno = xmdadocno AND xmdcent = xmdaent AND xmdcdocno = xmdadocno AND xmda005 <> '5' AND xmddunit ='arg1' AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdc045 = '1' ORDER BY xmdddocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdddocno,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmda021,b.pmaal004,xmda022,c.pmaal004,xmda020,oocql004,xmdd001,imaal003,imaal004,xmdd004,oocal003,xmdd006 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdaent AND b.pmaal001 = xmda021 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdaent AND c.pmaal001 = xmda022 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdaent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmda020 AND oocql003 = :DLANG ,xmdc_t ,xmdd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = xmddent AND imaal001 = xmdd001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocal_t ON oocalent = xmddent AND oocal001 = xmdd004 AND oocal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT xmdlent,xmdl003,xmdl004,xmdl005,xmdl006,SUM(xmdl018) xmdl018 FROM xmdk_t,xmdl_t WHERE xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdk000 = '1' AND xmdkstus <> 'X' GROUP BY xmdlent,xmdl003,xmdl004,xmdl005,xmdl006) ON xmdlent = xmddent AND xmdl003 = xmdddocno AND xmdl004 = xmddseq AND xmdl005 = xmddseq1 AND xmdl006 = xmddseq2
WHERE xmdaent = xmdcent AND xmdcent = xmddent AND xmddent = :ENT AND xmdadocno = xmdcdocno AND xmdcdocno = xmdddocno AND xmda005 <> '5' AND xmda006 <> '5' AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdcunit = :SITE AND xmda045 = 'N' AND NOT(xmda006 = '2' AND xmda050 IS NULL) AND (COALESCE(xmdd006,0)+COALESCE(xmdd016,0)+COALESCE(xmdd034,0)) > COALESCE(xmdl018,0) ORDER BY xmdddocno,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2

SELECT DISTINCT xmdddocno,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmda021,b.pmaal004,xmda022,c.pmaal004,xmda020,oocql004,xmdd001,imaal003,imaal004,xmdd004,oocal003,xmdd006,xmdd031,xmdd016,xmdd011 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdaent AND b.pmaal001 = xmda021 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdaent AND c.pmaal001 = xmda022 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdaent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmda020 AND oocql003 = :DLANG ,xmdc_t ,xmdd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = xmddent AND imaal001 = xmdd001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocal_t ON oocalent = xmddent AND oocal001 = xmdd004 AND oocal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = xmdcent AND xmdcent = xmddent AND xmddent = :ENT AND xmdadocno = xmdcdocno AND xmdcdocno = xmdddocno AND xmda005 <> '5' AND xmda006 <> '5' AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdcunit = :SITE AND xmda045 = 'N' AND NOT(xmda006 = '2' AND xmda050 IS NULL) AND (COALESCE(xmdd006,0)+COALESCE(xmdd016,0)+COALESCE(xmdd034,0)-COALESCE(xmdd031,0)) > (xmdd014 + (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(xmdl018),0) FROM xmdk_t,xmdl_t WHERE xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdlent = xmddent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdk000 = '1' AND xmdkstus <> 'X' AND xmdl003 = xmdddocno AND xmdl004 = xmddseq AND xmdl005 = xmddseq1 AND xmdl006 = xmddseq2)) ORDER BY xmdddocno,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2

SELECT DISTINCT xmdadocno,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmda021,b.pmaal004,xmda022,c.pmaal004,xmda020,oocql004 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdaent AND b.pmaal001 = xmda021 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdaent AND c.pmaal001 = xmda022 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdaent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmda020 AND oocql003 = :DLANG ,xmdc_t ,xmdd_t
WHERE xmdaent = xmdcent AND xmdcent = xmddent AND xmddent = :ENT AND xmdadocno = xmdcdocno AND xmdcdocno = xmdddocno AND xmda005 <> '5' AND xmda006 <> '5' AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdcunit = :SITE AND xmda045 = 'N' AND NOT(xmda006 = '2' AND xmda050 IS NULL) AND (COALESCE(xmdd006,0)+COALESCE(xmdd016,0)+COALESCE(xmdd034,0)) > (xmdd014 + (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(xmdl018),0) FROM xmdk_t,xmdl_t WHERE xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdlent = xmddent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdk000 = '1' AND xmdkstus <> 'X' AND xmdl003 = xmdddocno AND xmdl004 = xmddseq AND xmdl005 = xmddseq1 AND xmdl006 = xmddseq2)) ORDER BY xmdadocno,xmdadocdt

SELECT DISTINCT xmdddocno,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmdd001,imaal003,imaal004,xmdd004,oocal003,xmdd006,xmdd016,xmdd011 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG ,xmdc_t ,xmdd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = xmddent AND imaal001 = xmdd001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocal_t ON oocalent = xmddent AND oocal001 = xmdd004 AND oocal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = xmdcent AND xmdcent = xmddent AND xmddent = :ENT AND xmdadocno = xmdcdocno AND xmdcdocno = xmdddocno AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdcunit = :SITE AND xmdc045 = '1' ORDER BY xmdddocno,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2

SELECT DISTINCT xmdddocno,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2,xmdadocdt,xmda004,a.pmaal004,xmda021,b.pmaal004,xmda022,c.pmaal004,xmda020,oocql004,xmdd001,imaal003,imaal004,xmdd004,oocal003,xmdd006 FROM xmda_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdaent AND a.pmaal001 = xmda004 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdaent AND b.pmaal001 = xmda021 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdaent AND c.pmaal001 = xmda022 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdaent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmda020 AND oocql003 = :DLANG ,xmdc_t ,xmdd_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = xmddent AND imaal001 = xmdd001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocal_t ON oocalent = xmddent AND oocal001 = xmdd004 AND oocal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdaent = xmdcent AND xmdcent = xmddent AND xmddent = :ENT AND xmdadocno = xmdcdocno AND xmdcdocno = xmdddocno AND xmda005 IN('1','3') AND xmdastus = 'Y' AND xmdcunit = :SITE ORDER BY xmdddocno,xmddseq,xmddseq1,xmddseq2

zoom.desc: 销售合同/核价结算来源单据查询

SELECT DISTINCT xmde003,xmde004,xmdk000 FROM xmde_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xmdk_t ON xmdkent = xmdeent AND xmdkdocno = xmde003
WHERE xmdeent = :ENT AND xmdesite = :SITE ORDER BY xmde003,xmde004

WHERE xmdgent=:ENT AND xmdgsite=:SITE ORDER BY xmdg018

SELECT DISTINCT xmdg018,xmdg020 FROM xmdg_t
WHERE xmdgent=:ENT AND xmdgsite=:SITE ORDER BY xmdg018
