SELECT DISTINCT xmdg055,xmdgdocno,xmdgdocdt FROM xmdg_t
WHERE xmdgent=:ENT AND xmdgsite=:SITE ORDER BY xmdg055

SELECT DISTINCT xmdg058 FROM xmdg_t
WHERE xmdgent = :ENT AND xmdgsite = :SITE ORDER BY xmdg058

SELECT DISTINCT xmdgdocno,xmdg028,xmdg005,a.pmaal004,xmdg006,b.pmaal004,xmdg007,c.pmaal004,xmdg018,oocql004 FROM xmdg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdgent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdg005 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdgent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdg006 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdgent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdg007 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdgent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmdg018 AND oocql003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN xmdh_t ON xmdhent = xmdgent AND xmdhdocno = xmdgdocno
WHERE xmdgent = :ENT AND xmdgsite = :SITE AND xmdgstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdgdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdgdocno,xmdgdocdt,xmdg005,pmaal004,xmdg001,xmdg002,oofa011,xmdg003,a.ooefl003,xmdgsite,b.ooefl003,xmdg028 FROM xmdg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = xmdgent AND pmaal001 = xmdg005 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdgent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdg002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t a ON a.ooeflent = xmdgent AND a.ooefl001 = xmdg003 AND a.ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t b ON b.ooeflent = xmdgent AND b.ooefl001 = xmdgsite AND b.ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdgent = :ENT AND xmdgstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdgdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdgdocno,xmdg028,xmdg005,a.pmaal004,xmdg006,b.pmaal004,xmdg007,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdgent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdg005 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdgent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdg006 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdgent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdg007 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdgent = :ENT AND xmdgstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdgdocno

zoom.desc: 出通单查询-依发货组织

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xmdgdocno,xmdg028,xmdg005,a.pmaal004,xmdg006,b.pmaal004,xmdg007,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdgent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdg005 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdgent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdg006 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdgent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdg007 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdgent = :ENT AND xmdgsite IN ( SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t WHERE xmdgsite = ooed004 AND ooedent=:ENT AND ooed001='arg2' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM xmdh_t WHERE xmdhent = xmdgent AND xmdhdocno = xmdgdocno AND xmdhunit = 'arg3' ) AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) AND ooed004 in (SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t START WITH ooed005='arg1' AND ooed001='arg2' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) CONNECT BY nocycle PRIOR ooed004=ooed005 AND ooed001='arg2' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) UNION SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t WHERE ooed004='arg1' )) AND xmdgstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdgdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdgdocno,xmdhseq,xmdg028,xmdg005,a.pmaal004,xmdg006,b.pmaal004,xmdg007,c.pmaal004,xmdg018,oocql004 FROM xmdg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdgent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdg005 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdgent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdg006 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdgent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdg007 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdgent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmdg018 AND oocql003 = :DLANG ,xmdh_t
WHERE xmdgent = :ENT AND xmdgsite = :SITE AND xmdgent = xmdhent AND xmdgdocno = xmdhdocno AND xmdgstus = 'Y' AND xmdh022 = 'Y' AND xmdg001 <> '8' ORDER BY xmdgdocno,xmdhseq

SELECT DISTINCT xmdgdocno,d.xmdhseq,xmdg028,xmdg005,a.pmaal004,xmdg006,b.pmaal004,xmdg007,c.pmaal004,xmdg018,oocql004 FROM xmdg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdgent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdg005 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdgent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdg006 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdgent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdg007 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdgent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmdg018 AND oocql003 = :DLANG ,xmdh_t d LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT e.xmdhent,e.xmdhsite,e.xmdhdocno,e.xmdhseq,SUM(qcba017-qcba027) qcba017_sum FROM xmdh_t e,qcba_t WHERE e.xmdhent = qcbaent AND e.xmdhsite = qcbasite AND e.xmdhent = :ENT AND e.xmdhsite = :SITE AND e.xmdhdocno = qcba001 AND e.xmdhseq = qcba002 AND qcbastus <> 'X' GROUP BY e.xmdhent,e.xmdhsite,e.xmdhdocno,e.xmdhseq) f ON f.xmdhent = d.xmdhent AND f.xmdhsite = d.xmdhsite AND f.xmdhdocno = d.xmdhdocno AND f.xmdhseq = d.xmdhseq
WHERE xmdgent = :ENT AND xmdgsite = :SITE AND xmdgent = d.xmdhent AND xmdgdocno = d.xmdhdocno AND xmdgstus = 'Y' AND d.xmdh022 = 'Y' AND xmdg001 <> '8' AND (xmdh017 > f.qcba017_sum OR f.qcba017_sum IS NULL) ORDER BY xmdgdocno,d.xmdhseq

SELECT DISTINCT xmda005,xmdh001,xmdg005,xmdgdocdt FROM xmdh_t,xmdg_t, xmda_t
WHERE xmdadocno = xmdh001 AND xmdgdocno = xmdhdocno AND xmdaent = xmdhent AND xmdgent = xmdhent AND xmdhent = :ENT AND xmdgdocno = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdg005,xmdh001

SELECT DISTINCT xmdh006,imaal003,imaal004,xmdh007 FROM xmdk_t,xmdh_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON xmdhent = imaalent AND xmdh006 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE ORDER BY xmdh006

zoom.desc: 出通单单身查询-依发货组织

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xmdhdocno,xmdhseq,xmdg028,xmdg005,a.pmaal004,xmdg006,b.pmaal004,xmdh212,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdh_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdhent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdh212 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG, xmdg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdgent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdg005 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdgent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdg006 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdhent = xmdgent AND xmdhdocno = xmdgdocno AND xmdgent = :ENT AND xmdgunit = 'arg1' AND xmdgstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdhdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdhdocno,xmdhseq,xmdg028,xmdg005,a.pmaal004,xmdg006,b.pmaal004,xmdg007,c.pmaal004,xmdg018,oocql004,xmdh006,imaal003,imaal004,xmdh015,oocal003,xmdh016 FROM xmdg_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdgent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdg005 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdgent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdg006 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdgent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdg007 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdgent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmdg018 AND oocql003 = :DLANG ,xmdh_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = xmdhent AND imaal001 = xmdh006 AND imaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocal_t ON oocalent = xmdhent AND oocal001 = xmdh015 AND oocal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdgent = xmdhent AND xmdhent = :ENT AND xmdgdocno = xmdhdocno AND xmdgsite = :SITE AND xmdgstus = 'Y' AND xmdh017 > (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(xmdl018),0) FROM xmdk_t,xmdl_t WHERE xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdlent = xmdhent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdk000 = '1' AND xmdkstus <> 'X' AND xmdl001 = xmdhdocno AND xmdl002 = xmdhseq) ORDER BY xmdhdocno,xmdhseq

zoom.desc: 出通单库储批产品特征开窗

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xmdi005,inayl003,xmdi006,inab003,xmdi007,xmdi013,a.inag009 FROM xmdi_t LEFT OUTER JOIN inayl_t ON inaylent = xmdient AND inayl001 = xmdi005 AND inayl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN inab_t ON inabent = xmdient AND inabsite = xmdisite AND inab001 = xmdi005 AND inab002 = xmdi006 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT inagent,inagsite,inag001,inag002,inag003,inag004,inag005,inag006,inag007,SUM(COALESCE(inag009,0)) as inag009 FROM inag_t GROUP BY inagent,inagsite,inag001,inag002,inag003,inag004,inag005,inag006,inag007) a ON a.inagent = xmdient AND a.inagsite = xmdisite AND a.inag001 = xmdi001 AND a.inag002 = COALESCE(xmdi002,' ') AND a.inag003 = COALESCE(xmdi013,' ') AND a.inag004 = xmdi005 AND a.inag005 = COALESCE(xmdi006,' ') AND a.inag006 = COALESCE(xmdi007,' ') AND a.inag007 = xmdi008
WHERE xmdient = :ENT AND xmdisite = 'arg1' AND xmdidocno = 'arg2' AND xmdiseq = 'arg3' ORDER BY xmdi005,xmdi006,xmdi007,xmdi013

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk000 FROM xmdk_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT ORDER BY xmdk000

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk007,pmaal003,pmaal004 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON xmdkent = pmaalent AND xmdk007 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT ORDER BY xmdk007

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk023 FROM xmdk_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdk000 = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdk023

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk024 FROM xmdk_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdk000 = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdk024

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk035,xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk006,xmdk007,pmaal003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON xmdkent = pmaalent AND xmdk007 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG ,icaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN icab_t ON icabent = icaaent AND icab001 = icaa001 AND icab002 = 0
WHERE xmdkent = icaaent AND icaaent = :ENT AND xmdk044 = icaa001 AND xmdk000 = 'arg1' AND xmdk035 IS NOT NULL AND icaa003 = 'arg3' AND icaa004 = '2' AND icaa005 = 'Y' AND icab003 = :SITE AND xmdk035 NOT IN (SELECT xmdk035 FROM xmdk_t WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdk000 = 'arg1' AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdkdocno <> COALESCE('arg2',' ') AND xmdk035 IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY xmdk035

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk036,xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk006,xmdk007,pmaal003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON xmdkent = pmaalent AND xmdk007 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdk000 = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdk036

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk208 FROM xmdk_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT ORDER BY xmdk208

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND ((xmdk000 IN ('1', '2', '3') AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdk002 = '1') OR (xmdk000 = '4' AND xmdkstus = 'Y' AND xmdk002 = '3') OR (xmdk000 = '6' AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdk082 IN (SELECT gzcb002 FROM gzcb_t WHERE gzcb001='2088' AND gzcb003='Y')) ) ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk007,a.pmaal004,xmdk009,b.pmaal004,xmdk008,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdkent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdk008 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdkent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdk009 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITEAND xmdkstus IN ('Y','S') ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooeal003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooealent = xmdkent AND ooeal001 = xmdk004 AND ooeal002 = :DLANG,xmdl_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl038 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl038 END - CASE WHEN xmdl053 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl053 END WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl039 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl039 END - CASE WHEN xmdl053 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl054 END WHEN 'arg1' = '3' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl040 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl040 END - CASE WHEN xmdl053 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl055 END END > 0 ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdksite,ooefl003,xmdk000,a.gzcbl004,xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk001,xmdk002,b.gzcbl004,xmdk008,a.pmaal004,xmdk202,b.pmaal004,xmdk051,xmdk053,xmdk052 FROM xmdk_t LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdksite AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t a ON a.gzcbl001 = '2077' AND a.gzcbl002 = xmdk000 AND a.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t b ON b.gzcbl001 = '2063' AND b.gzcbl002 = xmdk002 AND b.gzcbl003 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk008 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdkent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdk202 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT ORDER BY xmdk000,xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdk026,xmdk007,a.pmaal004,xmdk008,b.pmaal004,xmdk009,c.pmaal004,xmdk022,oocql004 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdkent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdk008 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdkent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdk009 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdkent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmdk022 AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 = '7' AND xmdkstus = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdlseq,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG,xmdl_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 IN ('1','2') AND xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdl023 = 'Y' AND xmdkstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND ((xmdk000 = '1' AND xmdk002 <> '3' AND xmdkstus = 'S') OR (xmdk000 = '4' AND xmdk002 = '3' AND xmdkstus = 'Y')) ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdlseq,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG,xmdl_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 = '8' AND xmdk002 = '8' AND xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdkstus <> 'X' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,ooag011,xmdk004,ooeal003,xmdk007,a.pmaal004 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmdkent AND ooag001 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooealent = xmdkent AND ooeal001 = xmdk004 AND ooeal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG ,xmdl_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdlseq,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooeal003,xmdk007,a.pmaal004 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooealent = xmdkent AND ooeal001 = xmdk004 AND ooeal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG ,xmdl_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdlseq,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG,xmdl_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 = '7' AND xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdl023 = 'Y' AND xmdkstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 = '6' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 IN ('arg1') AND xmdkstus = 'arg2' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 IN ('1') AND xmdk002 = '8' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 IN ('7') ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk002,xmdk003,ooag011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmdkent AND ooag001 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdk000 IN ('arg1') AND xmdkstus = 'arg2' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdlseq,xmdkdocdt,xmdk082,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG,xmdl_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 = '6' AND xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdl023 = 'Y' AND xmdkstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk007,a.pmaal004,xmdk009,b.pmaal004,xmdk008,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdkent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdk008 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdkent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdk009 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 = '6' AND xmdkstus IN ('Y','S') ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdk026,xmdk007,a.pmaal004,xmdk008,b.pmaal004,xmdk009,c.pmaal004,xmdk022,oocql004 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdkent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdk008 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdkent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdk009 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmdkent AND oocql001 = '263' AND oocql002 = xmdk022 AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 IN ('1','2') AND xmdkstus = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno FROM xmdk_t
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdk000 = '6' AND xmdksite IN (SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t START WITH ooed005='arg1' AND ooed001='arg2' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) CONNECT BY nocycle PRIOR ooed004=ooed005 AND ooed001='arg2' AND ooed006<=:TODAY AND (ooed007>:TODAY OR ooed007 IS NULL) UNION SELECT ooed004 FROM ooed_t WHERE ooed004='arg1' ) ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdlseq,xmdk026,xmdk007,a.pmaal004,xmdk008,b.pmaal004,xmdk009,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdl_t,xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdkent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdk008 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdkent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdk009 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 IN ('1','2') AND xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdkstus = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdk007,a.pmaal004,xmdk008,b.pmaal004,xmdk009 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdkent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdk008 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdkent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdk009 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN xmdl_t ON xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND ((xmdk000 IN ('1','2') AND xmdk002 <> '3') OR (xmdk000 = '4')) AND xmdksite = 'arg1' AND((xmdk000 IN ('1','2') AND xmdkstus = 'S') OR (xmdk000 = '4' AND xmdkstus = 'Y')) ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdk007,a.pmaal004,xmdk008,b.pmaal004,xmdk009,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdkent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdk008 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdkent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdk009 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND ((xmdk000 IN ('1','2') AND xmdk002 <> '3') OR (xmdk000 = '4')) AND((xmdk000 IN ('1','2') AND xmdkstus = 'S') OR (xmdk000 = '4' AND xmdkstus = 'Y')) ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk003,oofa011,xmdk004,ooefl003 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmdkent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdk003 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmdkent AND ooefl001 = xmdk004 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdk000 = 'arg1' AND xmdkstus = 'arg2' ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdkdocdt,xmdk007,a.pmaal004,xmdk009,b.pmaal004,xmdk008,c.pmaal004 FROM xmdk_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t a ON a.pmaalent = xmdkent AND a.pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND a.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t b ON b.pmaalent = xmdkent AND b.pmaal001 = xmdk008 AND b.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t c ON c.pmaalent = xmdkent AND c.pmaal001 = xmdk009 AND c.pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN xmdl_t ON xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND ((xmdk000 = '1' AND xmdk002 <> '3' AND xmdkstus = 'S') OR (xmdk000 = '4' AND xmdk002 = '3' AND xmdkstus = 'Y')) ORDER BY xmdkdocno

zoom.desc: 订单号码查询(不限定对象)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xmda005,xmdl003,xmdk007,xmdkdocdt,xmdkdocno FROM ( SELECT xmda005,xmdl003,xmdk007,xmdkdocdt,xmdkdocno, SUM(CASE WHEN 'arg2' = '1' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl038 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl038 END WHEN 'arg2' = '2' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl039 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl039 END WHEN 'arg2' = '3' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl040 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl040 END END) xmdl022 FROM xmdl_t, xmdk_t, xmda_t, xmdc_t WHERE xmdadocno = xmdl003 AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdaent = xmdlent AND xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdlsite IN arg1 AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND xmda005 = '1' AND xmdk002 NOT IN ('2', '4') AND xmdkstus = 'S' GROUP BY xmda005,xmdl003,xmdk007,xmdkdocdt,xmdkdocno )
WHERE xmdl022 > 0 ORDER BY xmdk007,xmdl003

SELECT DISTINCT xmda005,xmdl003,xmdk007,xmdkdocdt,xmdldocno FROM xmdl_t,xmdk_t, xmda_t,xmdc_t
WHERE xmdadocno = xmdl003 AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdaent = xmdlent AND xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND xmdk002 NOT IN ('2', '4') AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdl022 > 0 ORDER BY xmdk007,xmdl003

SELECT DISTINCT xmda005,xmdl003,xmdk007,xmdkdocdt,xmdldocno FROM xmdl_t,xmdk_t, xmda_t,xmdc_t
WHERE xmdadocno = xmdl003 AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdaent = xmdlent AND xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdkdocno = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdk007,xmdl003

SELECT DISTINCT xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,xmdl009 FROM xmdk_t,xmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON xmdlent = imaalent AND xmdl008 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdksite = xmdlsite AND xmdlsite = :SITE AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno ORDER BY xmdl008

SELECT DISTINCT xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,xmdl009 FROM xmdk_t,xmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON xmdlent = imaalent AND xmdl008 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdksite = xmdlsite AND xmdlsite = :SITE AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdk000 = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdl008

SELECT DISTINCT xmdl050 FROM xmdl_t
WHERE xmdlent=:ENT and 1=1 ORDER BY xmdl050

SELECT DISTINCT xmdl052 FROM xmdl_t
WHERE xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdlsite = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdl052

SELECT DISTINCT xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdl008,xmdl022,xmdl021,xmdl024,xmdl038 FROM ( SELECT xmdk000,xmdldocno, xmdlseq , xmdl008,xmdl022 ,xmdl021 ,xmdl024, CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl038 WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl039 ELSE xmdl022 - xmdl040 END xmdl038 FROM ( SELECT xmdk000,xmdldocno, xmdlseq , xmdl008,xmdl022 ,xmdl021 ,xmdl024,CASE WHEN xmdl038 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl038 END xmdl038,CASE WHEN xmdl039 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl039 END xmdl039 ,CASE WHEN xmdl040 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl040 END xmdl040 FROM xmdl_t,xmdk_t where xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = xmdlent and xmdkent = :ENT and xmdkdocdt <= 'arg2' and xmdkstus ='S' and xmdk008 = 'arg3' ) )
WHERE xmdl038 > 0 ORDER BY xmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk002,xmdk000,xmdkdocno,xmdk007,xmdk001,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003 FROM ( SELECT xmdk002,xmdk000,xmdkdocno,xmdk007,xmdk001,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003,xmdlsite,xmdk082,xmdkstus,xmdk042, SUM (CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl038 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl038 END WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl039 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl039 END WHEN 'arg1' = '3' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl040 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl040 END END) xmdl022 FROM xmdl_t, xmdk_t WHERE xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND ((xmdk000 IN ('1', '2', '3') AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdk002 = '1') OR (xmdk000 = '4' AND xmdkstus = 'Y' AND xmdk002 = '3') OR (xmdk000 = '6' AND xmdk082 IN (SELECT gzcb002 FROM gzcb_t WHERE gzcb001='2088' AND gzcb003='Y')) ) AND xmdlsite IN arg2 GROUP BY xmdk002,xmdk000,xmdkdocno,xmdk007,xmdk001,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003,xmdlsite,xmdk082,xmdkstus,xmdk042 )
WHERE xmdl022 > 0 ORDER BY xmdk007,xmdl003

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk002,xmdkdocno,xmdk007,xmdk001,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003 FROM ( SELECT xmdk002,xmdkdocno,xmdk007,xmdk001,xmdk037,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003, SUM (CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl038 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl038 END WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl039 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl039 END WHEN 'arg1' = '3' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl040 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl040 END END) xmdl022 FROM xmdl_t, xmdk_t WHERE xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdk000 <> '4' AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND xmdlsite IN arg2 GROUP BY xmdk002,xmdkdocno,xmdk007,xmdk001,xmdk037,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003 )
WHERE xmdl022 > 0 ORDER BY xmdk007,xmdl003

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk002,xmdk000,xmdkdocno,xmdk007,xmdk001,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003 FROM ( SELECT xmdk002,xmdk000,xmdkdocno,xmdk007,xmdk001,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003,xmdlsite,xmdk082,xmdkstus, SUM (CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl038 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl038 END - CASE WHEN xmdl053 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl053 END WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl039 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl039 END - CASE WHEN xmdl054 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl054 END WHEN 'arg1' = '3' THEN CASE WHEN xmdl022 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl022 END - CASE WHEN xmdl040 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl040 END - CASE WHEN xmdl055 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl055 END END) xmdl022 FROM xmdl_t, xmdk_t WHERE xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND ((xmdk000 IN ('1', '2', '3') AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdk002 = '1') OR (xmdk000 = '4' AND xmdkstus = 'Y' AND xmdk002 = '3') OR (xmdk000 = '6' AND xmdk082 IN (SELECT gzcb002 FROM gzcb_t WHERE gzcb001='2088' AND gzcb003='Y')) ) AND xmdlsite IN arg2 GROUP BY xmdk002,xmdk000,xmdkdocno,xmdk007,xmdk001,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003,xmdlsite,xmdk082,xmdkstus )
WHERE xmdl022 > 0 ORDER BY xmdk007,xmdl003

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk007,xmdk002,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk001,xmdl008,imaal003,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003,xmdk037 FROM ( SELECT xmdk007,pmaal003,xmdk002,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk001, xmdl008,imaal003,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003,xmdk037,xmdlsite,xmdk082,xmdkstus,xmdk000,xmdk047, CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl038 WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl039 WHEN 'arg1' = '3' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl040 END xmdl022 FROM xmdl_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = xmdl008 AND imaal002 = :DLANG AND xmdlent = imaalent, xmdk_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG AND xmdkent = pmaalent WHERE xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND ((xmdk000 IN ('1', '2', '3') AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdk002 = '1') OR (xmdk000 = '4' AND xmdkstus = 'Y' AND xmdk002 = '3')) AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND xmdk001 <= 'arg2' AND xmdk008 = 'arg3' AND xmdl022 > 0 )
WHERE 1=1 AND xmdl022 > 0 ORDER BY xmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk007,xmdk002,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk001,xmdl008,imaal003,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003,xmdk037 FROM ( SELECT xmdk007,pmaal003,xmdk002,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk001,xmdk047, xmdl008,imaal003,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003,xmdk037,xmdlsite,xmdk082,xmdkstus,xmdk000, CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl038 - xmdl053 WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl039 - xmdl054 WHEN 'arg1' = '3' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl040 - xmdl055 END xmdl022 FROM xmdl_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = xmdlent AND imaal001 = xmdl008 AND imaal002 = :DLANG, xmdk_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent =xmdkent AND pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG WHERE xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdkent = :ENT AND ((xmdk000 IN ('1', '2', '3') AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdk002 = '1') OR (xmdk000 = '4' AND xmdkstus = 'Y' AND xmdk002 = '3')) AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND xmdk001 <= 'arg2' AND xmdk008 = 'arg3' AND xmdl022 > 0 )
WHERE 1=1 AND xmdl022 > 0 ORDER BY xmdldocno

zoom.desc: 出货单单据查询(无订单)

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xmdk007,pmaal003,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk001,xmdl008,imaal003,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdk037 FROM ( SELECT xmdk007,pmaal003,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk001, xmdl008,imaal003,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdk037,xmdlsite, CASE WHEN 'arg2' = '1' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl038 WHEN 'arg2' = '2' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl039 WHEN 'arg2' = '3' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl040 END xmdl022 FROM xmdl_t,xmdk_t,imaal_t,pmaal_t WHERE xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdlent = xmdkent AND imaal001 = xmdl008 AND imaalent = xmdlent AND imaal002 = :DLANG AND pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND pmaalent = xmdkent AND pmaal002 = :DLANG AND xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdk000 = '2' AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND xmdk001 <= 'arg3' AND xmdk008 = 'arg4' AND xmdl022 > 0 AND xmdlsite IN (SELECT xrah004 FROM xrah_t WHERE xrah001 = '1' AND xrah002 = 'arg1') )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk002,xmdkdocno,xmdk007,xmdk001,xmdk037,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdl003 FROM xmdl_t, xmdk_t
WHERE xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdlent = :ENT AND xmdk002 NOT IN ('2', '4') AND ( (xmdk002 <> '3' AND xmdk000 IN ('1', '2', '3')) OR (xmdk002 = '3' AND xmdk000 = '4')) AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND xmdl022 > 0 ORDER BY xmdk007,xmdl003

zoom.desc: 无订单出货单单据查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdl008,xmdl022,xmdl021,xmdl024,xmdl038 FROM ( SELECT xmdk000,xmdldocno, xmdlseq , xmdl008,xmdl022 ,xmdl021 ,xmdl024, CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl038 WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl039 ELSE xmdl022 - xmdl040 END xmdl038 FROM ( SELECT xmdk000,xmdldocno, xmdlseq , xmdl008,xmdl022 ,xmdl021 ,xmdl024,CASE WHEN xmdl038 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl038 END xmdl038,CASE WHEN xmdl039 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl039 END xmdl039 ,CASE WHEN xmdl040 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl040 END xmdl040 FROM xmdl_t,xmdk_t where xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = xmdlent and xmdkent = :ENT and xmdkdocdt <= 'arg2' and xmdkstus ='S' and xmdk008 = 'arg3' ) )
WHERE xmdl038 > 0 ORDER BY xmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk007,pmaal003,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk001,xmdl008,imaal003,xmdk082,xmdl001,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdk037 FROM ( SELECT xmdkent,xmdksite,xmdk000,xmdk007,xmdk008,pmaal003,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk001,xmdk047, xmdl008,imaal003,xmdk082,xmdl001,xmdk012,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdk037,xmdlsite,xmdkstus,xmdk002, CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl038 WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl039 WHEN 'arg1' = '3' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl040 END xmdl022 FROM xmdl_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = xmdl008 AND imaalent = xmdlent AND imaal002 = :DLANG, xmdk_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND pmaalent = xmdkent AND pmaal002 = :DLANG WHERE xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdlent = xmdkent AND xmdk000 = '6' AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdk082 IN (SELECT gzcb002 FROM gzcb_t WHERE gzcb001='2088' AND gzcb003='Y' ) AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND xmdk001 <= 'arg2' AND xmdk008 = 'arg3' AND xmdl022 > 0 )
WHERE xmdkent =:ENT AND 1=1 AND xmdl022 > 0 ORDER BY xmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdk007,pmaal003,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk001,xmdl008,imaal003,xmdk082,xmdl001,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdk037 FROM ( SELECT xmdkent,xmdksite,xmdk000,xmdk007,xmdk008,pmaal003,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk001,xmdk047, xmdl008,imaal003,xmdk082,xmdl001,xmdk012,xmdk016,xmdk051,xmdk037,xmdlsite,xmdkstus,xmdk002, CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl038 - xmdl053 - xmdl047 WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl039 - xmdl054 - xmdl047 WHEN 'arg1' = '3' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl040 - xmdl055 - xmdl047 END xmdl022 FROM xmdl_t LEFT JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = xmdl008 AND imaal002 = :DLANG, xmdk_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaal001 = xmdk007 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG WHERE xmdldocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdk000 = '6' AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdk082 IN (SELECT gzcb002 FROM gzcb_t WHERE gzcb001='2088' AND gzcb003='Y' ) AND xmdl087 = 'Y' AND xmdk001 <= 'arg2' AND xmdk008 = 'arg3' AND xmdl022 > 0 )
WHERE xmdkent =:ENT AND 1=1 AND xmdl022 > 0 ORDER BY xmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdl008,xmdl022,xmdl021,xmdl024,xmdl038 FROM ( SELECT xmdk000,xmdldocno, xmdlseq , xmdl008,xmdl022 ,xmdl021 ,xmdl024, CASE WHEN 'arg1' = '1' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl038 WHEN 'arg1' = '2' THEN xmdl022 - xmdl039 ELSE xmdl022 - xmdl040 END xmdl038 FROM ( SELECT xmdk000,xmdldocno, xmdlseq , xmdl008,xmdl022 ,xmdl021 ,xmdl024,CASE WHEN xmdl038 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl038 END xmdl038,CASE WHEN xmdl039 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl039 END xmdl039 ,CASE WHEN xmdl040 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl040 END xmdl040 FROM xmdl_t,xmdk_t where xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = xmdlent and xmdkent = :ENT and xmdkdocdt <= 'arg2' and xmdkstus ='S' and xmdk008 = 'arg3' ) )
WHERE xmdl038 > 0 ORDER BY xmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdk007,xmdl008,xmdl022,xmdl021,xmdl024,xmdl047,xmdkent FROM ( SELECT xmdkent,xmdksite,xmdk000,xmdk007,xmdk008,xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdl008,xmdl022,xmdl021,xmdl024,CASE WHEN xmdl047 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE xmdl047 END xmdl047 FROM xmdl_t,xmdk_t WHERE xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdl022 - xmdl047 > 0 AND xmdkstus ='S' AND xmdkdocdt <= 'arg1' AND xmdk008 = 'arg2' AND xmdk012 = 'arg3' AND xmdk016 = 'arg4' )
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT ORDER BY xmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdl003,xmdl004,xmdl005,xmdl006,xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,xmdl009,xmdl017,xmdl018 FROM xmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xmdk_t ON xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdkent = xmdlent LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaal001 = xmdl008 AND imaal002 = :DLANG AND imaalent = :ENT
WHERE xmdl022 - xmdl047 > 0 and xmdkstus ='S' and xmdk007 = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdldocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdldocno,xmdlseq,xmdkdocdt,xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,xmdl009 FROM xmdk_t,xmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = :ENT AND imaal001 = xmdl008 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdkent = :ENT AND xmdksite = :SITE AND xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno AND xmdkstus = 'S' AND xmdk000 = '1' ORDER BY xmdldocno,xmdlseq

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdk000,xmdl087 FROM ( ( SELECT xmdkdocno,xmdk000,xmdl087 FROM xmdk_t , xmdl_t where xmdk000 in (4 ) and xmdkstus = 'Y' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = xmdkent and xmdk002 ='3' and xmdksite ='BVI' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = :ENT ) UNION ( SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdk000,xmdl087 FROM xmdk_t , xmdl_t where xmdk000 in (1,2,3) and xmdkstus = 'S' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = xmdkent and xmdk002 ='1' and xmdksite ='BVI' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = :ENT ) UNION ( SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno ,xmdk000, xmdl087 FROM xmdk_t , xmdl_t where xmdk000 ='6' and xmdkstus = 'S' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = xmdkent and xmdksite ='BVI' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdk082 <> '5' and xmdkent = :ENT ) )
where 1=1 ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdk000,xmdl087 FROM ( ( SELECT xmdkdocno,xmdk000,xmdl087,xmdk008 FROM xmdk_t , xmdl_t where xmdk000 in (4 ) and xmdkstus = 'Y' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = xmdkent and xmdk002 ='3' and xmdksite ='BVI' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = :ENT ) UNION ( SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno,xmdk000,xmdl087,xmdk008 FROM xmdk_t , xmdl_t where xmdk000 in (1,2,3) and xmdkstus = 'S' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = xmdkent and xmdk002 ='1' and xmdksite ='BVI' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = :ENT ) UNION ( SELECT DISTINCT xmdkdocno ,xmdk000, xmdl087,xmdk008 FROM xmdk_t , xmdl_t where xmdk000 ='6' and xmdkstus = 'S' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdkent = xmdkent and xmdksite ='BVI' and xmdkdocno = xmdldocno and xmdk082 <> '5' and xmdkent = :ENT ) )
where 1=1 ORDER BY xmdkdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdlseq,xmdl007,xmdl008,imaal003,imaal004,xmdl009,xmdl018 FROM xmdl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = xmdlent AND imaal001 = xmdl008 AND imaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND xmdldocno = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdlseq

zoom.desc: 出货多库储批的料件产品编号查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xmdm001,imaal003,imaal004,xmdm002 FROM xmdm_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON xmdment = imaalent AND xmdm001 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG ,xmdk_t
WHERE xmdment = xmdkent AND xmdment = :ENT AND xmdmsite = xmdksite AND xmdmsite = :SITE AND xmdmdocno = xmdkdocno AND xmdk000 = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdm001

SELECT DISTINCT xmdm033 FROM xmdm_t
WHERE xmdment = :ENT AND xmdmsite = 'arg1' ORDER BY xmdm033

SELECT DISTINCT xmdo004,xmdo005 FROM xmdo_t
WHERE xmdoent = :ENT AND xmdo005 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY xmdo004

SELECT DISTINCT xmdo021,xmdo022 FROM xmdo_t
WHERE xmdoent = :ENT AND xmdo022 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY xmdo021

SELECT DISTINCT xmdo021,xmdo023 FROM xmdo_t
WHERE xmdoent = :ENT AND xmdo023 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY xmdo021

SELECT DISTINCT xmdodocno,xmdodocdt,xmdo001,gzcbl004,xmdo002,ooag011,xmdo003,ooefl003 FROM xmdo_t LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '2068' AND gzcbl002 = xmdo001 AND gzcbl003= :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmdoent AND ooag001 = xmdo002 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent= xmdoent AND ooefl001 = xmdo003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdoent = :ENT AND xmdostus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdodocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdodocno,xmdodocdt,xmdo001,gzcbl004,xmdo002,ooag011,xmdo003,ooefl003 FROM xmdp_t,xmdo_t LEFT JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '2068' AND gzcbl002 = xmdo001 AND gzcbl003= :DLANG LEFT JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmdoent AND ooag001 = xmdo002 LEFT JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent= xmdoent AND ooefl001 = xmdo003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmdoent = xmdpent AND xmdodocno = xmdpdocno AND xmdosite= xmdpsite AND xmdosite = :SITE AND xmdoent = :ENT AND xmdostus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmdodocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdtdocno,xmdtdocdt,xmdtstus,xmdt002,oofa011,xmdt003,ooefl003 FROM xmdt_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdt002 AND oofaent = xmdtent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = xmdt003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND ooeflent = xmdtent
WHERE xmdtent = :ENT ORDER BY xmdtdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmdxdocno,xmdxdocdt,xmdxstus,xmdx002,oofa011,xmdx003,ooefl003,xmdx004,pmaal004 FROM xmdx_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmdx002 AND oofaent = xmdxent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = xmdx003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND ooeflent = xmdxent LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaal001 = xmdx004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG AND pmaalent = xmdxent
WHERE xmdxent = :ENT AND xmdxsite = :SITE ORDER BY xmdxdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmeadocno,xmea900,xmea902,xmea000,xmea002,ooag011,xmea003,ooefl003,xmea004,pmaal004,xmeastus FROM xmea_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON xmeaent = ooagent AND xmea002 = ooag001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON xmeaent = ooeflent AND xmea003 = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON xmeaent = pmaalent AND xmea004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmeaent = :ENT AND xmeasite = :SITE AND xmeastus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmeadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmeedocno,xmeedocdt,xmeestus,xmee002,oofa011,xmee003,ooefl003 FROM xmee_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmee002 AND oofaent = :ENT LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = :ENT AND ooefl001 = xmee003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmeeent = :ENT AND xmeesite = :SITE ORDER BY xmeedocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmel004,xmel005 FROM xmel_t
WHERE 1=1 AND xmelent = :ENT ORDER BY xmel005

SELECT DISTINCT xmeldocno,xmeldocdt FROM xmel_t
WHERE 1=1 AND xmelent = :ENT ORDER BY xmeldocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmeldocno,xmeldocdt,xmel003,pmaal004,xmel006,xmel007,xmel008,xmel009,xmel010 FROM xmel_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = xmelent AND pmaal001 = xmel003 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmelent = :ENT AND xmelsite = :SITE AND xmelstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmeldocno,xmeldocdt

SELECT DISTINCT xmendocno,xmen001,xmen002,xmen004,xmen016 FROM xmen_t
WHERE xmenent = :ENT AND xmensite = :SITE AND xmenstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmendocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmendocno,xmendocdt,xmenstus,xmen002,oofa011,xmen003,ooefl003 FROM xmen_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON oofaent = xmenent AND oofa002 = '2' AND oofa003 = xmen002 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmenent AND ooefl001 = xmen003 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmenent = :ENT AND xmensite = :SITE ORDER BY xmendocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmeo001,xmeo002 FROM xmeo_t
WHERE xmeoent = :ENT AND xmeosite = :SITE ORDER BY xmeo001

SELECT DISTINCT xmepdocno,xmepstus,xmep001,xmep005 FROM xmep_t
WHERE xmepsite = :SITE AND xmepent = :ENT ORDER BY xmepdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmesdocno,xmesl003 FROM xmes_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xmesl_t ON xmesent = xmeslent AND xmesdocno = xmesldocno AND xmesl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmesent = :ENT AND xmessite = :SITEAND xmesstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmesdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmesdocno,xmesl003 FROM ((SELECT xmesdocno,xmesl003 FROM xmes_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xmesl_t ON xmesent = xmeslent AND xmesdocno = xmesldocno AND xmesl002 = :DLANG WHERE xmesent = :ENT AND xmessite = :SITEAND xmesstus = 'Y') UNION (SELECT bmaa001,imaal003 FROM bmaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON bmaaent = imaalent AND bmaa001 = imaal001 AND imaal002 = :DLANG WHERE bmaaent = :ENT AND bmaasite = :SITE AND bmaa002 = ' '))
ORDER BY xmesdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmevdocno,xmevdocdt,xmev013,xmevstus,xmev001,oofa011,xmev002,ooefl003 FROM xmev_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oofa_t ON xmev001 = oofa003 AND oofa002 = '2' AND xmevent=oofaent LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON xmev002 = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG AND xmevent=ooeflent
WHERE xmevent = :ENT AND xmevsite = :SITE ORDER BY xmevdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmfadocno,xmfal003 FROM xmfa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xmfal_t ON xmfaent = xmfalent AND xmfadocno = xmfaldocno AND xmfal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xmfaent = :ENT ORDER BY xmfadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmfb003,oocql004 FROM xmfb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocql001 = '803' AND xmfb003 = oocql002 AND xmfbent = oocqlent AND oocql003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmfbent = :ENT AND xmfbdocno = 'arg1' AND xmfb001 = 'arg2' ORDER BY xmfb003

zoom.desc: 报价单上的估价单号查询

SELECT DISTINCT xmfjdocno,xmfj003,pmaal004,xmfjdocdt,xmfj001,ooag011,xmfj002,ooefl003,xmfj004,ooail003,xmfj005,oodbl004,xmfj011,xmfj012 FROM xmfj_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = xmfjent AND pmaal001 = xmfj003 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooag_t ON ooagent = xmfjent AND ooag001 = xmfj001 LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooeflent = xmfjent AND ooefl001 = xmfj002 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN ooail_t ON ooailent = xmfjent AND ooail001 = xmfj004 AND ooail002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN oodbl_t ON oodblent = xmfjent AND oodbl001 = 'arg1' AND oodbl002 = xmfj005 AND oodbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE xmfjent = :ENT AND xmfjsite = :SITE AND xmfjstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xmfjdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xmfl001,xmfl002,imaal003,imaal004 FROM (SELECT xmfl001,xmfl002,imaal003,imaal004 FROM xmfl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN imaal_t ON imaalent = xmflent AND imaal001 = xmfl002 AND imaal002 = :DLANG WHERE xmflent = :ENT AND xmflsite= :SITE AND xmfl001 = '1' UNION SELECT xmfl001,xmfl002,rtaxl003 as imaal003,'' as imaal004 FROM xmfl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN rtaxl_t ON rtaxlent = xmflent AND rtaxl001 = xmfl002 AND rtaxl002 = :DLANG WHERE xmflent = :ENT AND xmflsite= :SITE AND xmfl001 = '2' UNION SELECT xmfl001,xmfl002,oocql004 as imaal003,'' as imaal004 FROM xmfl_t LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xmflent AND oocql001 = '2003' AND oocql002 = xmfl002 AND oocql003 = :DLANG WHERE xmflent = :ENT AND xmflsite= :SITE AND xmfl001 = '3')
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xmfl001,xmfl002

WHERE 1=1 AND xradlent = xradent AND xradent = :ENT AND xradstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xrad001

SELECT DISTINCT xrah002,ooeal003 FROM xrah_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooeal001 = xrah002 AND ooealent = xrahent AND ooeal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xrah001 = '1' AND xrah007 = 'Y' AND xrahstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xrah002

SELECT DISTINCT xrah002,ooeal003 FROM xrah_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooeal001 = xrah002 AND ooealent = xrahent AND ooeal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xrah001 = '2' AND xrah007 = 'Y' AND xrahstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xrah002

SELECT DISTINCT xrah002,ooefl003 FROM xrah_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = xrah002 AND ooeflent = xrahent AND ooeflent=:ENT AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xrahent=:ENT AND xrah001 = '3' AND xrah007 = 'Y' AND xrahstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xrah002

SELECT DISTINCT xrah002,ooeal003 FROM xrah_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooeal001 = xrah002 AND ooealent = xrahent AND ooeal002 = :DLANG, ( ( SELECT glaald,glaacomp FROM glaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooealent = glaaent AND ooeal001 = glaacomp AND ooeal002 =:DLANG WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM glba_t WHERE glbaent = glaaent AND glbald = glaald ) AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM glbb_t WHERE glbbent = glaaent AND glbbld = glaald ) AND glaa014 = 'Y' AND glaastus ='Y' ) UNION ( SELECT glaald,glaacomp FROM glaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooealent = glaaent AND ooeal001 = glaacomp AND ooeal002 =:DLANG, glba_t WHERE glbaent = glaaent AND glbald = glaald AND glba001 = 'arg1' AND glaa014 = 'Y' AND glaastus ='Y' ) UNION ( SELECT glaald,glaacomp FROM glaa_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooealent = glaaent AND ooeal001 = glaacomp AND ooeal002 =:DLANG, glbb_t WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM glba_t WHERE glbaent = glaaent AND glbald = glaald ) AND glbbent = glaaent AND glbbld = glaald AND glbb001 = 'arg2' AND glaa014 = 'Y' AND glaastus ='Y' ) )
WHERE xrah001 = '1' AND xrah007 = 'Y' AND xrah002 = glaacomp AND xrahstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xrah002

SELECT DISTINCT xrah002,ooefl003 FROM xrah_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooefl_t ON ooefl001 = xrah002 AND ooeflent = xrahent AND ooefl002 = :DLANG
WHERE xrah001 = '3' AND xrah007 = 'Y' AND xrahstus = 'Y' ORDER BY xrah002

SELECT DISTINCT xrah004,ooeal003 FROM xrah_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON xrahent = ooealent AND xrah004 = ooeal001 AND ooeal002 = :DLANG
WHERE xrahent = :ENT AND xrah001 = 'arg1' AND xrah002 = 'arg2' AND xrah003 = 'arg3' ORDER BY xrah004

SELECT DISTINCT xrah004,ooefl003 FROM xrah_t,ooefl_t
WHERE xrah001 = '1' AND xrah002 = 'arg1' AND xrahent = :ENT AND xrah004 = ooefl001 AND ooefl002 = :DLANG ORDER BY xrah002

SELECT DISTINCT xrcald,xrcasite,ooeal003,xrca004,pmaal004,xrcadocno,xrcadocdt,xrca018,xrca100,xrca108,xrca118,xrca007,oocql004,xrca001,gzcbl004 FROM ( SELECT xrcald,xrcasite,ooeal003,xrca004,pmaal004,xrcadocno,xrcadocdt, xrca018,xrca100,xrca108,xrca118,xrca007,oocql004,xrca001,gzcbl004,xrcaent,xrcastus FROM xrca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooealent = xrcaent AND ooeal002 = :DLANG AND ooeal001 = xrcasite LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = xrcaent AND pmaal002 = :DLANG AND pmaal001 = xrca004 LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl002 = xrca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG AND gzcbl001 = '8302' LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xrcaent AND oocql003 = 'zh_TW' AND oocql001 = '3111' AND oocql002 = xrca007 )
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcastus = 'Y' AND xrcasite = 'arg1' AND xrcald = 'arg2' AND xrca004 = 'arg3' ORDER BY xrcasite,xrcald,xrca004

zoom.desc: 未冲销应收单总额查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xrcald,xrcasite,ooeal003,xrca004,pmaal004,xrcadocno,xrcadocdt,xrca018,xrca100,xrcc108,xrcc118,xrca007,oocql004,xrca001 FROM ( SELECT xrcald,xrcasite,ooeal003,xrca004,pmaal004,xrcadocno,xrcadocdt, xrca018,xrca100,SUM(xrcc108 - xrcc109) xrcc108,SUM(xrcc118 - xrcc119) xrcc118,xrca007,oocql004,xrca001,gzcbl004,xrcaent,xrcastus FROM xrca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN ooeal_t ON ooealent = xrcaent AND ooeal002 = :DLANG AND ooeal001 = xrcasite LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = xrcaent AND pmaal002 = :DLANG AND pmaal001 = xrca004 LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl002 = xrca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG AND gzcbl001 = '8302' LEFT OUTER JOIN oocql_t ON oocqlent = xrcaent AND oocql003 = 'zh_TW' AND oocql001 = '3111' AND oocql002 = xrca007, xrcc_t WHERE xrccent = xrcaent AND xrccld = xrcald AND xrccdocno = xrcadocno AND xrcc108 - xrcc109 > 0 GROUP BY xrcald,xrcasite,ooeal003,xrca004,pmaal004,xrcadocno,xrcadocdt, xrca018,xrca100,xrca007,oocql004,xrca001,gzcbl004,xrcaent,xrcastus )
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcastus = 'Y' AND xrcasite = 'arg1' AND xrcald = 'arg2' AND xrca004 = 'arg3' ORDER BY xrcasite,xrcald,xrca004

zoom.desc: 已立账未冲销总额查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xrcblegl,xrcb001,xrccdocno,xrcc001,xrcc004,xrcc100,xrcc108,xrcc118,xrca001,xrca004,pmaal004 FROM ( SELECT xrcblegl,xrcb001,xrcb002,xrcc001,xrcc004,xrccdocno,SUM (xrcc108 - xrcc109) xrcc108, pmaal004,xrca001,xrca004,xrcaent,xrcc100,xrcastus, SUM (xrcc118 - xrcc119) xrcc118,xrcald,xrcasite FROM xrca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = xrcaent AND pmaal002 = :DLANG AND pmaal001 = xrca004, xrcb_t, xrcc_t, gzcb_t WHERE xrcaent = xrcbent AND xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcald = xrcbld AND xrcald = xrccld AND xrcadocno = xrcbdocno AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno AND xrccseq = xrcbseq AND xrca001 = gzcb002 AND gzcb003 = '1' AND gzcb001 = '8302' AND gzcb002 = 'arg4' AND xrcc108 - xrcc109 > 0 GROUP BY xrcblegl,xrcb001,xrccdocno,xrcb002,xrcc001,xrcc004, xrcc100,xrca001,xrca004,pmaal004,xrcaent,xrcastus,xrcald,xrcasite )
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcastus = 'Y' AND xrcasite = 'arg1' AND xrcald = 'arg2' AND xrca004 = 'arg3' ORDER BY xrca001,xrccdocno,xrcc001

zoom.desc: 已立账未冲销明细查询

zooms.zoom:
SELECT DISTINCT xrcblegl,xrcb001,xrccdocno,xrccseq,xrcc001,xrcb002,xrcc004,xrcc100,xrcc108,xrcc118,xrca001,xrca004,pmaal004 FROM ( SELECT xrcblegl,xrcb001,xrcb002,xrcc001,xrcc004,xrccdocno,SUM (xrcc108 - xrcc109) xrcc108, pmaal004,xrca001,xrca004,xrcaent,xrcc100,xrcastus, SUM (xrcc118 - xrcc119) xrcc118,xrcald,xrcasite,xrccseq FROM xrca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON pmaalent = xrcaent AND pmaal002 = :DLANG AND pmaal001 = xrca004, xrcb_t, xrcc_t, gzcb_t WHERE xrcaent = xrcbent AND xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcald = xrcbld AND xrcald = xrccld AND xrcadocno = xrcbdocno AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno AND xrccseq = xrcbseq AND xrca001 = gzcb002 AND gzcb003 = '1' AND gzcb001 = '8302' AND gzcb002 = 'arg4' AND xrcc108 - xrcc109 > 0 GROUP BY xrcblegl,xrcb001,xrccdocno,xrcb002,xrcc001,xrcc004, xrcc100,xrca001,xrca004,pmaal004,xrcaent,xrcastus,xrcald,xrcasite,xrccseq )
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcastus = 'Y' AND xrcasite = 'arg1' AND xrcald = 'arg2' AND xrca004 = 'arg3' ORDER BY xrca001,xrccdocno,xrcc001

SELECT DISTINCT xrca018,xrca016,xrcadocno,xrca001 FROM xrca_t
WHERE 1=1 AND xrcaent = :ENT ORDER BY xrcadocno,xrca001

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrcadocdt,xrca004,pmaal003,xrca018 FROM xrca_t,pmaal_t
WHERE pmaalent = xrcaent AND pmaal001 = xrca004 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG AND xrcaent = :ENT AND xrca001='21' ORDER BY xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrca038 FROM xrca_t
WHERE 1=1 AND xrcaent = :ENT ORDER BY xrca038

SELECT DISTINCT xrca047,xrcadocno FROM xrca_t
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrca047 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY xrca047

SELECT DISTINCT xrca057,pmaal004,pmaa004 FROM ( ( SELECT DISTINCT xrca057,pmaal004,pmaa004 FROM xrca_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON xrcaent=pmaalent AND xrca057=pmaal001 AND pmaal002=:DLANG,pmaa_t WHERE xrcaent=pmaaent AND xrca004=pmaa001 AND pmaa004 IN ('1','3') AND xrcaent=:ENT AND xrcastus<>'X' ) UNION ( SELECT DISTINCT xrca057,ooag010 pmaal004,pmaa004 FROM xrca_t,ooag_t,pmaa_t WHERE xrcaent=ooagent AND xrca057=ooag001 AND xrcaent=:ENT AND xrcastus<>'X' AND xrcaent=pmaaent AND xrca004=pmaa001 AND pmaa004='4' ) UNION ( SELECT DISTINCT xrca057,pmak003 pmaal004,pmaa004 FROM xrca_t,pmak_t,pmaa_t WHERE xrcaent=pmakent AND xrca057=pmak001 AND xrcaent=:ENT AND xrcastus<>'X' AND xrcaent=pmaaent AND xrca004=pmaa001 AND pmaa004='2' ) )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xrca057

SELECT DISTINCT xrca063,xrcadocdt FROM xrca_t
WHERE xrcaent=:ENT AND xrcastus<>'X' ORDER BY xrca063,xrcadocdt DESC

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrca001,xrcasite,xrca003,xrcald,xrcadocdt,xrca004,pmaal004,xrca057,pmak003 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT xrca_t.*, (SELECT pmaal004 FROM pmaal_t WHERE xrcaent = pmaalent AND xrca004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :LANG) pmaal004, (CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = :ENT AND pmaa001 = xrca004) = '4' THEN (SELECT ooag011 FROM ooag_t WHERE ooagent = xrcaent AND ooag001 = xrca057) ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = :ENT AND pmaa001 = xrca004) = '2' THEN (SELECT pmak003 FROM pmak_t WHERE pmakent = xrcaent AND pmak001 = xrca057) ELSE '' END END) pmak003 FROM xrca_t )
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcastus <> 'X' ORDER BY xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrca001,xrcasite,xrca003,xrca004,xrcald,xrcadocdt,xrcc108,xrcc109 FROM (SELECT xrcadocno,xrca001,xrcasite,xrca003,xrca004,xrcald,xrcadocdt,SUM(xrcc108) xrcc108,SUM(xrcc109) xrcc109 FROM xrcc_t,xrca_t WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcald = xrccld AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno AND xrcastus = 'Y' GROUP BY xrcadocno,xrca001,xrcasite,xrca003,xrca004,xrcald,xrcadocdt)
WHERE 1=1 AND xrcc108 - xrcc109 <> 0 ORDER BY xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrcasite,xrca004,pmaal003,xrca001,xrcadocno,xrcadocdt,xrca003,t1.ooag011,xrca014,t2.ooag011,xrca100,xrca108,xrcacrtid,t3.ooag011,xrcacrtdt FROM xrca_t LEFT JOIN pmaal_t ON xrca004 = pmaal001 AND xrcaent = pmaalent AND pmaal002 = :LANG LEFT JOIN ooag_t t1 ON xrca003 = t1.ooag001 AND xrcaent = t1.ooagent LEFT JOIN ooag_t t2 ON xrca014 = t2.ooag001 AND xrcaent = t2.ooagent LEFT JOIN ooag_t t3 ON xrcacrtid = t3.ooag001 AND xrcaent = t3.ooagent
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT ORDER BY xrcasite,xrcadocdt,xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrccseq FROM xrca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xrcc_t ON xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno AND xrcald = xrccld
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrca001 like '2%' AND xrca004 = 'arg1' AND xrcald = 'arg2' AND xrcasite = 'arg3' AND xrcc108 - xrcc109 > 0 AND xrcastus ='Y' AND xrcadocdt <= 'arg4' ORDER BY xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrca001,xrcasite,xrca003,xrca004,xrcald,xrcadocdt,xrcc108,xrcc109 FROM (SELECT xrcadocno,xrca001,xrcasite,xrca003,xrca004,xrcald,xrcadocdt,xrcc108 ,xrcc109 FROM xrcc_t,xrca_t,gzcb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcb001 = gzcbl001 AND gzcb002 = gzcbl002 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcald = xrccld AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno AND xrcastus = 'Y' AND xrca001 = gzcb002 AND gzcb003 = '1' AND gzcb001 = '8302' AND (xrcc108-xrcc109)>0)
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrccseq,xrca001,xrcasite,xrca003,xrca004,xrcald,xrcadocdt,xrcc108,xrcc109,xrca018 FROM xrcc_t LEFT JOIN xrca_t ON xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcald = xrccld AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT ORDER BY xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrca004,pmaal004,xrca001,gzcbl004,xrca100,xrcc108,xrcc109,fabh004 FROM ( SELECT xrcaent,xrcasite,xrcald,xrcastus,xrcadocno,xrca004,xrca001,xrca100,SUM(xrcc108) xrcc108,SUM(xrcc109) xrcc109,SUM(xrcc108-xrcc109) fabh004 FROM xrcc_t,xrca_t WHERE xrccent = xrcaent AND xrccld = xrcald AND xrccdocno = xrcadocno GROUP BY xrcadocno,xrca004,xrca001,xrca100,xrcasite,xrcald,xrcastus,xrcaent ) LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON xrcaent = pmaalent AND xrca004 = pmaal001 AND pmaal002 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN gzcbl_t ON gzcbl001 = '8302' AND gzcbl002 = xrca001 AND gzcbl003 = :DLANG
WHERE 1=1 AND xrcaent=:ENT ORDER BY xrcadocno,xrca004,xrca001,xrca100

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrcbseq,xrcb004,xrcb005,xrcb007,xrcb006 FROM xrca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xrcb_t ON xrcaent = xrcbent AND xrcadocno = xrcbdocno AND xrcald = xrcbld
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcastus = 'Y' ORDER BY xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrcbseq,xrcb004,xrcb005,xrcb007,xrcb006 FROM xrca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xrcb_t ON xrcaent = xrcbent AND xrcadocno = xrcbdocno AND xrcald = xrcbld
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcb007 - xrcb030 > 0 AND xrcastus = 'Y' AND xrcb002 = 'arg1' AND xrcb003 = 'arg2' ORDER BY xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrca001,xrcasite,xrca003,xrcald,xrcadocdt,xrca004 FROM ( SELECT xrcadocno,xrca001,xrcasite,xrca003,xrcald,xrcadocdt,xrca004,SUM (xrcb118 - xrcb117) FROM xrca_t, xrcb_t WHERE xrcaent = xrcbent AND xrcald = xrcbld AND xrcadocno = xrcbdocno AND xrcastus = 'Y' GROUP BY xrcadocno,xrca001,xrcasite,xrca003,xrcald,xrcadocdt,xrca004 HAVING SUM (xrcb118 - xrcb117) > 0 )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrca001,xrcadocno,xrcadocdt,xrcastus,xrca004,pmaal004,xrcc100,xrcc108 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT xrca001,xrcadocno,xrcadocdt,xrcastus,xrca004,pmaal004,xrcc100,SUM(xrcc108) xrcc108,xrcald FROM xrca_t, xrcb_t, xrcc_t,pmaal_t WHERE xrcaent = xrcbent AND xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcaent = pmaalent AND xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcald = xrcbld AND xrcald = xrccld AND xrcadocno = xrcbdocno AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno AND pmaal001 = xrca004 AND pmaal002 = :LANG AND xrcastus <> 'X' GROUP BY xrca001,xrcadocno,xrcadocdt,xrcastus,xrca004,pmaal004,xrcc100,xrcald HAVING SUM (xrcc109) = 0 ORDER BY xrcadocdt DESC, xrcadocno )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xrcadocdt DESC, xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocdt,xrcbdocno,xrcbseq,xrcb007,xrcb103,xrcb104,xrcb105,xrcc108 FROM ( SELECT xrcadocdt,xrcbdocno,xrcbseq,xrcb007,xrcb103,xrcb104,xrcb105,sum(xrcc108-xrcc109) xrcc108 FROM xrcb_t,xrca_t,xrcc_t WHERE xrcbent = xrcaent AND xrcbdocno = xrcadocno AND xrcbld = xrcald AND xrcbent = xrccent AND xrcbdocno = xrccdocno AND xrcbld = xrcald AND xrcbent = :ENT AND xrca001 IN ('01','02') AND xrcastus='Y' AND xrcc108-xrcc109 <> 0 AND ((xrcb002 = 'arg1' AND xrcb003 = 'arg2' AND 'arg1' IS NOT NULL) OR ('arg1' IS NULL AND xrca057 = 'arg4')) AND xrcbld = 'arg3' GROUP BY xrcadocdt,xrcbdocno,xrcbseq,xrcb007,xrcb103,xrcb104,xrcb105 )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xrcadocdt,xrcbdocno,xrcbseq

SELECT DISTINCT xrcadocno,xrcbseq,xrcc001,xrcc003,xrcc108,xrcc109,xrcc118,xrcc119,xrcb004,xrcb005 FROM xrca_t , xrcb_t ,xrcc_t
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcaent = xrcbent AND xrcadocno = xrcbdocno AND xrcald = xrcbld AND xrccent=xrcaent AND xrccld=xrcald AND xrccdocno=xrcadocno AND xrccseq=xrcbseq AND xrcastus = 'Y' ORDER BY xrcadocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrca001,xrcald,xrcadocno,xrccseq,xrcc001,xrcc009,xrcc100,fabh004,xrcastus,xrca053,xrca057,pmak003 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT xrca001,xrcald,xrcadocno,xrccseq,xrcc001,xrcc009,xrca038,xrca053, xrcc108-xrcc109-COALESCE((SELECT SUM(xrce109) FROM xrce_t WHERE xrceent = xrccent AND xrceld =xrccld AND xrce003 = xrccdocno AND xrce004 =xrccseq AND xrce005 = xrcc001 and (exists (select 1 from xrda_t where xrceent = xrdaent and xrceld = xrdald and xrcedocno = xrdadocno and xrdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) OR exists (select 1 from xrca_t where xrceent = xrcaent and xrceld = xrcald and xrcedocno = xrcadocno and xrcastus NOT IN('X','Y'))) ),0) -COALESCE((SELECT SUM(apce109) FROM apce_t WHERE apceent = xrccent AND apceld =xrccld AND apce003 = xrccdocno AND apce004 =xrccseq AND apce005 = xrcc001 and (exists (select 1 from apda_t where apceent = apdaent and apceld = apdald and apcedocno = apdadocno and apdastus NOT IN('X','Y')) ) ),0) AS fabh004, xrcc100,xrcastus,xrcaent,xrcacomp,xrca005,xrcadocdt,xrca004,xrca060, xrca057, (CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = xrcaent AND pmaa001 = xrca004) = '4' THEN (SELECT ooag011 FROM ooag_t WHERE ooagent = xrcaent AND ooag001 = xrca057) ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT pmaa004 FROM pmaa_t WHERE pmaaent = xrcaent AND pmaa001 = xrca004) = '2' THEN (SELECT pmak003 FROM pmak_t WHERE pmakent = xrcaent AND pmak001 = xrca057) ELSE '' END END) pmak003 FROM xrca_t,xrcc_t xx WHERE xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcald = xrccld AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno AND xrcaent = :ENT AND NOT(xrca001 like '2%' AND EXISTS ( select 1 from xrca_t,xrcc_t where xrcaent = xrccent and xrcastus = 'Y' AND xrcadocno=xrccdocno AND xrcaent = xrccent and xrcald = xrccld and xrcc108-xrcc109 >0 and xrca019 = xx.xrccdocno and xrcald =xx.xrccld and xrcaent =xx.xrccent) ) )
WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcastus = 'Y' AND fabh004 > 0 AND xrcacomp ='arg1' AND xrca005 ='arg2' AND xrcadocdt <= 'arg3' ORDER BY xrca001,xrcald,xrcadocno,xrccseq,xrcc001

WHERE xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcbent = xrcaent AND xrcbld = xrcald AND xrcbdocno = xrcadocno AND xmdldocno = xrcb002 AND xmdlseq = xrcb003 AND xmdlent = xrcbent AND xmdkent = xmdlent AND xmdkdocno = xmdldocno ORDER BY xrcadocno

WHERE xrcbent = :ENT ORDER BY xrcb002

SELECT DISTINCT xrcb001,xrcb002,xrcb008,xrca004,xrcb010 FROM ( SELECT xrcadocno,xrcald,xrcb001,xrcb002,xrcb008,xrca004,xrcb010,SUM(xrcc109) FROM xrca_t,xrcc_t,xrcb_t WHERE xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcaent = xrcbent AND xrcaent = :ENT AND xrcadocno = xrcbdocno AND xrcald = xrcbld AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno AND xrcald = xrccld GROUP BY xrcadocno,xrcald,xrcb001,xrcb002,xrcb008,xrca004,xrcb010 HAVING SUM(xrcc109) = 0 )
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xrcb002,xrcb008

SELECT DISTINCT xrcb001,xrcb002,xrcb008,xrca004,pmaal004 FROM xrca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON xrcaent=pmaalent AND xrca004=pmaal001 AND pmaal002=:DLANG,xrcb_t
WHERE xrcaent=xrcbent AND xrcald=xrcbld AND xrcadocno=xrcbdocno AND xrcaent=:ENT ORDER BY xrcb001,xrcb002,xrcb008,xrca004

SELECT DISTINCT xrcb001,xrcb002,xrcb008,xrca004,pmaal004 FROM xrca_t LEFT OUTER JOIN pmaal_t ON xrcaent=pmaalent AND xrca004=pmaal001 AND pmaal002=:DLANG,xrcb_t
WHERE xrcaent=xrcbent AND xrcald=xrcbld AND xrcadocno=xrcbdocno AND xrcaent=:ENT ORDER BY xrcb001,xrcb002,xrcb008,xrca004

SELECT DISTINCT xrcb021,glacl004,glac004,glac008,glac020,glac027,glac017,glac018,glac021,glac022,glac023,glac024,glac025 FROM xrcb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN glacl_t ON xrcbent = glaclent AND glacl001 = 'arg1' AND xrcb021 = glacl002 AND glacl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN glac_t ON xrcbent = glacent AND glac001 = 'arg1' AND xrcb021 = glac002
WHERE xrcb021 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY xrcb021

SELECT DISTINCT xrcb025,glapdocdt,glap002,glap004,glapstus FROM xrcb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN glap_t ON xrcbent = glapent AND xrcbld = glapld AND glapdocno = xrcbdocno
WHERE xrcb025 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY xrcb025

SELECT DISTINCT xrcb029,glacl004,glac004,glac008,glac020,glac027,glac017,glac018,glac021,glac022,glac023,glac024,glac025 FROM xrcb_t LEFT OUTER JOIN glacl_t ON xrcbent = glaclent AND glacl001 = 'arg1' AND xrcb029 = glacl002 AND glacl003 = :DLANG LEFT OUTER JOIN glac_t ON xrcbent = glacent AND glac001 = 'arg1' AND xrcb029 = glac002
WHERE xrcb029 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY xrcb029

SELECT DISTINCT xrca001,xrcbdocno,xrcbseq,xrcb002,xrcb105,xrca101,xrcb115 FROM ( SELECT xrcbdocno,xrcbseq,xrcb002,xrcb003,xrcb105 - CASE WHEN nmee012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmee012 END xrcb105,xrca101,xrcb115 - CASE WHEN nmee012 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE nmee012 END * xrca101 xrcb115,xrca004,xrcbsite,xrcbent,xrca001 FROM xrca_t, xrcb_t LEFT JOIN nmee_t ON nmeeent = xrcbent AND nmee003 = xrcbdocno AND nmee004 = xrcbseq WHERE xrcaent = xrcbent AND xrcadocno = xrcbdocno AND xrcald = xrcbld AND xrcastus = 'Y' )
WHERE 1=1 AND xrcb105 > 0 AND xrcbent = :ENT ORDER BY xrcbdocno

SELECT DISTINCT xrccdocno,xrccseq,xrcc015,xrcc003,xrcc004 FROM xrcc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xrca_t ON xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcald = xrccld AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno
WHERE xrccent = :ENT ORDER BY xrccdocno,xrccseq

SELECT DISTINCT xrccdocno,xrccseq,xrcc015,xrcc003,xrcc004 FROM xrcc_t LEFT OUTER JOIN xrca_t ON xrcaent = xrccent AND xrcald = xrccld AND xrcadocno = xrccdocno
WHERE xrccent = :ENT ORDER BY xrccdocno,xrccseq

WHERE xrce002 = gzcb002 AND gzcb001 = '8306' AND gzcb004 = '2' AND xrceent = :ENT ORDER BY xrce024

WHERE xrdeent = :ENT ORDER BY xrde014

SELECT DISTINCT xregdocno,xregsite,xreg004,xregld,xregdocdt FROM xreg_t
